title:
Ayeyi Nka Nyame Tumfo
Praise to the Lord
songEN:
Ayeyi nka Nyame Tumfo
De ny'naa so Hene!
O, me kra yi N'ayq, n'Xyq
W'ahoxden ne nkwagye;
Mò a mote ny'naa,
Muntwiw mmra N'asxrefi;
Momfa anigye ntontom No.

Ayeyi nka Nyame a Odi
Ade ny'naa so Hene!
Xde Ne ntaban bx w' ho ban
Mma wo nea ehia wo!
Enti wunhui,
Sq Xde w'abisade ny'naa
Ama w' sqnea Wahyehyq no?

Ayeyi nka Nyame a Ohy'ra
W'adwuma, bx w' ho ban;
N'ayamye ne N'ahummxb'rx nni
W'akyi da biara; Susu ho bio,
Nea Tweaduampxn tumi yq,
Sq Xde Ne dx fa w' yxnko.
songTWI:
Praise to the Lord, the Almighty,
The King of creation!
O my soul, praise Him,
For He is thy health and salvation!
All ye who hear,
How to His temple draw near;
Join ye in glad adoration!

Praise to the Lord, Who o'er all things
So wondrously reigneth
Shieldeth thee under His wings,
Yea, so gently sustaineth!
Hast thou not seen how
Thy desires e'er have been
Granted in what He ordaineth?

Praise to the Lord, who doth prosper
Thy work and defend thee
Surely His goodness and mercy
Here daily attend thee.
Ponder anew what the Almighty can do,
If with His love He befriend thee.

title:
Yqn Nyame Hen' Abxde Ny'naa
All Creatures of Our God
songEN:
Yqn Nyame Hen' abxde ny'naa
Momma mo nne so mma yqnto
Haleluya, Haleluya!
Owia fqfq a qhyerqn,
Xsram a qma hann 'nadwo!
Munyi N'ayq, munyi N'ayq,
Haleluya, Haleluya, Haleluya!

Ahum a etu, mframa brqoo,
Mununkum ā qde mframa nam;
Munyi N'ayq, Haleluya!
Anxpa, di dqw 'nigye mu;
Anwumm're hann, ma wo nne so;
Munyi N'ayq, munyi N'ayq,
Haleluya, Haleluya, Haleluya!

N-su kronnyen a qresen,
Monto dwom mma mo Aw'rade!
Munyi N'ayq, Haleluya!
Ogya a qhyerqn fqfq,
Na qma yqn hyew ne kanea;
O, yi N'ayq, O, yi N'ayq,
Haleluya, Haleluya, Haleluya!

Ma 'bxde ny'naa nhy'ra Xbxadeq,
Nsom No wx ahobrqase mu!
Munyi N'ayq, Haleluya!
Munyi Agya, Xba ayq!
Ne Honhom no! Baasa K'ro no!
Munyi N'ayq, munyi N'ayq!
Haleluya, Haleluya, Haleluya!
songTWI:
All creatures of our God and King,
Lift up your voice with us and sing
Alleluia! Alleluia!
O burning sun with golden beam
And silver moon with softer gleam:
Oh, praise Him! Oh, praise Him!
Alleluia, alleluia, alleluia!

O rushing wind and breezes soft,
O clouds that ride the winds aloft:
Oh, praise Him! Alleluia!
O rising morn, in praise rejoice,
O lights of evening, find a voice.
Oh, praise Him! Oh, praise Him!
Alleluia, alleluia, alleluia!

O flowing waters, pure and clear,
Make music for your Lord to hear.
Oh, praise Him! Alleluia!
O fire so masterful and bright,
Providing us with warmth and light,
Oh, praise Him! Oh, praise Him!
Alleluia, alleluia, alleluia!

Let all things their Creator bless,
And worship Him in humbleness,
Oh, praise Him! Alleluia!
Oh, praise the Father, praise the Son,
And praise the Spirit, three in One!
Oh, praise Him! Oh, praise Him!
Alleluia, alleluia, alleluia!

title:
Nyame Wx Yqn Mu Ha
God Himself is With Us
songEN:
Nyame wx yqn mu ha
Momma yqnkoto No,
Na yqmfa suro mmra N'anim;
Nyame wx yqn mu ha,
Me kra nyq komm N'anim
Mmqn No wx ahobrqase mu!
Ne de a Munim No,
Monsom No nokwarem'
Munyi No ayq yie.

Bra na bqtra me mu,
Me kra te sq Maria,
Nyq Wo wiase asxrefie.
Bra me mu, O Honhom,
Sesa nipadua yi,
Mede 'nidi, dx, bqma Wo
Baabiarā a,Mqkx no,
Ma menkoto W'anim,
N-hu Wo yie nsom Wo.

Wiase nnaadaa hunu,
Ahantan, 'bra bxne,
Yqde 'nigye gyae ne ny'naa mu.
'Wura, yqde 'nigye
Bqyq Wo de daa daa
Yqn kra, nkwa, ne yqn adeny'naa
Wo nkutoo, Na yenim,
Woyq ade ny'naa Wura
Woky'rq nokwar' 'bra kwan.
songTWI:
God Himself is with us;
Let us all adore Him,
And with awe appear before Him.
God is here within us;
Soul in silence fear him,
Humbly, fervently draw near Him.
Now His own who have known God,
in worship lowly,
Yield their spirits wholly.

Come, abide within me;
Let my soul, like Mary,
Be Thine earthly sanctuary.
Come, indwelling Spirit,
With transfigured splendor;
Love and honor will I render.
Where I go here below,
Let me bow before Thee,
Know Thee and adore Thee.

Gladly we surrender
Earth's deceitful treasures,
Pride of life, and sinful pleasures:
Lord, we offer Thine to be forever,
Soul and life and each endeavor.
Thou alone shalt be known
Lord of all our being,
Life's true way decreeing.

title:
Me Kra Yi Soro Hen' Ayq
Praise My Soul
songEN:
Me kra yi soro Hen' ayq,
Fa wo tow no bra N'anim;
Wapxn wo, de wo ho akyq w'
Qnsq sq wuyi N'ayq?
Yi No ayq, yi No ayq!
Yi daa Hene no ayq!

Yi N'ayq, Xkyerqq Ne dom,
Agyanom ahohia mu;
Yi n'ayq na Xnsakra da;
Xtea nyaa, Xyq ntqm hy'ra:
Yi No ayq, yi No ayq!
Xyq 'nuonyamfo ampa!

Xhwq yqn so sq agya pa,
Onim yqn mm'rqwyq nyinaa;
Xsoa yqn Ne basa so brqoo,
Gye yqn fi y'atamfo nsam:
Yi no ayq, yi No ayq!
Sqnea Ne dom sian ba no!

Abxfo mmoa yqn N'ayeyi m'
Mo na muhu n'anim daa;
'Wia ne'sram, monkoto N'anim,
Nea 'Index ny'naa yi N'ayq:
Yi No ayq, yi No ayq!
Yi Nyame domfo N'ayq!
songTWI:
Praise, my soul, the King of heaven;
To His feet thy tribute bring.
Ransomed, healed, restored, forgiven,
Who like thee His praise should sing?
Praise Him, praise Him, Alleluia,
Praise the everlasting King.

Praise Him for His grace and favor
To our fathers in distress.
Praise Him, still the same forever,
Slow to chide and swift to bless;
Praise Him, praise Him, Alleluia,
Glorious in His faithfulness.

Tenderly He shields and spares us;
Well our feeble frame He knows.
In His hands He gently bears us,
Rescues us from all our foes.
Praise Him, praise Him, Alleluia,
Widely as His mercy flows.

Angels, help us to adore Him:
Ye behold Him face to face;
Sun and moon, bow down before Him:
Dwellers all in time and space.
Praise Him, praise Him, Alleluia,
Praise with us the God of grace.

title:
M'anidaso Ny'naa Ne Nyame
All My Hope on God is Founded
songEN:
M'anidaso ny'naa ne Nyame;
Xhyq m'ahotoso den,
Xhwq me so akwan ny'naa mu
'Ma me nea eye nkutoo.
Nyankopxn nko ara
Ná Xgye m' koma yq Ne de.

Nipa 'hantan ne fam 'nuonyam,
Nkrantq ne kyqw di n' huammx;
Nea osiam ho fif'ri hyehyq,
Abanten ny'naa dwiri gu.
Nso Nyame tumi no
Ne m'abanten b're biara.

Onyame yieyq tim hx daa,
Ne nyansa mu dx kqse;
'Nuonyam, hann ne nkwa wx Ne ho;
Ahoxfq sen` fi Ne mu.
Xdx wx Ne nsā ano,
Ahosqpq tie Ne fre.

Ma onipa mmx ayeyi
Afxre mma Nyame daa;
Ayeyi mforo nkx s'ros'ro,
Ne Ba Kristo 'kyqde n' nti.
Kristo frq obiara:
Mo 'kyidifo munnhintiw.
songTWI:
All my hope on God is founded;
He doth still my trust renew,
Me through change and chance He guideth,
Only good and only true.
God unknown, He alone
Calls my heart to be His own.

Pride of man and earthly glory,
Sword and crown betray his trust;
What with care and toil he buildeth,
Tower and temple fall to dust.
But God's power, hour by hour,
Is my temple and my tower.

God's great goodness aye endureth,
Deep His wisdom, passing thought:
Splendor, light, and life attend Him,
Beauty springeth out of naught.
Love doth stand at His hand;
Joy doth wait on His command.

Still from man to God eternal
Sacrifice of praise be done,
High above all praises prising
For the gift of Christ His son.
Christ doth call one and all:
Ye who follow shall not fall.

title:
O Monsom Aw'rade 'Hokeka
O Worship the Lord
songEN:
O Monson Aw'rade 'hokeka
kronkron mu,
Monkoto N'anim,
monka N'ayeyi
Wx setie fqfq ne
'hobrqase huanhuam mu.
Koto N', yi N'ayq,
Ne din ne 'W'rade.

Fa w'adesoa ne dadwen gu
Ne nan ase,
Xbqsoa ne ny'naa
wx Ne koma so;
Xbqkyekye wo werq
atie wo mpaebx,
Ahwq w'anammxn
de asi neā eye.

Nsuro, fa w'ade
ketewa ne w'ahonya,
Sq qte biara,
bra N'abangua so
Nokwar' a qsx ani
ne 'hobrqase dx-
'Yinom sqq na
fa bx No afxre.

Sq mpo yqde ba
'hopopo ne sųro mu a
Xbqgye wx Ne din
a qsom bo m'
Anxpa 'nigye wie
anwumm're nusu mu
'Hopopo ne sųro
wie 'nidaso mu.
songTWI:
O worship the Lord
In the beauty of holiness,
Bow down before Him,
His glory proclaim;
With gold of obedience,
and incense of lowliness,
Kneel and adore Him;
the Lord is His name.

Low at His feet
lay thy burden of carefulness,
High on His heart
He will bear it for thee,
Comfort thy sorrows,
and answer thy prayerfulness,
Guiding thy steps
as may best for thee be.

Fear not to enter
His courts in the slenderness
Of the poor wealth
Thou wouldst reckon as thine;
Truth in its beauty
and love in its tenderness,
These are the offerings
to lay on His shrine.

These, though we bring
them in trembling and fearfulness,
He will accept for
the name that is dear;
Mornings of joy give
for evenings of tearfulness,
Trust for our trembling,
and hope for our fear.

title:
Aw'rade Di Hen' Sion
The Lord in Zion Reigneth
songEN:
Aw'rade di hen' Sion,
Ma wiase ny'naa nni dqw,
Momfa ahurusi koma
Mmra Ne dom 'henguá anim;
Aw'rade di hen' Sion,
N'ayeyi bqwoso;
Ahen' mma bqkoto N'anim,
Ná ahen' ahyq N' 'nuonyam.

Aw'rade di hen' Sion,
Hena ná xne No sq?
Wiase abun' ny'naa wx Ne nsam',
Odi po kqse so;
Monhyq Ne din anuonyam
Na munhim Ne frankaa;
Kosi sq nsupxw ny'naa benya
Ne nkwagye tumi no.

Aw'rade di hen' Sion,
Saa mm're yi yq Ne de;
Monhyqn' N'asxrefi no mu,
Na nnwonto nhyq hx ma;
N'adehye frankaa n'ase
Abxde ny'naa nkoto,
Momma S'ro ne 'sase Hen' so
Nhyq N'ade ny'naa so Hen'.
songTWI:
The Lord in Zion reigneth,
let all the world rejoice,
And come before His throne
of grace with tuneful heart and voice;
The Lord in Zion reigneth,
and there His praise shall ring,
To Him shall princes bend
the knee and kings their glory bring.

The Lord in Zion reigneth,
and who so great as He?
The depths of earth are in His hands;
He rules the mighty sea.
O crown His Name with honor,
and let His standard wave,
Till distant isles beyond the deep
shall own His power to save.

The Lord in Zion reigneth,
these hours to Him belong;
O enter now His temple gates,
and fill His courts with song;
Beneath His royal banner
let every creature fall,
Exalt the King of heaven and earth,
and crown Him Lord of all

title:
Yebom Hyia Bisa Awurade Hx
We Gather Together
songEN:
Yebom hyia bisa
Awurede hx nhyira,
Xtwe y'aso yq ntqm
ma yehu Ne pq;
'Bxnefo a xhyq yqn
so no gyae yqn haw.
Monkamfo Ne din no,
Ne w'rq mfi Ne de.

Yqn Nyankopxn wx yqn
nkyqn rekyerq yqn kwan;
Xde Ne soro
ahemman no tim hx;
'Nti yefi ase di nim
wx 'ko no mfiase;
Aw'rade wx y'afa;
'Nuonyam ny'naa wx No.

Yqma Wo din so,
kannifo nkonimdifo;
Yqsrq sq kx so yq yqn
Banbxfo daa.
Ma W'asafo no nguan
mfi ahohia ny'naa mu,
Yqkamfo Wo din, W'ra
Ma yqn fawhodi.
songTWI:
We gather together
to ask the Lord's blessing;
He chastens and hastens
His will to make known.
The wicked oppressing
now cease from distressing.
Sing praises to His Name;
He forgets not His own.

Beside us to guide us,
our God with us joining,
Ordaining, maintaining
His kingdom divine;
So from the beginning
the fight we were winning;
Thou, Lord, were at our side,
all glory be Thine!

We all do extol Thee,
Thou leader triumphant,
And pray that Thou still
our defender wilt be.
Let Thy congregation
escape tribulation;
Thy name be ever praised!
O Lord, make us free!

title:
Ma Wiase Nnipa Nyinaa Nto
Let All the World in Every Corner Sing
songEN:
Ma wiase nnipa nyinaa nto dwom sq:
Me Nyame Hen'!
S'ro nni akyi koraa,
N'ayeyi bqfro hx;
'Sase nni fam mm'roso,
N'ayeyi fi hx ba.
Ma wiase nnipa nyinaa nto dwom sq:
Me Nyame Hen'!

Ma wiase nnipa nyinaa nto dwom sq:
Me Nyame Hen'!
Asafo no mmx 'se
Hwee ntumi nsi wxn kwan;
Nea qkyqn so, koma
Nso yq n'afa mu de:
Ma wiase nnipa nyinaa nto dwom sq:
Me Nyame Hen'!
songTWI:
Let all the world in every corner sing
My God and King!
The heavens are not too high,
His praise may thither fly,
The earth is not too low,
His praises there may grow.
Let all the world in every corner sing,
My God and King!

Let all the world in every corner sing,
My God and King!
The church with psalms must shout,
no door can keep them out;
But, above all,
The heart must bear the longest part.
Let all the world in every corner sing,
My God and King!

title:
Kristofo Mmom' Nto Dwom
Come, Christians, Join to Sing
songEN:
Kristofo mmom' nto dwom, Haleluya, Amen!
Ayeyi nka Kristo; Haleluya, Amen!
Ma koma ne nne ny'naa
Nni dqw N'agua anim;
Ayeyi na Xpq, Haleluya, Amen!

Momma mo koma so, Haleluya, Amen!
Ma 'yeyi nhyq s'ro ma, Haleluya, Amen!
Yqn yxnko Kwanky'rqfo
Brq Ne hō ase ma yqn;
Ne dx to rentwa da, Haleluya, Amen!

Munyi Kristō ayq bio, Haleluya, Amen!
Nnyigyei no rensa ha, Haleluya, Amen!
S'ro 'somdwoe mpoano hx
Yqkamfo Ne yieyq;
Yqbqto dwom daa daa, Haleluya, Amen!
songTWI:
Come, Christians, join to sing, Alleluia! Amen!
Loud praise to Christ our King; Alleluia! Amen!
Let all, with heart and voice,
Before His throne rejoice;
Praise is His gracious choice: Alleluia! Amen!

Come, lift your hearts on high; Alleluia! Amen!
Let praises fill the sky; Alleluia! Amen!
He is our Guide and Friend;
To us He'll condescend;
His love shall never end: Alleluia! Amen!

Praise yet our Christ again; Alleluia! Amen!
Life shall not end the strain; Alleluia! Amen!
On heaven's blissful shore
His goodness we'll adore,
Singing forever more, Alleluia! Amen

title:
Kamfō Abraham Nyame
The God of Abraham Praise
songEN:
Kamfō Abraham Nyame,
Nea Odi hen' s'ro no;
Xyq Tetekwaframoa
ne Xdo Nyame;
Yehowa! Meara no!
Xs'ro ne 'sase ntie;
Mekoto hy'ra din kronkron no,
Nhy'ra nka No daa.

Kamfō Abraham Nyame,
Nea N'ahyqde mu no,
Mesxr' hwehwq 'niká a qwx
Ne nifa no,
Enti mepow wiase,
Nyansa, din ne tumi;
Xno ne me kyqfa,
me kyqm, M'abankqse.

Mo nkonim dxm nyinaa,
Monna s'ro Nyame ase;
Wxteam daa sq: Mo! Agyā,
Xba, Honhom Kronkron;
Mo ne s'ro bom to sq:
Mo! Abraham Nyame,
Tumi, kqseyq, ne nkamfo
Yq Wo de daa

title:
Yqde 'Hosqpq Kamfo Wo
Joyful, Joyful, We Adore Thee
songEN:
Yqde 'hosqpe kamfo Wo.
Anuonyam ne do Nyame;
Komam bue sq nhwiren W'anim,
Ma Wo so sq s'ro owia:
Nan bxn' ne w'rqhow mununkum,
Pam akyinnye sum fi hx;
Wo a Woma daa anigye,
Fa 'dekyee hann hyq yqn ma.

Wo nnwuma twa W' ho hyia 'nigyem;
'Sase ne s'ro yi W' hann ky'rq.
Ns'romma ne 'bxfo to dwom ky'rqW'
Ayeyi dwom a qnsa.
Mfuw ne kwae, bonhwa ne nkoko,
Nhwiren fqfq, po 's'rxkyc,
'Nomaa su ne 'subxnten sen,
Frq sq yenni dqw Wo mu.

Woma kwa de bxne nso kyq,
Woma nhy'ra daa, Hyirafo,
Xbra mu anigye nsuti,
Homč a 'mu dx sq po bun'!
Wo, Agya, ne Kristo yqn Nua-
Wxn a wxte dx mu wxW':
Ky'rq yqn sq yqbqdx yqn ho,
Ma yqn so kx s'ro dqw mu.
songTWI:
Joyful, joyful, we adore Thee,
God of glory, Lord of love;
Hearts unfold like flow'rs before Thee,
Hail Thee as the sun above.
Melt the clouds of sin and sadness,
Drive the dark of doubt away;
Giver of immortal gladness,
Fill us with the light of day!

All Thy works with joy surround Thee,
Earth and heav'n reflect Thy rays,
Stars and angels sing around Thee,
Center of unbroken praise;
Field and forest, vale and mountain,
Bloss'ming meadow, flashing sea,
Chanting bird and flowing fountain
Call us to rejoice in Thee.

Thou art giving and forgiving,
Ever blessing, ever blest,
Wellspring of the joy of living,
Oceandepth of happy rest!
Thou the father, Christ our Brother -
All who live in love are Thine:
Teach us how to love each other,
Lift us to the joy divine.

title:
Nnwom Foforo Na Monto
New Songs of Celebration Render
songEN:
Nnwom foforo na monto mma No,
Nea Wayq anwanwade no.
Xdx di hen' wx daa 'nuonyam mu:
Mommqkamfo Otumfo no.
Wama wxahu Ne nkwagne kqsqn',
N'adofo ny'naa di ho 'h'rusi:
Wayi Ne daa trenee no adi
Wx amanaman ny'naa anim.

Ah'rusi ne 'hosqpq kqsqm',
Ma sanku ne qnne biara
Nto dom a abu so ho 'yeyi,
Sq wiase ny'naa nni ah'rusi.
Momfa torobqnto ne sanku
Nto dwom mma xsoro nnyigye.
Asase ne po mu nneqma ny'naa
Monto dwom mma mo Hen' kqse n'.

Nsuten ne po a qreworo,
Monhyq Aw'rade anuonyam.
Mmepx ne mmotan nso monsxre,
Monto dwom nyi Ne din ayq.
Trenee, mudi ne 'nuonyam wx No,
Ayeyi bqyq Ne de daa.
Yqn Nyame tene, Nea Ne nokwar'
De wiase tim hx asomdwoe m'.
songTWI:
New songs of celebration render
To Him who has great wonders done.
Love sits enthroned in ageless splendor:
Come, and adore the mighty One.
He has made known His great salvation
Which all His friends with joy confess:
He has revealed to every nation
His everlasting righteousness.

Joy fully, heartily resounding,
Let every instrument and voice
Peal out the praise of grace abounding,
Calling the whole world to rejoice.
Trumpets and organs, set in motion
Such sounds as make the heavens ring;
All things that live in earth and ocean,
Make music for your mighty King.

Rivers and seas and torrents roaring,
Honor the Lord with wild acclaim;
Mountains and stones look up adoring,
And find a voice to praise His name.
Righteous, commanding, ever glorious,
Praises be His that never cease:
Just is our God, whose truth victorious
Establishes the world in peace.

title:
Momma Yqnkamfo 'W'rade Din
Let Us Praise the Name of the Lord
songEN:
Momma yqnkamfo 'W'rade din
monhyqN' 'nuonyam, Amen.

Monkx wiase 'fanan nyinaa
Haleluya, Amen.

Amen, amen.
Amen, amen.
songTWI:
Let us praise the name of the Lord!
Give Him glory, Amen.
Amen, amen, Amen, amen.

Go ye into all the world,
Aleluia, Amen.
Amen, amen, Amen, amen.

title:
Me Bxfo Ne Me Hen'
My Maker and My King
songEN:
Me Bxfo ne me Hen',
Nea mewx ny'naa fi Wo,
W'ayamye a enni kabea nom',
Na me nhyira ny'naa fi;
W'ayamye a enni kabea nom',
Na me nhyira ny'naa fi.

Wo nsā ano abxde,
Mete ase Wo mu;
Me Nyankopxn,
W'adxe dxxso Boro m'ayeyi so;
Me Nyankopxn,
W'adxe dxxso Boro m'ayeyi so.

Wura dqn na mqma,
B'rč a ade ny'naa yq W' de?
Wo dx no fata m'aseda,
Nanso qnsx ani;
Wo dx no fata m'aseda,
Nanso qnsx ani.

O fa s'ro ahoxden
Bra bqkanyan me kra;
Ma asqm ne xpq biara,
Me nna ny'naa nyq Wo de;
Ma asqm ne xpq biara,
Me nna ny'naa nyq Wo de.
songTWI:
My Maker and my King,
To Thee my all I owe;
Thy sovereign bounty is the spring
Whence all my blessings flow;
Thy sovereign bounty is the spring
Whence all my blessings flow.

The creature of Thy hand,
On Thee alone I live;
My God, Thy benefits demand
More praise than I can give.
My God, Thy benefits demand
More praise than I can give.

Lord, what can I impart
When all is Thine before?
Thy love demands a thankful heart;
The gift, alas! how poor.
Thy love demands a thankful heart;
The gift, alas! how poor.

O! let Thy grace inspire
My soul with strength divine;
Let every word each desire
And all my days be Thine.
Let every word each desire
And all my days be Thine.

title:
Mo Nnipa a Mote Wiase
All People That on Earth Do Dwell
songEN:
Mo nnipa a mote wiase,
Mommx ose mma Aw'rade;
Monsom No 'nigyem' nyi N'ayq,
Mummedi ah'rusi N'anim.

Aw'rade ne Nyame ampa;
Cbxx yqn b'rq a yen mmoa nnim.
Yqyq Ne nk'rxfo, Xyqn yqn;
Na Xfa yqn sq Ne nguammaa.

Momfa 'yeyi nhyqn' N'apon mu,
Momfa dqw mmra N'abangua so
Monkamfo, nhyira Ne din daa,
Efisq saa na qfata.

Senti a yqn Nyame ye ni:
N'ahummxb'rx tim hx daa daa;
Ne nokwar' tim hx mm're nvinaa m'
Na ebegyina nnasanten.

title:
Abxde Ne Soro Wura
Lord of All Being, Throned Afar
songEN:
Abxde ne soro Wura,
Owia yi W'anuonyam adi:
Wone abrabx nnyinaso,
Wobqn koma dxfo biara.


Yqn nkwa Awia, Wo nkwa hann no,
Hy'rqn ma egyigye yqn kwan so;
Yqn 'nidaso ns'romma, Wo hann
Kyekye yqn werq dasu mu.


W'anim hintaw a sum d'ru yqn,
Wo pue yq yqn owigyinae;
Nyankontxn, Wo dom sqnky'rqnne:
Ade nyinaa wx W', gye bxne!


Fam ne s'ro nkwa nyinaa Wura,
Wo hann yq nokware ne dx;
Wo hann ahengua no anim,
Yqnhwehwq yqn ankasa hann.


Fa Wo nokware no dom yqn,
Gye koma a qhwehwq Wo yi.
Na W'afxremuka nyinaa
Nyq kronkron sq ogyaframa.
songTWI:
Lord of all being, throned afar,
Thy glory flames from sun and star;
Center and soul of every sphere,
Yet to each loving heart how near!
Yet to each loving heart how near!

Sun of our life, Thy quickening ray
Sheds on our path the glow of day;
Star of our hope, Thy softened light
Cheers the long watches of the night,
Cheers the long watches of the night.

Our midnight is Thy smile withdrawn;
Our noontide is Thy gracious dawn;
Our rainbow arch, Thy mercy's sign;
All, save the clouds of sin, are Thine,
All, save the clouds of sin, are Thine.

Lord of all life, below, above,
Whose light is truth, whose warmth is love,
Before Thy ever blazing throne
We ask no luster of our own,
We ask no luster of our own.

Grant us Thy truth to make us free,
And kindling hearts that burn for Thee;
Till all Thy living altars claim
One holy light, one heavenly flame!
One holy light, one heavenly flame.

title:
O, 'Nxpa Ns'romma a Wohy'rqn
O Morning Star, How Fair and Bright
songEN:
O, 'nxpa ns'romma a Wohy'rqn
Wx Nyame nokwar' ne hann mu!
Wode mmxborxhun' hy'rqn!
Yakob aseni, Dawid Ba,
Yqn Awurade, Woaka yqn
Koma sq yqnsom Wō ara!
Xdwo, Kronkron! tumi 'nuonyam,
Nkonim wx Wo, Woma nhyira
Wo na tumi ny'naa wx Wo nsam.

W'ra, sq Wode dx hwq yqn a,
Ahotx fi Nyame anim s'ro
Sian ba yqn so ntqm ara.
W'Asqm, Honhom, honam, mogya,
De s'ro aduan dwudwo yqn kra.
Wone yqn agyapade!
W'ahummxbr'x mmqkanyan yqn;
O twi bqn yqn! Yqn ky'rqky'rqfo,
S'ro dx nam Wo sō aba yqn so.

Agya Tumfo, Wo Ba no mu
Wodxx yqn b're a 'sase yi,
Wonnya ntoo ne fapem no!
Wo Ba no de dx apxn yqn
Sq yqntra Ne mu ha ne s'ro:
'Yi ne Wo nkwagye kqse n'
Haleluya! Xteasefo
Kristo no ama yqn daa nkwa,
Na Xrenni yqn huammx da.

O ma nsanku mma wxn nne so!
Na dwom nkyerq yqn ah'rusi,
B'rč a yqn nne gyigye wom no,
'Fisq Kristo ka yqn ho daa,
Qnnq, xkyena, da biara!
Ne dx no to rentwa da.
Monto dwom den, ahosqpqm',
Ahurusi! Monka 'sqm no!
Anuonyam Hen' no yq kqse.
songTWI:
O Morning Star, how fair and bright!
You shine with God's own truth and light,
Aglow with grace and mercy!
Of Jacob's race, King David's Son,
Our Lord and Master, You have won
Our hearts to serve You only!Lowly, holy!
Great and glorious, all victorious,
Rich in blessing! Rule and might
O'er all possessing!

Lord, when You look on us in love,
At once there falls from God above
A ray of purest pleasure.
Your Word and Spirit, flesh and blood
Refresh our souls with heav'nly food.
You are our dearest treasure!
Let Your mercy Warm and cheer us!
O draw near us! For You teach us
God's own love through
You has reached us.

Almighty Father, in Your Son
You loved us, when not yet begun
Was this old earth's foundation!
Your Son has ransomed us in love
To live in Him here and above:
This is Your great salvation.
Alleluia! Christ the living, to us giving
Life forever, Keeps us Yours
and fails us never!

O let the harps break forth in sound!
Our joy be all with music crowned,
Our voices gaily blending!
For Christ goes with us all the way-
Today, tomorrow, every day!
His love is never ending!
Sing out! ring out! Jubilation! exultation!
Tell the story! Great is He,
the King of glory!

title:
Monto Dwom Fof'ro Mma
O Sing a New Song to the Lord
songEN:
Monto dwom fof'ro mma 'W'rade,
Na Wayq 'nwanwade;
Ne nifa ne basa kronkron
Adi nim ama No.

Momfa sanku ne dwonto nne
Nto dwom mma Yehowa;
Momfa t'robqnto ne mmqnta
Nkamfo yqn Hen' 'W'rade.

Ma po ne ne mayq nworo,
Wiase ne 'mutefo;
Ma nsu akqse mmx wxn nsam
Mmepx mmom' nni 'h'rusi.

Monhwq 'W'radč anim:
Xreba Abebu wiasč atqn;
Obebu wiasč atqntrenee
Ne man pqpqyq mu.
songTWI:
O sing a new song to the Lord
For marvels He has done;
His right hand and His holy arm
The victory have won.

With harp, and voice of psalms
Unto Jehovah sing;
Let trumpets and the echoing horn
Acclaim the Lord our King!

Let seas with all their creatures roar,
The world and dwellers there,
And let the rivers clap their hands,
The hills their joy declare.

Before the Lord: because He comes,
To judge the earth come He;
He'll judge the world
with righteousness,
His folk with equity.

title:
Munyi 'W'radè Ayq!
O Praise Ye The Lord!
songEN:
Munyi 'W'radè ayq! Munyi N'ayq s'ro,
Mommx 'se N'asqm mu hann abxfo;
Mo s'rofo, monkamfo Nea Xbxx mo no
Na monsom wx N'anim, Hann ahoxfq mu.

Munyi 'W'radè ayq! Yi N'ayq fam ha,
Wx nne dqdq mu: Mò awo fof'ro mma
Nea Xde dom fi s'ro n', Munyi No ayq;
Nea munim Ne dx no, Munyi No ayq.

Munyi 'W'radè ayq! Nea 'gyigye nyinaa,
Sankuhan biara, mma ne nnyigyei so;
Sanku a ano yq den, Nkyerq N'anuonyam,
Na sankuten nso nka Nea Wayq nkyerq.

Munyi 'W'radè ayq! Aseda ne dwom
Na momfa mma No, Nnasanten nyinaa,
Ne dx wx adexm', Ne s'ro kyqde nti.
N-kwagye dom no nti, Munyi 'W'radè ayq.

title:
Nyame K'ro a Womporx Na Wonhu Wo Yesu Medx Wo, Minim Sq Wowx Me
Immortal, Invisible, God Only Wise
songTWI:
Immortal, invisible, God only wise,
In light inaccessible hid from our eyes,
Most blessed, most glorious, the Ancient of Days,
Almighty, victorious, Thy great Name we praise.

Unresting, unhasting, and silent as light,
Nor wanting, nor wasting, Thou rulest in might;
Thy justice, like mountains, high soaring above
Thy clouds, which are fountains of goodness and love.

To all, life Thou givest, to both great and small;
In all life Thou livest, the true life of all;
We blossom and flourish as leaves on the tree,
And wither and perish - but naught changeth Thee.

Great Father of glory, pure Father of light,
Thine angels adore Thee, all veiling their sight;
All praise we would render; O help us to see
'Tis only the splendor of light hideth Thee!

title:
Nyame Ne Yqm Dwom
God Our Song
songEN:
Nyame ne yqn dwom, na obiara a
Oyi N'ayq nya 'hoxden ne home.
Wxn a wxde dqw yi Nyame ayq;
San de nyansa a yqhwere ma yqn,
San de nyansa a yqhwere ma yqn.

Nyame ne yqn dwom, Yesu bqgye yqn:
Yqde yqn ho ma Wo, yqn nkamfo mu.
Yqn nyinaa ka bom, to dwom foforo.
Yesu di y'anim kx s'ro hann no mu,
Yesu di y'anim kx s'ro hann no mu.

'Yi ne dwom a 'haw bi ntumi nhyq so,
Nyame ayeyifo pow abufuw;
Xdx ne ehu dwom sononko a,
Nyame de siesie asase hunu,
Nyame de siesie asase hunu.

Nyame ne yqn kommyq b'rč a yqnto dwom;
Aw'rqhow ma yentumi nto dwom a,
Yqde gyidi yq setie kommyq mu,
Kosi sq yqn 'yeyi nne bqsxr' bio,
Kosi sq yqn 'yeyi nne bqsxr' bio.
songTWI:
God is our Song, and every singer blest
Who praising Him finds energy and rest.
All who praise God with unaffected joy
Give back to us the wisdom we destroy,
Give back to us the wisdom we destroy.

God is our Song, for Jesus comes to save;
While praising Him we offer all we have.
New songs we sing, in ventures new unite,
When Jesus leads us upward into light,
When Jesus leads us upward into light.

This is the Song no conflict ever drowns;
Who praises God our human wrath disowns.
Love knows what rich complexities of sound
God builds upon a simple common ground,
God builds upon a simple common ground.

God is our Silence when no songs are sung,
When ecstasy or sorrow stills the tongue.
Glorious the faith which silently obeys
Until we find again the voice of praise,
Until we find again the voice of praise.

title:
Ahurusi Dxn Rewosow
Now the Joyful Bells A-Ringing
songEN:
Ahurusi dxn rewosow,
Mo mmepx nyi 'W'radč ayq!
Yqn koma sxre sq nnomaa,
Mo mmepx nyi 'W'radč ayq!
Yqn ahurusi bere no
Twe adxfo nyinaa ba;
Yqde yqn nne dqdq to dwom:
Mo mmepx nyi Wradč ayq!

Yqn fi yq dq sen' baabiara;
Nea mmepx yi 'W'radč ayq!
Na yqn dadwen ny'naa tu yera,
Nea mmepx yi 'W'radč ayq!
Yenim sq Kristo yqn Nua no
De hama kyeky're yqn bom;
Ne na Maria na xwoo No,
Nea mmepx yi 'W'radč ayq!

Afč aso, yqn ntade fitaa,
Mo mmepx nyi 'W'radč ayq!
Yqde asomdwoe kyea yqn ho,
Mo mmepx nyi 'W'radč ayq!
Yen ny'naa kyq Onyame yieyq;
Yedidi gyae akodi,
Yen bukyia ny'naa ma 'sqky'rqnne,
Mo mmepx nyi 'W'radč ayq!
songTWI:
Now the joyful bells a-ringing,
All ye mountains, praise the Lord!
Lift our hearts like birds a winging,
All ye mountains, praise the Lord!
Now our festal season bringing
Kinsmen all to bide and board,
Sets our cheery voices singing:
All ye mountains, praise the Lord!

Dear our Index as dear none other;
Where the mountains praise the Lord!
Gladly here our care we smother;
Where the mountains praise the Lord!
Here we know that Christ our brother
Binds us all as by a cord:
He was born of Mary mother
Where the mountains praise the Lord!

Cold the year, new whiteness wearing,
All ye mountains, praise the Lord!
Peace, good will to us abearing,
All ye mountains praise the Lord!
Now we all God's goodness sharing
Break the bread and sheath the sword:
Bright our hearts the signal flaring,
All ye mountains, praise the Lord!

title:
Nsoromma Biara Bqto Dwom
Every Star Shall Sing a Carol
songEN:
Nsoromma biara bqto dwom;
'Bxde 'kqse ne nkumaa;
Mommra mmqkamfo s'ro Hen' no,
Wx din biarā a minim mu.

Nnyeso
S'ro Nyame, fam Nipa;
Kronkron ne din a minim.

B're a 'bxde nyinaa Hen' no,
Wxwoo No 'sase so no,
Na nipadua no yq kronkron,
Na awo no yq kronkron.

Nsoromma ahorow nyinaa,
'Bxde 'kqse ne nkumaa;
Mommra mmqkamfo s'ro Hen' no,
Wx din biarā a munim mu.
songTWI:
Every star shall sing a carol;
Every creatures, high or low,
Come and praise the King of heaven
By whatever name you know.

Refrain
God above, Man below,
Holy is the name I know.

When the King of all creation
Had a cradle on the earth,
Holy was the human body,
Holy was the human birth.

Every star and every planet,
Every creature, high or low,
Come and praise the King of heaven
By whatever name you know.

title:
Munyi Aw'rade Ayq
Praise the Lord, His Glories Show
songEN:
Munyi Aw'rade ayq, Haleluya!
'Hotefō a mowx fam ha, Haleluya!
S'ro 'hengua ho abxfo, Haleluya!
Wxn a wonim Ne dx no, Haleluya!

S'ro ne asase nka mmom', Haleluya!
Wxnka N'anwanwade nky'rq, Haleluya!
Mm're nyinaa ne mmaa nyinaa, Haleluya!
Munyi No ayq daa daa, Haleluya!

Munyi N'ayq mpq Ne dom, Haleluya!
Monkamfo Ne dom nhyehyqe, Haleluya!
Nea Wayq ama nnipa, Haleluya!
Nea Xnam Ne Ba so ma, Haleluya!
songTWI:
Praise the Lord, His glories show, Alleluia!
Saints within His courts below, Alleluia!
Angels 'round His throne above, Alleluia!
All that see and share His love, Alleluia!

Earth to heaven and heaven to earth, Alleluia!
Tell His wonders, sing His worth, Alleluia!
Age to age and shore to shore, Alleluia!
Praise Him, praise Him evermore! Alleluia!

Praise the Lord, His mercies trace, Alleluia!
Praise His providence and grace, Alleluia!
All that He for man hath done, Alleluia!
All He sends us through His Son. Alleluia!

title:
Monkamfo Aw'rade, S'rofo
Praise the Lord, You Heavens, Adore Him

Mo a Mo Komam Tew
Rejoice Ye Pure In Heart
songEN:
Mo a mo komam tew,
Munni dqw, monto dwom,
Momma frankaa no so wx wim,
Kristo asqnnua no.

Nnyeso
Di dqw! Di dqw!
Momfa nnaase nto dwom!

Momma mo nne so den
Sq po 's'rxkye 'yeyi,
Monto dwom a efi tete,
Tete mm're mu nnwom no.

S'ro 'bxfo nnwontofo,
'Sase so 'hotefo,
Momfa dqw nto ah'rusi dwom
Nokwar' 'hosqpq mu.

Xbra kwantu yi mu,
Monkx so nto dwom daa;
Mmofra, mpanyin, awia, 'nadwo,
'Nigye ne mmusu mu.

Munyi s'ro Hen' ayq,
W'ra a yqsom No no;
Agya, Xba, Honhom Kronkron,
Nyame teasefo no.
songTWI:
Rejoice ye pure in heart!
Rejoice, give thanks, and sing;
Your festal banner wave on high,
The cross of Christ your King.

Refrain
Rejoice, rejoice, rejoice,
Give thanks and sing.

With voice as full and strong
As ocean's surging praise,
Send forth the sturdy hymns of old,
The psalms of ancient days.

With all the angel choirs,
With all the saints of earth,
Pour out the strains of joy and bliss,
True rapture, noblest mirth.

Yes, on through life's long path,
Still chanting as ye go;
From youth to age, by night and day,
In gladness and in woe.

Praise Him who reigns on high,
The Lord whom we adore,
The Father, Son and Holy Ghost,
One God forever more.

title:
Momma Yenyi Aw'rade Ayq
Praise We the Lord

Monto 'Yeyi Dwom Mma
Sing Praise to God
songEN:
Monto 'yeyi dwom mma s'ro hen',
Abxde ny'naa Nyame no,
Nyame Tumfo, xdx Nyame,
Yqn nkwagye Nyankopxn no;
Xma me kra ayaresa,
Na Odum akyinnye biara;
Ayeyi ny'naa nka Nyame!

Nea Nyame tumi ayq no,
N'ahummxb'rx bx ho ban;
Anxpab're anaa 'nwumm're
Xntx' nko na Xnna da;
Ne tumi ahemman no mu,
B'ribiara tene nā qyq pq:
Ayeyi ny'naa nka Nyame!

Awurade nni aky'riky'ri;
Yqn awerqhow ny'naa mu,
Xne yqn mprempren Boafo pa,
Yqn asomdwoe ne nhyira.
Sqnea 'baatan yq ne mma no,
Xhwq kuw a Wapaw wxn no;
Ayeyi ny'naa nka Nyame.

Afei m'anigye kwan mu no,
Mqto Wo ayeyi nnwom
Na nnipa ate nnaase a
Mede me nne rema W' yi;
Me koma bx 'se 'W'rade mu,
Me kra ne nipadua no ny'naa!
Ayeyi ny'naa nka Nyame!
songTWI:
Sing praise to God who reigns above,
the God of all creation,
the God of power, the God of love,
the God of our salvation.
With healing balm my soul He fills,
and every faithless murmur stills;
To God all praise and glory!

What God's almighty power hath made
His gracious mercy keepeth;
By morning glow or evening shade,
His watchful eye ne'er sleepeth,
Within the kingdom of his might,
Lo! all is just, and all is right:
To God all praise and glory!

The Lord is never far away,
throughout all grief distressing,
an ever present help and stay,
our peace and joy and blessing.
As with a mother's tender hand,
He leads His own, His chosen band:
To God all praise and glory!

Then all my gladsome way along,
I sing aloud thy praises,
that men may hear the grateful song
my voice unwearied raises:
Be joyful in the Lord, my heart!
both soul and body bear your part!
To God all praise and glory.

title:
Nyame Kronkron, Yqkamfo W'
Holy God, We Praise Your Name
songEN:
Nyame Kronkron, yqkamfo W',
Ade ny'naa Wura, yqkoto W'!
Fam hafo ny'naa hyq W'ase,
Na xsorofo ny'naa Kamfo W';
W'ahennim' trqw nni kabea,
Wudi hen' kosi daapem.

Muntie s'ro dwom dennen a
Abxfo nnwontofo reto;
Kerubim ne Serafim,
Wxreto ayeyi dwom daa;
Wxn nne dqdq hyq s'ro ma:
Kronkron, Kronkron, Kronkron, W'ra.

Agya Kronkron, 'Ba Kronkron,
Honhom Kronkron, yqbx Mo din,
Mo ny'naa ka bom yq baako,
Nyame K'ro a ntetewm' nni W' mu,
Yebu nkotodwe kamfo W',
B'rč a yekųra hintasqm nom'.
songTWI:
Holy God, we praise Your name;
Lord of all, we bow before You!
All on earth Your scepter claim,
All in heaven above adore You;
Infinite Your vast domain.
Everlasting is Your reign.

Hark! the loud celestial hymn
Angel choirs above are raising,
Cherubim and seraphim,
In unceasing chorus praising;
Fill the heavens with sweet accord:
Holy, holy, holy, Lord.

Holy Father, Holy Son,
Holy Spirit, three we name You;
While in essence only one,
Undivided God we claim You;
And adoring bend the knee,
While we own the mystery.

title:
Me Kra, Kamfo Aw'rade Kqseyq
Tell Out, My Soul

Me Kra, Kamfo Aw'rade Kqseyq
Tell Out, My Soul

Monto Dwom Fof'ro Mma No
Sing a New Songs to the Lord
songEN:
Monto dwom fof'ro mma No,
Anwanwade ny'naa fi No,
Munni Ne nkonim mu
'H'rusi nky'rq Ne tum'.
Monto dwom fof'ro mma 'W'rade.

Ne nkwagye ada adi
Kosi asase ano.
Xda so kae N'adxe Ne ne nokware;
Ne mma ho dx no nsakra da.

Monto dwom fof'ro mmx 'se,
Munyi N'ayq aman mu.
Ma dwonto nne, abqn, Ne torobqnto
Mmx 'se Aw'rade 'nigye mu

Mo ne mmepx ne po mmom'
Nto ayeyi dwom dennen,
Xde atqntrenee Reba 'sase so,
Monto dwom fof'ro mma 'W'rade.
songTWI:
Sing a new song to the Lord,
He to whom wonders belong.
Rejoice in His triumph and tell of His power.
O sing a new song to the Lord.

Now to the ends of the earth
See His salvation is shown.
And still He remembers His mercy and truth,
Unchanging in love to His own.

Sing a new song and rejoice.
Publish His praises abroad.
Let voices in chorus with trumpet and horn,
Resound for the joy of the Lord.

Join with the hills and the sea,
Thunders of praise to prolong.
In judgment and justice
He comes to the earth.
O sing a new song to the Lord.

title:
Nyan Dwom No
Wake the Song
songEN:
Nyan anika ne 'nigye dwom;
Fa wo nnwom mu dwom bra ha;
To aw'rqhow dadwen ny'naa gu,
Na da w'ayeyi adi.
To dwom kyerq Nea Ne banbx
De yqn ahyiam sq nnamfo,
Na Ne nne dqdq no ky'rq yqn
Kwan kx Kristo nan ase.

Nnyeso
Nyan dwom no, nyan dwom no,
Anika ne 'nigye dwom;
Nyan dwom no, nyan dwom no,
Afenhyia da dwom no.

'Nigyem' yqde nnwom ne frankaa
Behyia ah'rusi da no;
Yqbqteam ato hosana,
Na yqde nnaase asom.
Yqbqka yqn Gyefo n' 'nuonyam,
B're a yqdwen soro ho
Na yqka 'tete asqm no',
Asqnkunin - nkwagye dx!

Yqda W'ase, Agya Kronkron,
Afe no mu adxe nti;
B'rč a yqahyia yi, ma koma ny'naa
Mfa 'seda mi ah'rusi.
Yqda W'ase, 'Gyenkwa Dxfo,
Wo mogyā a agye yqn nti,
Honhom Kronkron, hom gu yqn so,
Ka yqn brqoo kx Nyame nkyqn.
songTWI:
Wake the song of joy and gladness;
Hither bring your noblest lays;
Bannish every thought of sadness,
Pouring forth your highest praise.
Sing to Him whose care has brought us
Once again with friends to meet,
And whose loving voice has taught us
Of the way to Jesus' feet.


Refrain
Wake the song, wake the song,
The song of joy and gladness,
Wake the song, wake the song,
The song of Jubilee.

Joyfully with songs and banners,
We will greet the festal day;
Shout aloud our glad hosannas,
And our grateful homage pay.
We will chant our Savior's glory
while our thoughts we raise above,
Telling still the old, old, story,
Precious theme- redeeming love!


Thanks to Thee, O holy Father,
For the mercies of the years;
May each heart, as here we gather,
Swell with gratitude sincere.
Thanks to Thee, O loving Savoir,
For redemption through Thy blood
Breathe upon us, Holy Spiritt,
Sweetly draw us near to God.

title:
Momfa Dwonto Ne Anuonyam
With Songs and Honors
songEN:
Momfa dwonto ne anuonyam
Mma s'ro Aw'rade no;
Xtrqw Ne mununkum mu s'ro,
Na nsu kata ewim.

Xtx Ne nhy'ra bosu gu fam,
De dwudwo asase;
Xma wura fu mmepx so,
Ma 'burow nyin bonhwam'.

N'agyina mu na nsakrae ba
Afe no 'kwantu mu.
Xhyq owia ma no hintaw,
Ma awxbere ba.

Xma N'asqm nan suky'rqma;
Qma mfude yq frxmm;
Xma mframa a 'mu yq hyqw
Bx ma 'susow nsu sen.

Mframa ne mununkum nyinaa
Yq setie ma N'asqm:
Momfa dwonto ne anuonyam
Nkamfo 'W'rade Tumfo.
songTWI:
With songs and honors sounding loud,
Address the Lord on high;
Over the heavens He spreads His cloud,
And waters veil the sky.

He sends His showers of blessing down
To cheer the plains below;
He makes the grass the mountains crown,
And corning valleys grow.

His steady counsels change the face
Of the declining year;
He bids the sun cut short his race,
And wintry days appear.

He sends His word, and melts the snow;
The fields no longer mourn;
He calls the warmer gales to blow,
And bids the spring return.

The changing wind, the flying cloud,
Obey His mighty word:
With songs and honors sounding loud
Praise ye the sovereign Lord!

title:
O Wo a Me Kra Ho Sqpq No
O Thou In Whose Presence
songEN:
O Wo a me kra ho sqpq no W'anim,
Wo a meba Wo nkyqn 'hohiam,
M'adekyee mu w'rqkyekye ne 'nadwo dwom,
M'anidaso ne me nkwagye.

Ne nne a qyq dq sq dxn nnyigyei no,
Wxte wx 'wu sunsuma mu;
Lebanon twenn'ro koto Ne nan ase,
Ne home ma mframam' yq huam.

Trenee fi N'anofafam' sen sq nsuti,
De gugu xdom nturo so;
'Hx na amanaman behu wxn nkwagye,
Na N'anim s'rew ahy'rqn wxn so.

Xhwq, na 'bxfo mpempem di ah'rusi,
Na dxm kuhaa twqn tie N'asqm.
Xkasa, na Ne nne kanyan daa dwonto,
Nea wxde kamfo Aw'rade.
songTWI:
O Thou in whose presence my soul takes delight,
On whom in affliction I call,
My comfort by day and my song in the night,
My hope, my salvation, my all!

His voice, as the sound of the dulcimer sweet,
Is heard through the shadows of death;
The cedars of Lebanon bow at His feet,
The air is perfumed with His breath.

His lips, as a fountain of righteousness flow,
To water the gardens of grace;
From which their salvation the Gentiles shall know,
And bask in the smiles of His face.

He looks, and ten thousands of angels rejoice,
And myriads wait for His word;
He speaks, and eternity, filled with His voice,
Reechoes the praise of the Lord.

title:
Me Kra Kamfo Wo Yqfo No
O Sing My Soul, Your Maker's Praise
songEN:
Me kra kamfo wo Yqfo no
Nnwom a qf'ro kx s'ro mu;
Nea Ne dx de s'ro akyqde
Ahyq wo nna ny'naa ma no.
Mehwehwqq No, Otiee me su;
N'abxfo kronkron bx nsraban
Wxn a wxdx No no ho.

Awurade yq ma wxn a
Wxhwehwq No 'w'rqhowb'rem';
Xkyekye mmxb'rxfo werq.
Ma yqn da biara mu 'dom.
'W'rqhow tra hx 'nadwo ny'naa a
'Dekyee bepue dqw ne hann mu
De nhy'ra fi N'anim aba.

Xbqdan N'ani brqoo aky'rq
'Manehunfō a wxbqn No;
Ne dx 'yamye to rentwa mma
Wxn a wxtwer' No sųro No.
Yqn Nyankopxn rennyaw Ne de;
Ne s'ro agua no tim hx daa;
N'ahenni begyina daa.
songTWI:
O sing my soul, your Maker's praise
In grateful hymns ascending;
Whose steadfast love has crowned your days
With heav'nly gifts un ending.
I sought the Lord, He heard my cry;
His holy angels hover nigh
The tents of those who love Him.

The Lord is good to those who seek
His face in time of sorrow,
Providing comfort to the weak
And grace for each tomorrow.
Though grief may tarry for a night,
The morn shall break in joy and light
With blessings from His presence.

The Lord will turn His face in peace
When troubled souls draw near Him;
His loving kindness shall not cease
To those who trust and fear Him.
Our God will not forsake His own;
Eternal is His heav'nly throne;
His kingdom stands forever.

title:
Sxre, Me Kra Sxre!
Arise, My Soul, Arise!
songEN:
Sxre, me kra sxre!
Twe w' mu kx s'ro nneqma ho,
Na yq ntqm kx wo Gyefo Nyame nan ase;
'Nipá ani nhu No de,
Xte hann nwanwaso mu.
Monsom No 'hobrqasem'
Na momfre No Wura.
Ne dx apontow retwqn mo s'ro hx;
Xma yqte saa apontow no nka fam ha!
Di dqw, me kra, di dqw,
Ma wo nne so kx s'ro:
Haleluya, haleluya, haleluya!

Afei tie s'ro nsanku!
O, tie nkonimdi dwom no,
Dwom a wonwie to da a egyigye wx wim!
Wxmfa mmaa nnipa sq
Wxnto 'nuonyam dwom sei bi;
Nso yqbetum' ato y'ayeyi dwom fam ha!
Ne mogya txx yqn, Nyame aponfo;
Xno na daa tumi ne nkonim yq Ne de.
Momma Amen kqse n'
Nnyigye wx soro bio:
Haleluya, haleluya, haleluya!
songTWI:
Arise, my soul, arise! Stretch
forth to things eternal
And hasten to the feet of your Redeemer God.
Though hid from mortal eyes,
He dwells in light supernal;
Yet worship Him in humbleness and call Him Lord.
His banquet of love Awaits you above;
Yet here He grants a foretaste of the feast to
the feast to come! Rejoice, my soul, rejoice,
To heav'n lift up your voice:
Alleluia, alleluia, alleluia!


Now hear the harps of heav'n!
Oh, hear the song victorious,
The neverending anthem sounding through the sky!
To mortals is not giv'n To join in strains so glorious;
Yet here on earth we too can sing our praises high!
He bought with His blood The ransomed of God;
To Him be ever lasting pow'r and victory.
And let the great amenResound through heav'n again.
Alleluia, alleluia, alleluia!

title:
Aw'rade, Wobqte Me Nne
Lord, in the Morning
songEN:
Aw'rade, Wobqte me nne
Anxpa nnwonto mu;
Na mqbx mpae akyerq Wo,
Wo na mehwq W'anim.

Xsoro hx, nea Kristo kx
Kodi ma 'hotefo;
Na Xde yqn nnwom ne nsqm gu
N'Agya 'hengua anim.

O, ma Wo Honhom nni m'anim
Wx trenee akwan so;
Ma 'sqde kwan biara ntene
Nyq petee wx m'anim.

Wxn a wxdx Wo, sųro Wo din
Behu wxn apqde;
Onyame Tweaduampxn de dom
Bqyq kyqm ama wxn.
songTWI:
Lord, in the morning Thou shalt hear
My voice ascending high;
To Thee will I direct my prayer,
To Thee lift up mine eye-

Up to the hills where Christ is gone
To plead for all His saints,
Presenting at His Father's throne
Our songs and our complaints.

O may Thy Spirit guide my feet
In ways of righteousness;
Make every path of duty straight
And plain before my face.

The men that love and fear Thy name
Shall see their hopes fulfilled;
The mighty God will compass them
With favor as a shield.

title:
Nyame Indexda Pa No
The Dawn of God's Dear Sabbath
songEN:
Nyame Homeda pa no
Aba 'sase so bio,
Te sq 'huhub'rem' 'nxpa,
B'rč a 'nadwo yaw atwam;
Qba sq bosu nwinnwin
'Fx 'sase kesee bi;
Te sq mmqkuw nwini wx
Anweatam hunu so.

W'ra yqn 'fxrebxde ni,
Ewom 'ho wx fi de,
Nnwxtwe mu dwumaden,
Ne mu nokwaredi,
Ahopakyi 'duaba pa
Ne 'dx amapa a
Wo Honhom asiesie a
Yqde ma W' 'hobrqasem'.

Yqde yqn bxne adwen,
Ne nneyqe adesoa,
Bqba 'bqkoto W'anim,
Ahwehwq 'hofadi.
Yqn komam' 'w'rqhow kqse
Ne W'adwumā a yqanyq-
Talqnte pii a yqasqe!
Nkonim ket'wá a yedii.

Saa 'werqhow yi mu no,
Yqde gyidi mapa,
Ne xdx a emu dx
Ba sq Wobqtew ho,
Na ama yqanya
W'anim Fafiri a yehia
Ne daapem asomdwoe ampa.
songTWI:
The dawn of God's dear Sabbath
Breaks o'er the earth again,
As some sweet summer morning
After a night of pain;
It comes as cooling showers
To some exhausted land,
As shade of clustered palm trees
'Mid weary wastes of sand.

Lord, we would bring for offering,
Though marred with earthly soil,
A week of earnest labor,
Of steady, faithful toil,
Fair fruits of self denial,
Of strong, deep love to Thee,
Fostered by Thine own Spirit,
In true humility.

And we would bring our burden
Of sinful thought and deed,
In Thy pure presence kneeling,
From bondage to be freed,
Our heart's most bitter sorrow
For all Thy work undone-
So many talents wasted!
So few bright laurels won!

And with that sorrow mingling,
A steadfast faith, and sure,
And love so deep and fervent,
For Thee to make it pure,
In Thy dear presence finding
The pardon that we need,
And then the peace so lasting-
Celestial peace indeed.

title:
Nyankopxn Anuonyam H'ran a
O Splendor Of God's Glory Bright
songEN:
Nyankopxn anuonyam h'ran a,
Qde hann fi daa hann mu ba;
Nkwa Hann, nsuti a qtč ase,
Da pá a qde hann ma naa ny'naa.

O, nokwar' 'Wia, W'animtew
Mmra yqn so 'dehyedi hann mu;
Honhom no hann a qtew ho,
Hy'rqn yqn fam ha adwen no mu.

'Nigye da a qresen no
Ma 'dwenemtew sq 'nxpawi,
Gyidi te sq 'wigyinae hann,
B'rč a 'nadwo sum nhyq yqn kra so.

'Nxpa 'nuonyam hy'rqn fam ne wim;
Momma 'Nxpa kronn no nsxre;
Agya no mma hwehwq Ne mmoa
To N'anuonyam din no ho dwom.
Amen.
songTWI:
O splendor of God's glory bright,
From light eternal bringing light;
O Light of life, light's living spring,
True day, all days illumining.

O Thou true Sun, on us Thy glance
Let fall in royal radiance;
The Spirit's sanctifying beam
Upon our earthly senses stream.

O joyful be the passing day
With thoughts as clear as morning's ray,
With faith like noontide shining bright,
Our souls unshadowed by the night.

Dawn's glory gilds the earth and skies;
Let Him, our perfect morn, arise;
The Father's help His children claim,
And sing the Father's glorious name. Amen.

title:
B're a 'Dekyee Hann Hy'rqn Wim Yi
Now That the Daylight Fill the Sky
songEN:
B're a 'dekyee hann hy'rqn wim yi,
Yqma yqn koma so ma No,
Sq yqn nneyqe biara mu no,
Onyi yqn mfi mmusu mu nnq.

Xmmx yqn tqkrqma ho ban;
Onyi yqn nkwa mfi abufuwm'
Xmmma yqnnhwq adebxne,
Na Xmmma yenntie 'huhude.

Sq saa da foforo yi twam,
Na anadwo beduru a,
B'rč a nkekae bi nni yqn mu no
Yqayi N'ayq, yqn nkonim ho.

Ayeyi nka Wo, Xbxadeq!
Ayeyi nka Wo, daa Asqm!
Ayeyi nka Wo, Honhom pa!
Yqto dwom b'rč a hann wx hx yi.
songTWI:
Now that the daylight fills the sky,
We lift our hearts to God on high,
That He, in all we do or say,
Would keep us free from harm today;

Would guard our hearts and tongues from strife;
From anger's din would shield our life;
From evil sights would turn our eyes,
And close our ears to vanities;

So we, when this new day is gone
And night in turn is drawing on,
With conscience by the world unstained
Shall praise His name for vict'ry gained.

All praise to You, creator Lord!
All praise to You, eternal Word!
All praise to You, O Spirit wise!
We sing as daylight fills the skies.

title:
Sq Anim Rebuebue
When Morning Gilds the Skies
songEN:
Sq anim rebuebue,
Na me koma nyan a,
'Ayeyi nka Yesu!'
Adwumam' ne mpaebxm'
Mitwi bqn me Yesu:
'Ayeyi nka Yesu!'

Sq asxre dxn bx
Gyigye mmepx mu a.
'Ayeyi nka Yesu!'
O muntie ne dwom no-
Qwoso xdqw mu:
'Ayeyi nka Yesu! '

'Nadwo dane 'dekyee,
Yefi komam ka sq:
'Avevi nka Yesu!'
Sum mu 'tumfo suro,
Sq wxte saa dwom yi:
'Ayeyi nka Yesu!'

Mo aman'man nyinaa
'Ayeyi nka Yesu!'
Munhu mo nkabom ha:
Ma asase nyinaa,
Mfa 'h'rusi nto dwom no:
'Ayeyi nka Yesu!'

S'ro daa 'nigye mu no,
Eyi ne dwom pa no
'Ayeyi nka Yesu!'
'Sase ne po ne wim
Nnye so mfi fam nkx s'ro:
'Ayeyi nka Yesu!'

N-kwa yq me de yi,
Me soro dwom ne sq
'Ayeyi nka Yesu!'
Ma saa daapem dwom yi,
Nnyigye nnasanten mu;
'Ayeyi nka Yesu!'
songTWI:
When morning gilds the skies
my heart awaking cries,
May Jesus Christ be praised!
Alike at work and prayer,
to Jesus I repair:
May Jesus Christ be praised!

Whene'er the sweet church bell
peals over hill and dell,
May Jesus Christ praised!
O hark to what it sings,
as joyously it rings,
May Jesus Christ be praised!

The night becomes as day
when from the heart we say:
May Jesus Christ be praised!
The powers of darkness fear
when this sweet chant they hear:
May Jesus Christ be praised!

Ye nations of mankind,
in this your concord find,
May Jesus Christ praised!
Let all the earth around
ring joyous with the sound,
May Jesus Christ praised!

In heaven's eternal bliss
the loveliest strain is this,
May Jesus Christ praised!
Let earth, and sea and sky
from depth to height reply,
May Jesus Christ praised!

title:
Adekyee Aba
Morning Has Broken
songEN:
Adekyee aba, sqnea 'dii kan no,
Anomaa asu, sq kan de no.
Yqto ayeyi, dwonto ne 'dekyee,
Ne Asqm no a efim' bae nti.

'Sutx fof'ro a efi s'ro yq fq,
Te sq bosu a edii kan no.
Yqto ayeyi, mfuw a afx nō a
Qde mudi pue fi neá Otiae no.

'Wia hann no wx me! 'Dekyee no wx me;
Ne ny'naa fi hann a Eden hui no!
Yqto ayeyi anxpa biara,
Da foforo a Nyame abx nti.
songTWI:
Morning has broken like the first morning,
Blackbird has spoken like the first bird.
Praise for the singing! Praise for the morning!
Praise for them springing fresh from the Word!

Sweet the rain's new fall sunlit from heaven,
Like the first dew fall on the first grass.
Praise for the sweetness of the wet garden,
Sprung in completeness where His feet pass.

Mine is the sunlight! Mine is the morning
Born of the one light Eden saw play!
Praise with elation, Praise every morning,
God's recreation of the new day!

title:
Bue W'apon Fqfq No Seesei
Open Now Thy Gates of Beauty
songEN:
Bue w'apon fqfq no seesei,
Si-on, ma menhyqn' mu hx,
Nea me kra fi anigye mu
Twqn mpaebx tiefo Nyame.
O, sqnea wxahyira ha,
'Somdwoe, hann ne dom wx ha!

Domfo Nyame meba W'anim,
Wo nso sian bra me nkyqn ha;
Faakō a yehu Wo, som Wo no,
Yqte soro nka wx hx.
Bra bqtra me koma mu,
Ma qnyq Wo fie seesei.

Woyi W'ayq 'nigyem wx ha,
Wogu W'aba no wx ha;
Ma faakō a wxatim me kra no
Qnso abapa nkutoo.
Na nea mete biara no,
Aso nkwa aba me mu.

Nyan me gyidi yq no kqse
Ma menkōra Wo s'ro 'kyqden';
Sq sxhwq ky're me so dqn a,
Ma W'asqm no nhy'rqn me so,
Sq me ns'romma kwanky'rqfo,
Ne haw mu w'rqkyekyefo.

'W'ra kasa, na mqte Wo nne;
Ma Wo pq nyq hx ampa;
Na ma mintwiw mmqn Wo koraa
B're a Woyqn Wo nk'rxfo;
Nkwa asuti sen wx ha,
Yqn haw 'no ad'ru wx ha.
songTWI:
Open now Thy gates of beauty,
Zion, let me enter there,
Where my soul in joyful duty
Waits for God who answers prayer.
Oh, how blessed is this place,
Filled with solace, light, and grace!

Gracious God, I come before Thee;
Come, Thou also unto me;
Where we find Thee and adore Thee,
There a heav'n on earth must be.
To my heart, oh, enter Thou,
Let it be Thy temple now!

Here Thy praise is gladly chanted,
Here Thy seed is duly sown;
Let my soul, where it is planted,
Bring forth precious sheaves alone.
So that all I hear may be
Fruitful unto life in me.

Thou my faith increase and quicken,
Let me keep Thy gift divine;
How soe'er temptations thicken,
May Thy Word still o'er me shine
As my guiding star through life,
As my comfort in all strife.

Speak, O God, and I will hear Thee,
Let Thy will be done indeed;
May I, undisturbed, draw near Thee
While Thou dost Thy people feed
Here of life the fountain flows;
Here is balm for all our woes.

title:
Wo Ne Me Ntra, Onwin' Adwo
Abide With Me, 'Tis Eventide
songEN:
Wo ne me ntra, onwin' adwo!
Adekyee atwam kx;
Anwumm're sunsuma aba;
Anadwo reba ntqm!
Dxfo pā a Wote me komam',
Bra na bqtra me fie.

Nnyeso
'Gyenkwa, ne me ntra 'nadwo yi,
Hwq, anwumm're adu!
'Gyenkwa, ne me ntra 'nadwo yi,
Hwq, anwumm're adu!

Wo ne me ntra, onwin' adwo!
Me ne W' nantew nnq no,
Ama me koma ahosan,
Yqn nkitahodi nom'.
Wo nsqm no ahyq me kra ma
De me abqn Wo nkyqn.

Wo ne me ntra, onwin' adwo!
Mqyq ankonam 'nadwo' I
B're a me ne Wo nni nkxmmx,
Na minhu Wo hann no.
Misųro sq qbqma wiase sum
Abqhyq me fie ma.

title:
Nyame a Woyqq S'ro Ne 'Sase
God, Who Made the Earth and Heaven
songEN:
Nyame a Woyqq s'ro ne 'sase
Esum ne hann:
Woyqq 'dekyee maa 'dwumayq,
'Nadwo, 'home;
Ma W'abxfo mmx yqn ho ban,
Na ma yqn nna pa Wo dom mu;
Ma yqnso dae nnya 'nidaso
'Nadwo yi ny'naa.

Sq yqnyan' 'dekyee fof'ro mu,
Fa 'bra kwan sō a,
Nea 'besi biara, ma yenni
W'apqde so.
Kōra yqn so fi bxn' tumi ho;
Bx yqn ho ban kwan hihiaa yim',
Nyi W'animte mfi yqn so da,
Da mu no ny'naa.

Wqn yqn sxre ne yqn nna mu,
Ne 'wu mu nso,
Wo banbx kqsem' ma yenya
Asomdwoe nna.
Sq t'robqnto nne nyan yqn a,
O Awurade pa, nnyaw yqn,
Na ma yqne Wo nkodi hen'
'Nuonyam mu s'ro.

Agya Kronkron a Wote s'ro,
Xba Kronkron,
Honhom Kronkron, yqn akyqde,
Baasakoro:
Dom yqn seesei kosi b're a
Yqde yqn kyqw begu W'anim,
Na yqde nnwom pa 'kamfo Wo
Nnasanten mu.
songTWI:
God, who made the earth and heaven,
Darkness and light:
You the day for work have given,
For rest the night.
May Your angel guards defend us,
Slumber sweet Your mercy send us,
Holy dreams and hopes attend us
All through the night.

And when morn again shall call us
to run life's way,
May we still, what-e'er befall us,
Your will obey.
From the pow'r of evil hide us,
In the narrow pathway guide us,
Never be Your smile denied us
All through the day.

Guard us waking, guard us sleeping,
And, when we die,
May we in Your mighty keeping
All peaceful lie.
When the trumpet call shall wake us,
Then, O Lord, do not forsake us,
But to reign in glory
take us with You on high.

Holy Father, throned in heaven,
All holy Son,
Holy Spirit, freely given,
Blest Three in One:
Grant us grace, we now implore You,
Till we lay our crowns before You
And in worthier strains adore You
while ages run.

title:
A Dekyee Hann De Bxkxx
Softly Now The Light of Day
songEN:
Adekyee hann de bxkxx
Retwam fi yqn anim kx:
Yqapxn yqn nnwuma yi no,
W'ra yqne Wo bqkasa.

Wō a W'ani hu ade ny'naa
Na b'ribiara nhinta Wo,
Fa mfomso a ada adi
Ne kokoam bxn' biara f'ri.

Qrenkyq, adekyee hann
Betwam afi yqn so kōraa;
B'rč a 'w'rqhow ny'naa atwam no,
'W'ra ma yqmmqtra Wo nkyqn.
songTWI:
Softly now the light of day
Fades upon out sight away:
Free from care, from labor free,
Lord, we would commune with Thee.

Thou, whose all pervading eye
Nought escapes, without, within,
Pardon each infirmity,
Open fault, and secret sin.

Soon from us the light of day
Shall forever pass away;
Then, from sin and sorrow free,
Take us, Lord, to dwell with Thee.

title:
'Gyenkwa, Hy'ra Yqn Anwumm're Yi
Savior, Breathe an Evening Blessing
songEN:
'Gyenkwa, hy'ra yqn anwumm're yi,
Ansa na yqakxdeda;
Yqka yqn bxne kyerq W;
Wutum' sa yare, gye nkwa.

Sq sum d'ru kabii yi hu a,
Esum ntum' mfa Wo nhinta;
Wone Nea Xmm'rq da no nti,
Wowqn Wo mma baabiara.

Sq xsqe mpo twa yqn ho hyia,
Na agyan tu framfram a,
W'abxfo 'wqmfo no wqn yqn,
Sq Wobqn a, yenya nkwa.

Sq owu bqfa yqn mpof'rim'
Na yqn mpa yq asiei a,
Ma yenyan 'nuonyam 'nxpa no
Wx tebeā a owu nnim mu.
songTWI:
Savior, breathe an evening blessing,
Ere repose our spirits seal;
Sin and want we come confessing;
Thou canst save, and Thou canst heal.

Though the night be dark and dreary,
Darkness cannot hide from Thee;
Thou art He who, never weary,
Watchest where Thy people be.

Though destruction walk around us,
Though the arrow past us fly,
Angel guards from Thee surround us,
We are safe if Thou art nigh.

Should swift death this night o'er take us,
And our couch become our tomb,
May the morn of glory wake us,
Clad in light and deathless bloom.

title:
Wo Ne Me Ntra
Abide With Me
songEN:
Wo ne me ntra, onwini redwo ntqm,
Esum red'ru, 'Wura, Wo ne me ntra;
Sq boafo sa, na 'w'rqkyekye tu kx a,
Mmxb'rxfo boafo, O, Wo ne me ntra.

N-kwa da ketewa yi retwam ntqm,
Ha dqw resa, n'anuonyam retwam kx,
Nsakrae ne p'rxe na mihu baabiara;
O, Wo a Wonsakra, Wo ne me ntra.

Mihia Wo wx dxnhwere biara mu,
Wo dom na etum' di bonsam so nim,
Hena n' xbqyq me wqmfo sq Wo,
Munumkum ne awiam', Wo ne me ntra.

Sq Woka me ho a minsuro dxm, nwene,
Haw mu nyq d'ru, na nusu nyq
'Wu nwowxe, asaman nkonim wx he?
Mqkx so adi nim, Wo ne me ntra.

title:
Ade Resa Wx Atxe
Day Is Dying in the West
songEN:
Ade resa wx atxe,
Xhome fi s'ro reba;
Twqn na som, b're a 'nadwo
Akanea repuepue wim
Mmaa nyinaa yi.

Nnyeso
Kronkron, kronkron, kronkron
Otweaduampxn!
Woahyq s'ro ne 'sase ma
S'ro ne fam reyi W'ayq,
Xs'ros'roni!

Nkwa Wura, soro ase
Nyinaa yq W'ankasa fi.
Boa yqn a yqhwehwq Wo
Ano kx Wo nguankuw mu,
'Fisq Wobqn.

B're a esum red'ru yi,
Fa yqn hyq Wo dx kokom;
Yqn koma nam W'anuonyam
Nkatanim nsoromma so,
Foro xs'ro.

B're a 'dekyee ne 'nadwo
Twam fi yqn ani so no,
Abxfo Wura, ma yqn
Ani nhu daa anxpa
Na 'sum to ntwa.
songTWI:
Day is dying in the west;
Heaven is touching earth with rest;
Wait and worship while the night
Sets the evening lamps alight
Through all the sky.

Refrain
Holy, holy, holy, Lord God of Hosts!
Heaven and earth are full of Thee!
Heaven and earth are praising Thee,
O Lord most high!

Lord of life, beneath the dome
Of the universe, Thy Index,
Gather us who seek Thy face
To the fold of Thy embrace,
For Thou art nigh.

While the deepening shadows fall,
Heart of love enfolding all,
Through the glory and the grace
Of the stars that veil Thy face,
Our hearts ascend.

When forever from our sight
Pass the stars, the day, the night,
Lord of angels, on our eyes
Let eternal morning rise and shadows end.

title:
A Fei Ade Resa
Now the Day Is Over
songEN:
Afei ade resa,
Anadwo abqn,
Anwumm're sunsuma
Nam wim brqoo reba.

Agya ma ab'rqfo
Nnya xhome pa,
Yqn ani nka ngu so
Wo nhyira pa mu.

'Dasu pqn nyinaa mu,
Ma W'abxfo ntrqw
Wxn ntaban fitaa mu,
Nwqn me me mpa so.
songTWI:
Now the Day Is Over
Now the day is over,
Night is drawing nigh,
Shadows of the evening
Steal across the sky.

Father, give the weary
Calm and sweet repose;
With Thy tenderest blessing
May our eyelids close.

Through the long night watches,
May Thine angels spread
Their white wings above me,
Watching round my bed.

title:
Nyame, Miyi W'ayq 'nadwo 'i
All Praise to Thee
songEN:
Nyame, miyi W'ayq 'nadwo 'i,
Adekyee mu nhy'ra nyinaa nti;
Fa me sie, ahen' mu Hene,
Wx Wo ntaban kqsq n' ase!

'Wura, fa me bxne kyq me
Nnq da yim', Wo dx Ba no nti;
Na me ne wiase ne Wo ntam
Ayq dwoo ansa na mada.

O, ma me kra nhome Wo mu,
Na m'ani nkata nna pa mu;
Nna a qbqma me 'hoxden,
Na masxre asom Nyame.

'Domfo Nyame, munyi N'ayq
Asase mma, munyi N'ayq
Xs'ro dxm, munyi No ayq;
Agya, 'Ba, ne Honhom Kronkron.
songTWI:
All praise to thee, my God, this night,
for all the blessings of the light!
Keep me, O keep me, King of kings,
beneath thine own almighty wings.

Forgive me, Lord, for thy dear Son,
the ill that I this day have done,
that with the world, myself, and thee,
I, ere I sleep, at peace may be.

O may my soul on thee repose,
and with sweet sleep mine eyelids close,
sleep that may me more vigorous make
to serve my God when I awake.

Praise God, from whom all blessings flow;
praise him, all creatures here below;
praise him above, ye heavenly host;
praise Father, Son, and Holy Ghost.

title:
Hann Pa, Nyame Dom a
O Gladsome Ligh
songEN:
Hann pa, Nyame dom a
Wohwq Agya n' anim;
Daa 'nuonyam kata Wo ho;
Kronkronni a wxahy'ra W',
Yqn Agyenkwa Kristo,
W'ahoyi yq anigye.

Adekyee retwam komm,
Yehu anwumm're hann,
B're a yqreto yqn dwom;
Agyā a Ne tumi so,
Ne Bā a Woyqq 'nipa,
Ne Honhom Kronkron dqqfon'.

Wofata sq Wogye
Nnwom kronkron nkamfo ny'naa,
O, Nyame Ba, nkwa Mafo;
Xs'ros'roni, Wo na
Wiase hyq W 'anuonyam,
Wxbqma Wo so daa daa.
songTWI:
O gladsome light, O grace
Of God the Father's face,
The eternal splendor wearing;
Celestial, holy, blest,
Our Savior, Jesus Christ,
Joyful in Thine appearing.

Now e'er day fadeth quite,
We see the ev'ning light,
Our wonted hymn ourpouring;
Father of might unknown,
Thee His incarnate Son,
And Holy Spirit adoring.

To Thee of right belongs
All praise of holy songs,
O Son of God, life giver;
Thee therefore, O most high,
The world doth glorify
And shall exalt for ever.

title:
Yesu 'Guanhwqfo Pa, Tie Me
Jesus, Tender Shepherd, Hear Me

Nyame, Dā a Wode Mae No Asa
The Day Thou Gavest
songEN:
Nyame, dā a Wode mae no asa,
Sum nam Wo tumi so reba;
Yqtoo yqn anxpa dwom maa Wo,
W'ayeyi tew yqn home ho.

Yqda W'ase sq W'asafo nnae
B're a 'sase rebqn hann yi;
Xhwq ne ho yie wiase nyinaam',
Xnhome awia ne 'nadwo.

Asase ne supxw biara so,
Adekyee ma da fof'ro ba;
Mpaebx nne renyq komm da biara;
Na 'yeyi nso to rentwa Da.

'Wura, ma qnyq sa, W'ahenni
Rengu sq asase so de,
Na ebegyina na anyin' daa,
Kosi sq Wo de ny'naa bebom.
songTWI:
The day Thou gavest, Lord, is ended;
the darkness falls at Thy behest;
to Thee our morning hymns ascended;
Thy praise shall hallow now our rest.

We thank Thee that Thy church, unsleeping
while earth rolls onward into light,
through all the world her watch is keeping,
and rests not now by day or night.

As o'er each continent and island
the dawn leads on another day,
the voice of prayer is never silent,
nor die the strains of praise away.

So be it, Lord; Thy throne shall never,
like earth's proud empires, pass away.
Thy kingdom stands, and grows forever,
till all Thy creatures own Thy sway.

title:
Afei 'Bxde Ny'naa Reda
Now All the Woods
songEN:
Afei 'bxde ny'naa reda,
Anadwo sum abedu
Nkųro, nnipa ne mmoa so;
Nanso, wo, me koma nyan,
Fa bere kakra bx mpae,
Kamfow' Bxfon' ansa woada.

Me Yesu, bqtra me nkyqn,
Na mma 'tamfo bi mmqn me.
Wo ntaban katam' so;
Sq tamfo yi me hu a,
Mma no mmfa me nnkx 'manem',
Mmom W'abxfon' nto dwom me nkyqn.

M'adxfo, monhome dwoo,
Yqn Nyame bqkōra mo so
Afi mmusu biaram',
Xbqma moanya nna pa,
Na Ne dom atra mo nkyqn,
Na wxawqn mo wx mo mpa so.
songTWI:
Now all the woods are sleeping,
And night and stillness creeping
O'er city, man, and beast;
But thou, my heart, awake thee,
To pray'r awhile be take thee,
And praise thy Maker ere thou rest.

My Jesus, stay Thou by me,
And let no foe come nigh me,
Safe sheltered by Thy wing;
But would the foe alarm me,
O let him never harm me,
But still Thine angels round me sing!

My loved ones, rest securely,
From every peril surely
Our God will guard your heads;
And happy slumbers send you,
And bid His hosts attend you,
And golden armed watch o'er your beds.

title:
Tie, Anwumm're Dwom Regyigye
Hark, the Vesper Hymn Is Stealing
songEN:
Tie, anwumm're dwom regyigye
Wx asu no so bxkxx;
Ne nnyigyei no rebqn ara.

Yqte no bxkxx wx asom.
Di ah'rusi, di ah'rusi,
Di ah'rusi, Amen.
songTWI:
Hark! the vesper hymn is stealing
O'er the waters soft and clear;
Jubilate, Jubilate, Jubilate, Amen.

Nearer yet, and nearer pealing,
Soft it breaks upon the ear.
Jubilate, Jubilate, Jubilate, Amen.

title:
Yqwx Dqw Kqse, B'rč a Yehyiam'
Great Our Joys as Now We Gather
songEN:
Yqwx dqw kqse, b'rč a yehyiam'
Nea W'ra no ka yqn bom no;
Nea yqsom Agya Nyankopxn
Wx Ne Ba no Honhom mu.
Wohu N'asafo no,
Faako a wxyq Ne pq.

Hama a 'som bo n'qde yqn
Fam Nyame ho yqn mm'rqwyqm';
Nea 'kae yqn sq Xda so yq
Yqn Botantim no, som bo.
Nokwar' dx da n'adi
Sq 'Hwqfo no nguan wx ha.

Ma yensua mfi Kristo nhwqsom'
Nea yqyq mpaebx fie yi:
Nea Xtew asxr'fie ho no
Pq sq yqn ny'naa som wx hx.
Xba no mpam 'biara:
'Biara wx kwan N'ahennim'.

'Wura, kanyan yqn ma yenhu
Wiasč a ehia nkwagye no!
Asafo no 'dwuma som bo,
Yqde mmxdemmx gu so!
Yqmfa nokwaredi-
Sei na yqyq Nyame pq.
songTWI:
Great our joy as now we gather
Where the Master makes us one:
Where we worship God the Father
Thro' the Spirit of His Son.
All who search for His church
Find it where His will is done.

Precious is the tie that binds us
To our God when faith grows cold;
Precious all that now reminds us
He is still our safe stronghold.
Faithful love serves to prove
Here the Shepherd has His fold.

May we learn from Christ's example
How to use this house of prayer:
He who loved and cleansed His temple
Wants us all to worship there.
God the Son shuts out none:
In His Kingdom all may share.

Lord, inspire us with Your vision
Of a world which must be won!
Glorious is the church's mission,
Long endeavored, scarce begun!
Faithful now- this is how
God's eternal will is done.

title:
Hy'rafo Yesu, W'asqm So
Blessed Jesus, at Thy Word
songEN:
Hy'rafo Yesu, W'asqm so
Na yqahyia mu rebetie Wo;
Kanyan yqn koma ne kra
N'qnhwehwq Wo, nnx Wo, nsųro Wo;
Na Wo nky'rqky'rq kronkron no nti,
Qnnan mfi wiase, nnx Wo nko.

Yqn nimdeq, yqn adehu;
Ne ny'naa hyq esum kabii mu,
Kosi sq Wo Honhom no
De nokware hann bqhy'rqn mu.
Yqn nkwagye no fi W nkutoo.
Di dwuma pa nyinaa yqn mu.

'W'ra 'nuonyamfo, bra yqn mu!
Hann mu hann a Wufi Nyamem',
Bue yqn asom' ne komam'.
Fa Wo Honhom no so boa yqn;
Tie Wo nkurxfo sufrq yi
Tie, na hy'ra yqn mpae ne 'yeyi.
songTWI:
Blessed Jesus, at Thy word
We are gathered all to hear Thee;
Let our hearts and souls be stirred
Now to seek and love and fear Thee;
By Thy teachings sweet and holy,
Drawn from earth to love Thee solely.

All our knowledge, sense, and sight
Lie in deepest darkness shrouded,
Till Thy Spirit breaks our night
With the beams of truth unclouded.
Thou alone to God canst win us;
Thou must work all good within us.

Glorious Lord, Thy self impart!
Light of light, from God proceeding,
Open Thou our ears and heart,
Help us by Thy Spirit's pleading,
Hear the cry Thy people raises,
Hear, and bless our prayers and praises.

title:
Nyame Wx Ha!
God Is Here!
songEN:
Nyame wx ha! B're a Ne mma
Hyiam nkamfo ne mpaebxm' yi,
Anka ma yenhu no kqse
Nea yqn ny'naa kyq wx Kristom.
Qha, ne wiase baabiara,
Yqn nimdeq ahorow ny'naa
Twqn sq Honhom no bqhyqne
Adwen ne komā a abuem'.

Nsohyqde bqkae yqn wx ha,
Adom a yehia daa ny'naa;
Qha na 'sqnkapon wx;
Asqm no di kan wx ha.
Qha na nokwar' 'sqnka mu.
Kommyq ne xkasa mu,
Fof'royq ne nsakrae mu no,
Honhom no bā obiara nkyqn.

Yqn mmofra nya 'nika wx ha,
'Hwqfo no nguankuw no mu;
B'rč a yedi paanoo nom nsa no,
Kristo kx so hwq yqn so.
Qha, 'Somfo no asomfo
Fi xsom mu hwehwq nea
Qky'rq wx daa 'setram',
Sqnea wxgye di ampa.

Asafo ne ahemman W'ra,
Nsakrae ne 'kyinnye b're yi,
Yq yqn 'sqmpan' ho nokwafo,
Ma yqnnaW' botae adi.
Qha, 'nnq 'hofama som yim',
Nea yqma, nea yenya ny'naa,
Yqn a yqtč ase Wo mu yi,
Yqkamfo Wo, yqgye di!
songTWI:
God is here! As we His people
Meet to offer praise and prayer,
May we find in fuller measure
What it is in Christ we share.
Here, as in the world around us,
All our varied skills and arts
Wait the coming of the Spirit
Into open minds and hearts.

Here are symbols to remind us
Of our life long need of grace;
Here are table, font, and pulpit;
Here the Word has central place.
Here in honesty of preaching,
Here in silence, as in speech,
Here, in newness and renewal,
God the Spirit comes to each.

Here our children find a welcome
In the Shepherd's flock and fold,
Here, as bread and wine are taken
Christ sustains us as of old.
Here the servants of the Servant
Seek in worship to explore
What it means in daily living
To believe and to adore.

Lord of all, of church and kingdom,
In age of change and doubt
Keep us faithful to the gospel,
Help us work Your purpose out.
Here, in this day's dedication,
All we have to give, receive,
We, who cannot live without You,
We adore You! we believe!

title:
Sqnea Wo Trabea Yq Fq Fa
How Lovely Is Thy Dwelling Place
songEN:
Sqnea Wo trabea yq fq fa,
Asafo Aw'rade!
Na Wo dom ntamadan no mu,
Sqnea 'hx yq dq fa!

Me kra brqfo ani gyina,
Sq 'behu W'abangua;
Me koma ne me honam team
Ky'rq W', Nyame Teasefo.

Hwq sqnea apatuprq nya
Ofie gye n'ahome;
Na asomfrakatakyi nso
Nya p'rebu ma ne ho.

W'afxrebukyia no mu mpo,
Xbqto ne nma hx;
Wo, asafo 'Wrade Tumfo,
Me Hen' me Nyame.

Nhy'ra ne wxn a wxte Wo fie,
Woyi Wo ayq daa.
Nhy'ra ne nea n'ahoxden ne Wo,
W'akwan wx ne komam.
songTWI:
How lovely is Thy dwelling place,
O Lord of hosts to me!
The tabenacles of Thy grace
How pleasant, Lord, they be!

My thirsty soul longs ardently,
Yea, faints Thy courts to see;
My very heart and flesh cry out,
O living God, for Thee.

Behold the sparrow findeth out
A house where-in to rest;
The swallow also, for herself
Provided hath a nest.

Ev'n Thine own altars, where she safe
Her young ones forth may bring,
O Thou, almighty Lord of hosts,
Who art my God and King.

Blest are they in Thy house that dwell,
They ever give Thee praise.
Blest is the man whose strength Thou art,
In whose heart are Thy ways.

title:
Bra Ma Yqnto Dwom Mma'
O Come, Let Us Sing to the Lord
songEN:
Bra ma yqnto dwom mma'
W'rade; Momma yqn mu biara,
M-fa anigye mmx ose
Mma yqn nkwagye Botan.

Momma yqnnante mmra
N'anim Wx aseda nne mu;
Bra ma yqnto 'yeyi mma No,
Mmx No 'se 'nigye mu

Nyankopxn yq Xhenkqse
Anyame nyinaa so;
Asase mu bun wx Ne nsam,
Mmepx 'hoxden wx No.

Xno na qpo yq Ne de,
Na Xno na Xyqe;
Na asase pqsqq no nso,
Ne nsa na qnwenee.

Mommra mma yqnkoto nsom No,
Na yemmutu mmx mpae;
Mommra yqn Yqfo no anim
Mmetie No nnq da yi.
songTWI:
O come, let us sing to the Lord,
Come let us every one
A joyful noise make to the Rock
Of our salvation.

Let us before His presence come
With glad and thankful voice;
Let us sing psalms of praise to Him,
And make a joyful noise.

For God, a great God and great King,
Above all gods, He is;
The depths of earth are in His hand,
The strength of hills is His.

To Him the ocean vast belongs,
For He the sea did make;
The dry land also from His hands,
Its form at first did take.

O come, bow down and worship Him,
And kneeling, humbly pray,
Come to our Maker and our God,
And hear His voice today.

title:
Nyame, Fa Wo Nhyira Pxn Yqn
Lord, Dismiss Us With Thy Blessings
songEN:
Nyame, fa Wo nhyira pxn yqn,
Fa dqw hyq yqn komam' fxmm;
Ma yqn mu biara nya Wo dx,
Nni nkonim nkwagye dom mu:
O dwudwo yqn, O dwudwo yqn,
Yqretu kwan sar' so yi.

Yqda W'ase, yqkamfo Wo,
W'asqmpa dqdq no nti;
Ma Wo nkwagye ho aba no
Mm'ro so yqn komam ne 'bram';
Nokware mu, nokware mu
Ma yqnnante W'asqm mu.

title:
Nyame Ne Wo Ntra
God Be With You
songEN:
Nyame ne wo ntra, yebehyiam bio;
N'afotu nky'rqw' kwan mma wo so,
Xmmaw' banbx Ne nguankuw mu:
Nyame ne wo ntra, yebehyiam bio.
Nnyeso
Yebehyiam, yebehyiam ( bi-o)
Yebehyiam Yesu nan ase
Yebehyiam, yebehyiam ( bi-o)
Nyame ne wo ntra, yebehyiam bio.

Nyame ne wo ntra, yebehyiam bio,
Xmfaw' nsie Ne ntaban ase,
Xmma wo mana da biara,
Nyame ne wo ntra yebehyiam bio.

Nyame ne wo ntra, yebehyiam bio,
Xbram' haw twa wo ho hyia a,
Xmfa Ne basa nwowaw wo:
Nyame ne wo ntra yebehyiam bio.

Nyame ne wo ntra, yebehyiam bio,
Onhim xdx frankaa wo so
Nyi owu 's'rxkye mfi w'anim;
Nyame ne wo ntra, yebehyiam bio.

title:
Nyame Ne Wo Ntra
God Be With You
songEN:
Nyame ne wo ntra, yebehyiam bio;
N'afotu nky'rqw' kwan mma wo so,
Xmmaw' banbx Ne nguankuw mu:
Nyame ne wo ntra, yebehyiam bio.

Nyame ne wo ntra, yebehyiam bio,
Xmfaw' nsie Ne ntaban ase,
Xmma wo mana da biara,
Nyame ne wo ntra yebehyiam bio.

Nyame ne wo ntra, yebehyiam bio,
Xbram' haw twa wo ho hyia a,
Xmfa Ne basa nwowaw wo:
Nyame ne wo ntra yebehyiam bio.

Nyame ne wo ntra, yebehyiam bio,
Onhim xdx frankaa wo so
Nyi owu 's'rxkye mfi w'anim;
Nyame ne wo ntra, yebehyiam bio.
songTWI:
God be with you till we meet again;
By His counsels guide, uphold you,
With His sheep securely fold you:
God be with you till we meet again.

God be with you till we meet again;
Neath His wings securely hide you,
Daily manna still provide you:
God be with you till we meet again.

God be with you till we meet again;
When life's perils thick confound you,
Put His arms unfailing round you:
God be with you till we meet again.

God be with you till we meet again;
Keep love's banner floating o'er you,
Smite death's threatening wave before you:
God be with you till we meet again.

title:
A W'rade, Gya W'akoa Kwan
O Lord, Now Let Your Servant
songEN:
Aw'rade, gya W'akoa kwan
Asomdwoe mu seesei,
Efisq m'ani ahu
Wo gye dom 'nuonyam no:
Hann á qky'rq wiase kwan kx
Wo bepx kronkron so,
Wo nkurxfo anuonyam,
Israel a Woapaw wxn.

Afei ma kwan ma minni
W'anuonyam hann n'akyi,
Kosi sq sum ny'naa bqy'ra,
Na gyidi bedi mu;
Na ahotefo behyiam
Wx hann m-poano hx
Nea Kristo, Ns'romma Hy'rafon'
Bqhyerqn wxn so daa.
songTWI:
O Lord, now let Your servant
Depart in heav'nly peace,
For I have seen the glory
Of Your redeeming grace:
A light to lead the Gentiles
Unto Your holy hill,
The glory of Your people,
Your chosen Israel.

Then grant that I may follow Your gleam,
O glorious Light,
Till earthly shadows scatter,
And faith is changed to sight;
Till raptured saints shall gather
Upon that shining shore,
Where Christ, the blessed Day star,
Shall light them evermore.

title:
Yqde Dqw Rekx Yi
On Our Way Rejoicing
songEN:
Yqde dqw rekx yi,
Momma y'ani nnye.
Yqn Kannifō adi nim,
Tamfo no agu;
Kristo ne yqn banbx
Ne yqn anigye'
Hena na xbqsqe
Yqn anidaso?
Nnyeso
Yqde dqw rekx yi,
Yqkx anim yi,
Tie yqn ayeyi nnwom,
Xdx Nyankopxn.

Yqto ah'rusi nnwom
Ma Agya Nyame
Yqde 'seda koma
Brq 'Gyenkwa Nyame,
Yqkoto sxre No,
Honhom Nyankopxn,
Yqde dqw rekx yi,
Nnq ne nna nyinaa.
songTWI:
On our way rejoicing
Gladly let us go;
Conquer'd hath our Leader,
Vanquish'd is the foe.
Christ without, our safety;
Christ within, our joy;
Who, if we be faithful,
Can our hope destroy?

Refrain
On our way rejoicing
As we forward move,
Hearken to our praises,
O blest God of love!

Unto God the Father
Joyful songs we sing,
Unto God the Savior
Thankful hearts we bring,
Unto God the Spirit
Bow we and adore,
On our way rejoicing
Now and evermore.

title:
'W'ra, Yq Yqn Kronkronfo
Lord, Make Us More Holy

Yi Agya N' Ayq
Praise Ye The Father
songEN:
Yi Agya n' ayq, Ne dx ayamye nti,
Xde tema hwq Ne mma bxn'yqfo so,
Abxfo, munyi No ayq wx soro;
Yi Yehowá ayq.

Yi 'Gyenkwa ayq, N'ahummxborx so,
Xde dom hwq Ne mma a Wapaw wxn so.
Mm'rante, mmabaawa, mo mpanin ne mmofra,
Yi 'Gyenkwa ayq.

Yi Honhom n'ayq, Israel Kyigy'nafo no
Nea wxde No mae sq Xmmqhy'ra yqn no,
Yi Agya, Xba, Honhom Kronkron n'ayq.
Yi Baasa n'ayq.

title:
Bra, Xhene Tumfo
Come, Thou Almighty King
songEN:
Bra, Xhene Tumfo,
Boa ma yqnto W' ho dwom
Mfa nyi W'ayq!
Agya 'nuonyamfo pa,
Nkonimdifo kqse,
Bedi yqn so hene,
Wō a Wo nnā akyq.

Bra, Asqm a wxwoo W'
Ma Wo nkrantq no so,
Tie yqn mpaebx;
Bra behy'ra Wo nk'rxfo;
Ma W'asqm nni nkonim;
Hwie kronkronyq Honhom
No gu yqn so!

Bra, 'Kyidifo kronkron,
Di W'adanse kronkron,
Saa 'nigye b're' I:
Wo a Woyq Tumfo,
Di koma biara so,
Na ntwe W' ho mfi yq ho,
Tumi Honhom.

Wō a Woyq Baasak'ro,
Daa ayeyi nka Wo
Nnasanten ny'naa:
Ma yenhu W' tumidi
Wx anuonyam mu na
Enkosi daapem mu,
Yqnnx W' nsom Wo!
songTWI:
Come, Thou almighty King,
Help us Thy name to sing,
Help us to praise!
Father all glorious,
O'er all victorious,
Come, and reign over us,
Ancient of Days!

Come, Thou incarnate Word,
Gird on Thy mighty sword,
Our prayer attend;
Come, and Thy people bless,
And give Thy Word success;
Spirit of holiness,
On us descend!

Come, holy Comforter,
Thy sacred witness bear,
In this glad hour:
Thou who almighty art,
Now rule in every heart,
And ne'er from us depart,
Spirit of power!

To Thee, great One in Thine,
Eternal praises be,
Hence, evermore:
Thy sovereign majesty
may we in glory see,
And to eternity Love and adore!

title:
A Nadwo Nsoromma Bxfo
Creator Of The Stars Of Night
songEN:
Anadwo nsoromma Bxfo,
Wo a Woyq adasa Hann,
Kristo, yqn nyinaa Agyenkwa,
Yqsrq W', yqfrq Wo a, tie yqn.

Yesu, Wo din kqse no na
N-kotodwe nyinaa koto;
Soro nneqma nyinaa wx Wo,
Fam nneqma nso yq Wo de, 'W'ra.

Agya Nyame, Xba Nyame,
Honhom Nyame, Baasak'ro no,
'Nidi, ne tumi ne 'nuonyam
Nka Mo mmeresaten nyinaa.
Amen.
songTWI:
Creator of the stars of night,
Thy people's ever lasting light,
O Christ, Thou Savior of us all,
We pray Thee, hear us when we call.

At the great name of Jesus, now
All knees must bend, all hearts must bow;
And things celestial Thee shall own,
And things terrestial, Lord alone.

To God the Father, God the Son,
And God the Spirit, Three in one,
Laud, honor, might, and glory be
From age to age eternally. Amen.

title:
Kronkron, Kronkron, Kronkron
Holy, Holy, Holy
songEN:
Kronkron, kronkron, kronkron,
Onyame Tumfo,
Anxpahema mu
Wobqte yqn nne daa;
Kronkron, kronkron, kronkron,
Xdomfo ne Tumfo,
Nyame Baasak'ro a wxahyira Wo.

Kronkron, kronkron, kronkron,
Abxfo som Wo,
Wxde wxn ahenkyqw
gu ahwehwq po ho;
M-pempem ne pedu
som Wo wx ase ha;
Wo a Wowxx hx na Wowx hx daa.

Kronkron, kronkron, kronkron,
Sq sum de Wo sie,
Na bxn'yqfo ani nhu
W'anuonyam no a,
Wo nkutoo ne Kronkron,
Na obi nka Wo ho,
Woyq pq wx dx,
tum' ne 'hotew mu.

Kronkron, kronkron, kronkron,
Onyame Tumfo,
Wo nnwuma beyi
Wo din ayq fam ne s'ro
Kronkron, kronkron, kronkron,
Xdomfo ne Tumfo
Nyame Baasak'ro a wxahyira Wo.
songTWI:
Holy, holy, holy!
Lord God Almighty!
Early in the morning
our song shall rise to Thee;
Holy, holy, holy,
merciful and mighty!
God in three Persons,
blessed Trinity!

Holy, holy, holy!
Angels adore Thee,
Casting down their golden crowns
Around the glassy sea
Thousands and ten thousands
Worship low before Thee,
Which wert, and art,
And evermore shalt be.

Holy, holy, holy!
Though the darkness hide Thee,
Though the eye of sinful man
Thy glory may not see;
Only Thou art holy;
There is none beside Thee,
Perfect in power,
In love, and purity.

Holy, holy, holy!
Lord God Almighty!
All Thy works shall praise Thy name,
In earth, and sky, and sea;
Holy, holy, holy;
Merciful and mighty!
God in three Persons,
Blessed Trinity!

title:
Nyame 'Somdwoe Te Sq
Like a River Glorious
songEN:
Nyame 'somdwoe te sq
'Nuonyam asuten;
Edė ade ny'naa so
Wx ne yiri mu.
Qtene wx pqyqm',
Qyq ma daa ny'naa;
Enyin wx pqyq mu,
Emu kx so dx.

Nnyeso
Yehowá ahotosom',
Koma nya nhyira
Sqnea Ne bxhyq te,
Qnya 'somdwoe pa.

Sq Ne nhyira nsa no
Kata yqn so a,
'Tamfo ntum' nni akyi;
'Sqefo nni nny'naso:
Xhaw biara nni hx;
Dadwen bi nni hx,
Ap'rep're bi nni hx a.
Qka honhom no.

'Nigye anaa sxhwq
Ny'naa fi Nyame hx;
Xde ma Ne mma ny'naa
Sq xdx 'kyqde;
Yqbqtwere No yie
Yqn asqde ni;
Wxn a wxtwer' No yie
Hu Ne nokwar'di.
songTWI:
Like a river glorious,
Is God's perfect peace,
Over all victorious,
In its bright increase;
Perfect, yet it floweth,
Fuller every day,
Perfect, yet it groweth,
Deeper all the way.

Refrain
Trusting in Jehovah,
Hearts are fully blessed
Finding, as He promised,
Perfect peace and rest.

Hidden in the hollow
Of His blessed hand,
Never foe can follow,
Never traitor stand;
Not a surge of worry,
Not a shade of care,
Not a blast of hurry
Touch the spirit there.

Every joy or trial
Falleth from above,
Traced upon our dial
By the Sun of Love;
We may trust Him fully
All for us to do.
They who trust Him
Wholly find Him wholly true.

title:
Nea 'Yq Nwanwa Kyen So
The Wonder of It All
songEN:
Anwumm're 'witxe yq anwanwade
Te sq owipuei a mihu.
Nanso 'nwanwade a qkanyan me kra
Ne 'dx a Nyame dx me no.

Nnyeso
O, nea 'yq nwanwa kyqn so!
Nea 'yq nwanwa so
Ne sq mehu sq Xdx me.
O, nea 'yq nwanwa kyqn so!
Nea ;yq nwanwa kyqn so
Ne sq mehu sq Xdx me.

'Sutxb're ne twab're yq 'nwanwade,
Ewim, nsoromma, ne owia;
Nanso 'nwanwade a qkanyan me kra,
Ne nea ahyq ase seesei no.
songTWI:
There's the wonder of sunset at evening,
The wonder as sunrise I see;
But the wonder of wonders that thrills my soul
Is the wonder that God loves me.

Refrain
O, the wonder of it all!
The wonder of it all!
Just to think that God loves me.
O, the wonder of it all!
The wonder of it all!
Just to think that God loves me.

There's the wonder of springtime and harvest,
The sky, the stars, the sun;
But the wonder of wonders that thrills my soul
Is a wonder that's only begun.

title:
'Dx a Qrennyaw Mma Menkx
O Love That Wilt Not Let Me Go
songEN:
'Dx a qrennyaw mma menkx,
Mede kra brqfo' I hyq Wo mu;
Mede me nkwa san hyq Wo nsa,
Na asen afi Wo bun nom'
Sq nkwa a edi mu.

Hann a qnam me kwan so daa,
Medem' kaneā a qredum ma W';
Me koma san nya ne hann no,
Na ahy'rqn Wo 'wia hann no mu,
Ahoxfq kqse mu.

'Dqw a qde yaw hwehwq me,
Mibue me koma mu ma Wo;
Mihu nyankontx nsutx mu,
Hu sq bxhyq no renyq kwa; '
Nxpa a nusu nnim'.

'Sqnnua a qma me ti so
Merentumi nguan mfi W'anim
Misie nkwa yi mu 'nuonyam ny'naa,
Na daakye anyane bio sq
Nkwa a enni awiei.
songTWI:
O Love that wilt not let me go,
I rest my weary soul in thee;
I give thee back the life I owe,
that in thine ocean depths
its flow may richer, fuller be.

O Light that followest all my way,
I yield my flickering torch to thee;
my heart restores its borrowed ray,
that in they sunshine's blaze
its day may brighter, fairer be.

O Joy that seekest me through pain,
I cannot close my heart to thee;
I trace the rainbow thru the rain,
and feel the promise is not vain,
that morn shall tearless be.

O Cross that liftest up my head,
I dare not ask to fly from thee;
I lay in dust life's glory dead,
and from the ground there blossoms
