Wx n'akxneaba nyinaam?
Di Kannifon' akyi q;
Di Kannifo no akyi,
Di Kannifo no akyi,
Worekx na woreba,
Di Kannifo no akyi.

Sq Mehyq nsxe ahenkyqw,
Na 'sraafo bx Me hwe a
Metumi ayq Xhen?
Xdx bqma mmuae no ny'naa;
Mudi Kannifon' akyė a,
Mudi Kannifon' akyė a,
Xdx bqma mmuae no ny'naa,
Mudi Kannifon' akyė a.

B're a Menam kwan so yi,
Mqma 'desoa d'rud'ru so;
Mqsoa asqnnua amaw'.
Wubesua ne soa saa'ra.
Wudi Kannifon 'akyė a,
Wudi Kannifon 'akyė a,
Wubesua ne soa saa'ra,
Wudi Kannifon 'akyė a.

Merekxtrqw M'abasam'
De adu nsase ny'naa so.
So Metumi ayq Xhen?
Xdx di ade ny'naa so;
Wudi Kannifon 'akyė a,
Xdx di ade ny'naa so,
Wudi Kannifon 'akyė a.

title:
Agyenkwa No Pq Sq Xhyqn Wo Komam'
The Savior Is Waiting
songEN:
Agyenkwa no pq sq Xhyqn wo komam',
Adqn na womma No kwan?
B'ribiara nni wiase a esi wo kwan,
Dqn mmuae na wowx ma No?

Nnyeso
B're horow pii Agyenkwa no atwqn,
Seesei nso Ogu so retwqn;
Rehwq sq wubebue xpon mu anaa,
O Xpq sq Xhyqn mu.

Sq wutu 'nammxn kx 'Gyenkwa no nkyqn a,
Wubehu Ne nsá a Wabuem ';
Gye No na wo sum no nyinaa to betwa,
Xbqtra wo komam' daa.
songTWI:
The Savior is waiting to enter your heart,
Why don't you let Him come in?
There's nothing in this world to keep you apart,
What is your answer to Him?

Refrain
Time after time He has waited before,
And now He is waiting again
To see if you're willing to open the door:
O how He wants to come in.

If you'll take one step toward the Savior, my friend,
You'll find His arms open wide;
Receive Him, and all of your darkness will end,
Within your heart He'll abide.

title:
Twa W'ani Kxkwq Yesu
Turn Your Eyes Upon Jesus
songEN:
Okra, haw ne 'w'rqhow ahyqw' ma?
Wunhu hann wx sum yi akyi?
Wohwq 'Gyenkwa a, wubenya hann
Ne daa nkwa a wxde kyq kwa.

Nnyeso
Twa w'ani kxhwq Yesu,
Hwq N'anim nwanwa no pxtee;
Na 'sase so nneqma bqy'ra wxn fq,
Wx N'anuonyam ne Ne dom hann nom'.

Ofii owu mu kxx daa nkwa mu,
Yebedi N'akyi akx hx;
Bxne rentum' mfa yqn nnommum bio,
'Fisq yqsen nkonimdifo.

N'asqm ne Ne bxhyq ntumi ntwam;
Gye No di n'ebesi wo yie:
Kx wiase a 'kra gu so rewu,
Ka Ne nkwagye ho asqm ky'rq.
songTWI:
O soul, are you weary and troubled?
No light in the darkness you see?
There's light for a look at the Savior,
And life more abundant and free!

Refrain
Turn your eyes upon Jesus,
Look full in His wonderful face;
And the things of earth will grow strangely dim
In the light of His glory and grace.

Through death into life everlasting
He passed, and we follow Him there;
Over us sin no more hath dominion,
For more than conqu'rors we are!

His word shall not fail you He promised;
Believe Him and all will be well:
Then go to a world that is dying,
His perfect salvation to tell!

title:
Yenhuu Wo Sqnea Qfata
We Have Not Know Thee
songEN:
Yenhuu Wo sqnea qfata,
Yensuaa Wo nyansa, 'dom ne tum';
Fam ha nneqma ne nsqnhunu
Ahyq yqn adwene mu ma;
'W'ra, ma yqn hann mfa nhu W' nokwar''
Yehu Wo a, ma yqn nyansa.

Yensųroo Wo sqnea qfata,
Saa'ra na yqnkotoo W'anim,
Yqnhwq yqn nneyqe ne nsqm so,
Na yqnkae sq Onyame bqn;
'W'ra, boa ma yenhu sq Wobqn,
Dom yqn sqnea yebesųro Wo.

Yqnnxx Wo sqnea qfata,
Qmfa yqn ho sq Wodx yqn;
'Wura, yqnhwehwqq W'ahoyi,
Yqmfaa nnamyq nhwehwqq W'anim.
Ma yqn dx ne 'hotew koma,
A yqde bqte Wo dx nka.

Yqnsom Wo sqnea qfata,
Hwq yqagyae yqn dwumadi ny'naa;
Dwuma a yqmfa 'hoxden nyq,
Xko a yedi mu nkogu.
'W'ra, ma yqn xpq ne tumi
A yqde bqko ama Wo.

Dabqn na yebehu Wo na
Yqasųro, adx W', asom Wo yie!
Dabqn na yebefi sxhwqm',
Ayq pq wx hann 'sase'i so!
'W'ra, ma yensiesie yqn ho daa
Na yqahu Wo asom Wo hx.
songTWI:
We have not known Thee as we ought,
Nor learned Thy wisdom, grace, and power;
The things of earth have filed our thoughts,
And trifles of the passing hour.
Lord, give us light Thy truth to see,
And make us wise in knowing Thee.

We have not feared Thee as we ought,
Nor bowed beneath Thine awful eye,
Nor guarded deed, and word, and thought,
Remembering that God was nigh.
Lord, give us faith to know Thee near,
And grant the grace of holy fear.

We have not loved Thee as we ought,
Nor cared that we are loved by Thee;
Thy presence we have coldly sought,
And feebly longed Thy face to see.
Lord, give a pure and loving heart
To feel and own the love Thou art.

We have not served Thee as we ought;
Alas! the duties left undone,
The work with little fervor wrought,
The battles lost, or scarcely won!
Lord, give the zeal, and give the might,
For Thee to toil, for Thee to fight.

When shall we know Thee as we ought,
And fear, and love, and serve aright!
When shall we, out of trial brought,
Be perfect in the land of light!
Lord, may we day by day prepare
To see Thy face, and serve Thee there.

title:
Yesu Maba
Jesus, I Come
songEN:
Mifi nkoasom mu, yaw ne sum mu,
Yesu maba, Yesu maba;
W'ahofadim', hann ne ahotxm',
Yesu, maba Wo nkyqn.
Mifi yarem' ba W'ahoxden mu,
Mifi ohiam' ba W'ahonya mu;
Mifi me bxnem' maba Wo nkyqn,
Yesu, maba Wo nkyqn.

Mifi yera ne aniwu mu,
Yesu maba, Yesu maba;
W'asqnnua ho anuonyam no mu,
Yesu, maba Wo nkyqn.
Mifi ha yaw mu ba W'ahotxm',
Mifi ahum mu ba Wo nkyqn dwoo.
Ahohiam ba anigye nnwom mu,
Yesu, maba Wo nkyqn.

Mifi xbrq ne ahantan mu,
Yesu maba, Yesu maba;
Merebqtra Wo pq pa no mu,
Yesu, maba Wo nkyqn.
Mifi me mu ba Wo dx no mu,
Mifi 'basamtum' ba s'ro 'nigyem'.
Mitu ba s'ro te sq 'b'rxnoma,
Yesu, maba Wo nkyqn.

Mifi damoam', ehu ne surom',
Yesu maba, Yesu maba;
Wo fie anigye ne hann no mu,
Yesu, maba Wo nkyqn;
Mifi xsqe a enni kabeam',
Na maba W'asomdwoe ban no mu;
Mqhwq W'anuonyam anim no daa,
Yesu, maba Wo nkyqn.
songTWI:
Out of my bondage, sorrow and night,
Jesus, I come, Jesus, I come;
Into Thy freedom, gladness and light,
Jesus, I come to Thee;
Out of my sickness into Thy health,
Out of my want and into Thy wealth,
Out of my sin and into Thyself,
Jesus, I come to Thee.

Out of my shameful failure and loss,
Jesus, I come, Jesus, I come;
Into the glorious gain of Thy cross,
Jesus, I come to Thee;
Out of earth's sorrows into Thy balm,
Out of life's storms and into Thy calm,
Out of distress to jubilant psalm,
Jesus, I come to Thee.

Out of unrest and arrogant pride,
Jesus, I come, Jesus, I come;
Into Thy blessed will to abide,
Jesus, I come to Thee;
Out of myself to dwell in Thy love,
Out of despair into raptures above,
Upward for aye on wings like a dove,
Jesus, I come to Thee.

Out of the fear and dread of the tomb,
Jesus, I come, Jesus, I come;
Into the joy and light of Thy Index,
Jesus, I come to Thee;
Out of the depths of ruin untold,
Into the peace of Thy sheltering fold,
Ever Thy glorious face to behold,
Jesus, I come to Thee.

title:
S'ro Agya Hy'ra Yqn Seesei
Heavenly Father, Bless Us Now

Tum' Wx Mogya Nom'
Power In The Blood
songEN:
Wonyi wo bxn' adesoa mma wo?
Tum' wx mogya nom', tumi wom',
Wopq sq wudi bxne so nkonim?
Anwanwa tum' wx mogya nom'.

Nnyeso
Tumi wom, tum', anwanwa tumi
Wx 'Guammaa mogya nom',
Tumi wom, tum', anwanwa tumi
Wx mogya a qsom bo nom'.

Wonyi w'akxnnx nč ahantan mma wo?
Tum' wx mogya nom', tumi wom',
Bra Kalbre nsu no ho bqtew wo ho,
Anwanwa tum' wx mogya nom'.

Wobqsom wo Hene Yesu anaa?
Tum' wx mogya nom', tumi wom',
Wobqto N'ayeyi no daa anaa?
Anwanwa tum' wx mogya nom'.
songTWI:
Would you be free from the burden of sin?
There's pow'r in the blood, pow'r in the blood;
Would you o'er evil a victory win?
There's wonderful power in the blood.

Refrain
There is pow'r, pow'r, wonder working pow'r
In the blood of the Lamb;
There is pow'r, pow'r, wonder working pow'r
In the precious blood of the Lamb.

Would be free from your passion and pride?
There's pow'r in the blood, pow'r in the blood;
Come for a cleansing to Calvary's tide?
There's wonderful power in the blood.

Would you do service for Jesus your King?
There's pow'r in the blood, pow'r in the blood;
Would you live daily His praises to sing?
There's wonderful power in the blood.

title:
Bxn'yqfo Hene Ne Me
Chief of Sinners
songEN:
Bxn'yqfo hene ne me,
Nanso Yesu wu maa me;
Owui na matra soro,
Owui na manya daa nkwa;
Sqnea baa dan bobe no,
Mewx No na Xwx me.

O Yesu dx kqse no,
Qkorxn sen soro mpo;
Emu dx sen po bun nso,
Qwx hx mmeresanten,
Anwanwa dx: ehu me
B're a menhwehwqq No mpo.

Bxn'yqfo hene ne me,
Nso m'ade ny'naa ne Kristo;
Onim nea mihia nyinaa,
M'aw'rqhow nyinaa wx No,
Xgye me wiase haw mu,
Xma me kra nya nkwa daa.
songTWI:
Chief of sinners though I be,
Jesus shed His blood for me;
Died that I might live on high,
Died that I might never die;
As the brance is to the vine,
I am His, and He is mine.

O the height of Jesus' love!
Higher than the heaven above,
Deeper than the deepest sea,
Lasting as eternity;
Love that found me-wondrous thought!
Found me when I sought Him not!

Chief of sinners though I be,
Christ is all in all to me;
All my wants to Him are known,
All my sorrows are His own;
Safe with Him from earthly strife,
He sustains the hidden life.

title:
'W'ra, Mereba Fie
Lord, I'm Coming Home
songEN:
Makyin Afi Wo nkyqn Nyame,
B're'i, mereba fie;
Manantew bxn' kwan so akyq,
'W'ra, mereba fie.

Nnyeso
Reba fie, reba fie,
Akyinkyin asa;
Bae Wo dx basa no mu;
'W'ra, mereba fie.

Masqe mm're a qsom bo pii,
B're'i, mereba fie;
Mede nusu ky'rq m'ahonu,
'W'ra, mereba fie.

Mabrq bxneyq ne akyin,
B're'i, mereba fie;
Metwer' Wo dx, gye W'asqm di,
'W'ra, mereba fie.

M'anidaso ne m'adesrq
B'rč a mereba fie,
Qne sq Yesu wu maa me,
'W'ra, mereba fie.

Mihia mogyā a qpa bxne,
B'rč a mereba fie,
H'ro me ma mensen' suky'rqmma,
'W'ra, mereba fie.

title:
Nyankopxn Hu Me Mmxbx
God Be Merciful to Me
songTWI:
God, be merciful to me,
On Thy grace I rest my plea;
Plenteous in compassion Thou,
Blot out my transgressions now;
Wash me, make me pure within,
Cleanse, O cleanse me from my sin,
Wash me, make me pure within,
Cleanse, O cleanse me from my sin.

I am evil, born in sin;
Thou desirest truth within.
Thou alone my Savior art,
Teach Thy wisdom to my heart;
Make me pure, Thy grace bestow,
Wash me whiter than the snow,
Make me pure, Thy grace bestow,
Wash me whiter than the snow.

Gracious God, my heart renew,
Make my spirit right and true;
Cast me not away from Thee,
Let Thy Spirit dwell in me;
Thy salvation's joy impart,
Steadfast make my willing heart,
Thy salvation's joy impart,
Steadfast make my willing heart.

Sinners then shall learn from me
And return, O God, to Thee;
Savior, all my guilt remove,
And my tongue shall sing Thy love;
Touch my silent lips, O Lord,
And my mouth shall praise accord,
Touch my silent lips, O Lord,
And my mouth shall praise accord.

title:
Medem' Bxne Ma Yesu
I Lay My Sins on Jesus
songEN:
Medem' bxne ma Yesu,
'Guammaa a Onni dqm;
Wasoa ne ny'naa ayi me
Mmusu nnesoa ase.

Mede m'afodi brq No,
Sq Xnhoh'ro fi no;
Wx Ne mogya dehye nom'
Nyi nkekae nyinaa hx.

Mede me hia brq Yesu'
Mayq ny'naa te Ne mu;
Xsa me nyarewa ny'naa
Afei Xpxn me kra.

Mepq sq mesq Yesu,
Xdwo na Xwx dx;
Mepq sq mesq Yesu,
Agya Ba Kronkron no.

Medx sq mebqn Yesu,
Wx soro kuw no mu;
Ne wxn ato N'ayeyi,
Asua 'bxfo nnwom no.
songTWI:
I lay my sins on Jesus,
The spotless Lamb of God;
He bears them all, and frees us
From the accursed load,
From the accursed load.

I bring my guilt to Jesus,
To wash my crimson stains
White in His blood most precious,
Till not a stain remains,
Till not a stain remains.

I lay my wants on Jesus,
All fullness dwells in Him;
He healeth my diseases,
He doth my soul redeem,
He doth my soul redeem.

I long to be like Jesus,
Meek loving, lowly, mild;
I long to be like Jesus,
The Father's holy child,
The Father's holy child.

I long to be with Jesus
Amid the heav'nly throng,
To sing with them His praises,
And learn the angels'song,
And learn the angels'song.

title:
Fa F'ri Yqn Sqnea Yqde F'ri
Forgive Our Sins as We Forgive
songEN:
Fa f'ri yqn sqnea yqde f'ri,
'Yi ne mpae a Woky'rqe;
Wo nko na Wobqma yqn dom
De adi nsqm yi so.

Wo dom bqyq dqn ahyira
Komá a ennim faf'ri,
Qdwen bxne ho na enyi
Ne yaw mfi ne mu no?

W'asqnnua yi nokware a
Yenhu no yie no ky'rq:
'Ká a afof'ro de yqn no sua;
'Ká a yqde Wo no so.

'Wura, hoh'ro yqn mu nyinaa,
Na yi nitan hx kōraa;
Wo mmxb'rxhun' ka yqn bom a,
Yqn bra 'ky'rq W'asomdwoe.
songTWI:
Forgive our sins as we forgive,
You taught us, Lord, to pray;
But You alone can grant us grace
To live the words we say.

How can Your pardon reach and bless
The unforgiving heart
That broods on wrongs and will not let
Old bitterness depart?

In blazing light Your cross reveals
The truth we dimly knew:
How trifling others' debts to us;
How great our debt to You!

Lord, cleanse the depths within our souls
And bid resentment cease;
Then, by Your mercy reconciled,
Our lives will spread Your peace.

title:
Tete Bo a Medan Wo
Rock of Ages
songEN:
Tete Bo a medan Wo,
Ma mimmehinta Wo mu;
Ma nsu no ne mogya a,
Efii W'ak'rum senee no,
N-sa me bxne nyinaa,
Na gye me fi ne tumim'.

Me nsa ano adwuma
Rentumi nyq W'ahyqde;
Sq me mmxden ano ngow,
Na me nusu sen dqn a,
Qrenso bxne ka tua,
Wo nkutoo na Wogye nkwa.

Sq m'akwantu yi to twa,
Na midi tamfo so nim,
Na mef'ro ba xsoro,
Behu Wo W'ahengua sō a,
Tete bo a medan Wo,
Ma mimmehinta Wo mu.
songTWI:
Rock of ages, cleft for me,
Let me hide myself in Thee;
Let the water and the blood,
From Thy riven side which flowed
Be of sin and double cure,
Cleanse me from its guilt and power

Not the labors of my hands
Can fulfill Thy law's demands;
Could my zeal no respite know,
Could my tears forever flow,
All for sin could not atone;
Thou must save, and Thou a lone.

When my pilgrimage I close,
Victor o'er the last of foes,
When I soar to worlds unknown,
And behold Thee on Thy throne,
Rock of Ages, cleft for me,
Let me hide myself in Thee.

title:
Twe Me Bqn Wo Koma Ho Ara
Nearer, Still Nearer

Bun' No Mu
Deeper Yet
songEN:
Wxahoh'ro me ho bxn'
Asqnnua no mogyam;
Nso sq 'fi ny'naa bqkx a,
Gye sq mehyqn mų ansa.

Nnyeso
Bun' no mu, bun' no mu,
Mogya tare no mu,
Bun' no mu, bun' no mu,
Mogya dehye no mu.

Da biara, b're biara,
Xde nhyira brq me;
Nso mihia Ne tumė a,
Ehia sq mebx mpae.

Mqbqn Kristo nkyqn daa
Adi N'akyi b're ny'naa;
Xmam' m'abisade,
Nti mebx mpae gyidim'.

'Nnq manya 'somdwoe pa
Bxne wiase yi mu;
Nso merennyae mpaebx
Kosi sq mqyq pq.
songTWI:
In the blood from the cross
I have been washed from sin;
But to be free from dross,
Still I would enter in.

Refrain
Deeper yet, deeper yet,
Into the crimson flood;
Deeper yet, deeper yet,
Under the precious blood.

Day by day, hour by hour,
Blessings are sent to me;
But for more of His power
Ever my prayer shall be.

Near to Christ I would live,
Following Him each day;
What I ask He will give;
So then with faith I pray.

Now I have peace, sweet peace,
While in this world of sin;
But to pray I'll not cease
Till I am pure within.

title:
Yesu 'Sqnnuan' Ase Na
Beneath the Cross of Jesus
songEN:
Yesu 'sqnnuan' ase na
Mapaw sq megyina;
Botan kqse a ne sunsum
Tx xbrq 'sase so;
Qyq fie a qwx sar' so,
Xkwan mu xhome
Ma owigyinae mu hyew ne
Da mu adesoa no.

Yesu 'sqnnua no so na
M'aniwa tumi hu
Nea me nti Ohuu amane
De wui no ankasa;
Mifi koma a abubum'
Sua 'nwanwade mmienu,
Anwanwa dx a qgye nkwa,
Ne fatá a memfata.

Mede 'sqnnuan' nwin' ase
Bqyq me trabea daa;
Menhwehwq hann fof'ro biara
Ka N'anim hann no ho;
Ma wiase yi ntwa me ho nkx,
Minhia mu b'ribiara,
Me nipasu ne m'aniwu,
'Sqnnuan' ne m'anuonyam.
songTWI:
Beneath the cross of Jesus
I fain would take my stand,
the shadow of a mighty rock
within a weary land;
a Index within the wilderness,
a rest upon the way,
from the burning of the noontide heat,
and the burden of the day.

Upon that cross of Jesus
mine eye at times can see
the very dying form of One
who suffered there for me;
and from my stricken heart with tears
two wonders I confess:
the wonders of redeeming love
and my unworthiness.

I take, O cross, thy shadow
for my abiding place;
I ask no other sunshine than
the sunshine of his face;
content to let the world go by,
to know no gain nor loss,
my sinful self my only shame,
my glory all the cross.

title:
Yqn Agyanom Gyidi Tim Hx
Faith of Our Fathers
songEN:
Yqn agyanom gyidi tim hx;
Ensųro 'fiase, gya ne afoa,
O sq yqte asqmpa n' a
Yqn koma di dqw boro so,
Yqn agyanom gyidi kronkron!
Yebedi w' nokwar' kodu 'wum'.

Yqn agyanom mpoky'rqfo no
Nyaa honhom mu ahofadi;
Wxn mmofra awiei bqyq dq,
B're a wxn nso wu ma Wo no!
Yqn agyanom gyidi kronkron!
Yebedi w' nokwar' kodu 'wum'.

Y'agyanom gyidi! Yqbqdx
'Damfo ne 'tamfo yqn ko nom',
De dx aka wo ho asqm,
Ayamye ne asetra pam'
Yqn agyanom gyidi kronkron!
Yebedi w' nokwar' kodu 'wum'.
songTWI:
Faith of our fathers! living still
In spite of dungeon, fire and sword,
O how our hearts beat high with joy
When-e'er we hear that glorious word.
Faith of our fathers! holy faith!
We will be true to thee till death.

Our fathers, chained in prisons dark,
Were still in heart and conscience free;
How sweet would be their children's fate,
If they, like them, could die for thee!
Faith of our fathers! holy faith!
We will be true to thee till death.

Faith of our fathers! we will love
Both friend and foe in all our strife,
And preach thee, too, as love knows how,
By kindly words and virtuous life.
Faith of our fathers! holy faith!
We will be true to thee till death.

title:
Ma Me Yesu
Give Me Jesus
songEN:
Anxpa sq minyan a,
Anxpa sq minyan a,
Anxpa sq minyan a,
Ma me Yesu.

Nnyeso
Ma me Yesu, ma me Yesu
Wo de fa wiase ny'naa,
Ma me Yesu.

Xdasum metea mu sq,
Xdasum metea mu sq,
Xdasum metea mu sq,
Ma me Yesu.

Sq ade rebqkye a,
Sq ade rebqkye a,
Sq ade rebqkye a,
Ma me Yesu.

Sq merebewu mpo a,
Sq merebewu mpo a,
Sq merebewu mpo a,
Ma me Yesu.
songTWI:
In the morning when I rise,
In the morning when I rise,
In the morning when I rise,
Give me Jesus.

Refrain
Give me Jesus, Give me Jesus,
You may have all this world,
Give me Jesus.

Dark midnight was my cry,
Dark midnight was my cry,
Dark midnight was my cry,
Give me Jesus.

Just about the break of day,
Just about the break of day,
Just about the break of day,
Give me Jesus.

Oh, when I come to die,
Oh, when I come to die,
Oh, when I come to die,
Give me Jesus.

title:
Twe Me Bqn Yie
Draw Me Nearer
songEN:
Meyq Wo de Nyame, mate Wo nne,
Qkaa Wo dx kyerqq me;
Na mepq sq mesxre gyidi mu
Na mitwiw pini Wo nkyqn.

Nnyeso
Twe me bqn yie, Hyirafo Nyame,
Twe me bqn W'asqnnua no;
Twe me bqn, twe me bqn,
Hyirafo Nyame
Twe me bqn Wo mfem mogya n'.

'Wura, yi me si hx nnq ma Wo som,
Wo dom mu tumi no nti;
Ma me kra mfa anidaso nhwq s'ro,
Na me pq mmem Wo de mu.

W'ahengua anim dxnhwerew biako
Yq anigye kqse nko,
B're a mpaebom me ne Wo, me Nyame
Di nkxmmx sq adamfo!
songTWI:
I am thine, O Lord, I have heard thy voice,
and it told thy love to me;
but I long to rise in the arms of faith
and be closer drawn to thee.

Refrain
Draw me nearer, nearer, blessed Lord,
To the cross where thou hast died.
Draw me nearer, nearer, nearer, blessed Lord,
To thy precious, bleeding side.

Consecrate me now to thy service, Lord,
by the power of grace divine;
let my soul look up with a steadfast hope,
and my will be lost in thine.

O the pure delight of a single hour
that before thy throne I spend,
when I kneel in prayer, and with thee, my God,
I commune as friend with friend!

title:
Mereba ' Sqnnuan' Ase
I Am Coming to the Cross
songEN:
Mereba 'sqnnuan' ase,
Meyq hiani, nif'rani;
Mimmu nea mewx biara,
Mehwehwq nkwagye mapa.

Nnyeso
Awurade metwer' Wo,
O Kalbre so Oguammaa;
Mekoto W'asqnnua 'se
Oyesu, gye me seesei.

Me koma 'fee Wo akyq,
Bxn' adi mu hen' akyq,
Yesu ka nsqm dqdq sq,
'Mqhoh'ro wo ho bxn' ny'naa'.

Mede m'ade ny'naa ma Wo,
Nnamfo, b're, wiase 'honya;
Me kra ne me nipadua
Ny'naa yq Wo de afebxx.

Yesu bxhyq me kra ma!
Mawie pqyq wx Ne mu,
Me ho ny'naa atew koraa,
'Nuonyam nka Oguammaa no.

title:
Wo De Kōraa
Wholly Thine
songEN:
Agyenkwa, mqyq Wo de koraa;
Ky'rqky'rq me, ky'rqky'rq me;
Mqyq Wo pq, 'Wura, nyq me de,
Boa me, boa me nnq.

Nnyeso
Wo de kōraa (O 'W'ra)
Wo de kōraa (O 'W'ra)
Wo de kōraa, 'yi ne me bx,
Wo de kōraa (O 'W'ra)
Wo de kōraa (O 'W'ra)
Wo de kōraa, O 'W'ra, seesei.

Wiase anigye, sika ne din
Wonka hō a, qyq dqn?
Wo din nti mqpo ne nyinaa 'ra
'Yi ne m'ahode.

Sq meto wiase anigye gų a,
Twiw bqn me, twiw bqn me,
Minya ade nyinaa 'ra W'anim,
M'aw'rqkyekye ni.
songTWI:
I would be, dear Savior, wholly Thine;
Teach; Teach me how, teach me how;
I would do Thy will, O Lord, not mine;
Help me, help me now.

Refrain
Wholly Thine, (O Lord) wholly Thine, (O Lord),
Wholly Thine, this is my vow;
Wholly Thine, (O Lord) wholly Thine, (O Lord),
Wholly Thine, O Lord, just now.

What is worldly pleasure, wealth , or fame,
Without Thee, without Thee?
I will leave them all for Thy dear name,
This my wealth shall be.

As I cast earth's transient joys behind,
Come Thou near, come Thou near;
In Thy presence all in all I find.
'Tis my comfort here.

title:
Migyaw Ne Nyinaam'
I Surrender All
songEN:
Migyaw ne nyinaam' ma Yesu,
Mede ne ny'naa No kwa;
Daa mqdx No, matwere No,
Atra N'anim hx daa daa.

Nnyeso
Migyaw ne nyinaam',
Migyaw ne nyinaam';
Ne nyinaa ma W'
'Gyenkwa Dqqfo
Migyaw ne nyinaam'.

Migyaw ne nyinaam' ma Yesu,
Koto komm Ne nan ase;
Magyaw wiase 'nigye nyinaa,
Fa me, Yesu, fa me nnq.

Migyaw ne nyinaam' ma Yesu,
'Gyenkwa, ma menyq Wo de;
Ma mente Honhom Kronkron nka,
Na menyq Wo de ampa.

Migyaw ne nyinaam' ma Yesu,
Mete gya kronkron nká afei.
O nkwagye mu anigye pa!
'Nuonyam, 'nuonyam nka Ne din!

title:
Metwiw Abqn Yesu Nkyqn Yie
I Would Draw Nearer to Jesus
songEN:
Metwiw abqn Yesu nkyqn yie,
Na matra N'anim hx daa;
Atra Ne nkyqn dwoodwoo komm.

Metwiw abqn Yesu nkyqn yie,
Meremfa hwee nkame No;
Xpq sq Xyq domfo nti,
Metwiw abqn Ne nkyqn yie.

Metwiw abqn Yesu nkyqn yie,
Xmmoam' ma minni nokwar';
Mqda Ne papayq adi,
Mqyq Ne pq xdqw so.
songTWI:
I would draw nearer to Jesus,
In His sweet presence abide,
Constantly trying to serve Him,
Safe and secure at His side.

Refrain
I would draw nearer to Jesus,
I would draw nearer to Him;
Fully surrendered each moment,
I would draw nearer to Him.

I would draw nearer to Jesus,
Nothing witholding from Him,
Knowing He loves to be gracious,
I would draw nearer to Him.

I would draw nearer to Jesus,
Seeking His strength to be true,
Willing to tell of His goodness,
Gladly His blest will to do.

title:
Mqyq Te Sq Yesu
I Would Be Like Jesus
songEN:
Wiase 'nigye refrq me kwa;
Mqyq te sq Yesu;
Wiase remfa me dommum da,
Mqyq te sq Yesu.

Nnyeso
Mqsq Yesu, me dwom ni,
Wx ofie ne nnipa mu;
Mqsq Yesu daa nyinaa,
Mqyq te sq Yesu.

Wabubu mpoky'rq nyinaa mu
Mqyq te sq Yesu;
Na me kra 'tum' asom No yie,
Mqyq te sq Yesu.

Merefi fam kx 'nuonyam mu'i,
Mqyq te sq Yesu;
Mqkx so aka asqm no,
Mqyq te sq Yesu.

Sqnea Obehyia me s'ro nti,
Mqyq te sq Yesu;
Na Wama me 'Mo - ne - yx ' hx,
Mqyq te sq Yesu.

title:
Dua No Ho
Near the Cross
songEN:
Yesu, ma memmqm 'sqnnuan'
'Hx na asuti pá a
Qsa obiara yare
'Sen fi Kalbre bepxm'.

Nnyeso
Asqnnuan', asqnnuan',
Qne m'anuonyam daa
Kosi sq me kra benya;
Home asun' agya.

Xdx huu me duan' ase,
Xkra mmxborxni;
'Hx na 'Dekyee Nsoromma
Hyerqn twa me ho hyiae.

Dua no ho, Nyame 'Guammaa,
Anisoadehu mu;
Ma mennante daa nyinaa,
Wx ne sunsuma mu.

Dua no ho, mawqn matwqn
'Nidasom' daa nyinaa,
Kodu sika mpoano hx
Wx asu no agya.
songTWI:
Jesus, keep me near the cross;
there a precious fountain,
free to all, a healing stream,
flows from Calvary's mountain.

Refrain
In the cross, in the cross,
be my glory ever,
till my raptured soul shall find
rest beyond the river.

Near the cross, a trembling soul,
love and mercy found me;
there the bright and morning star
sheds its beams around me.

Near the cross! O Lamb of God,
bring its scenes before me;
help me walk from day to day
with its shadow o'er me.

Near the cross I'll watch and wait,
hoping, trusting ever,
till I reach the golden strand
just beyond the river.

title:
Sqnea Mete'i
Just as I Am
songEN:
Sqnea mete'i minni hwee ka,
Sq me nti Wuhwiee Wo mogya;
Na Worefrq me sq memmra,
Nyame 'Guammaa maba (maba).

Sqnea mete'i mintumi ntwqn,
Sq mqpopa bxne biako;
Wo mogya na qh'ro bxne,
Nyame 'Guammaa maba (maba).

Sqnea mete'i mayq pasaa,
Akyinnye ne ap'rep're mu;
Suro ne ko wx baabiara,
Nyame 'Guammaa maba (maba).

Sqnea mete'i ofuraeni;
Adehu ne adwenemtew.
Nea 'hia nyinaa, minya Wo mu,
Nyame 'Guammaa maba (maba).

Sqnea mete'i, Wobqgye me,
De af'ri me, atew me ho;
'Fisq megye Wo bxhyq di
Nyame 'Guammaa maba (maba).

Sqnea mete'i Wo dx a minnim,
Abubu 'kwanside ny'naa mu;
Afei meyq Wo nko de daa,
Nyame 'Guammaa maba (maba).
songTWI:
Just as I am, without one plea,
But that Thy blood was shed for me,
And that Thou bid'st me come to Thee,
O Lamb of God, I come.

Just as I am, and waiting not
To rid my soul of one dark blot,
To Thee whose blood can cleanse each spot,
O Lamb of God, I come.

Just as I am, though tossed about
With many a conflict, many a doubt;
"Fightings within, and fears without,"
O Lamb of God, I come.

Just as I am, poor, wretched, blind;
Sight, riches, healing of the mind,
Yea, all I need, in Thee I find,
O Lamb of God, I come.

Just as I am, Thou wilt receive,
Wilt welcome, pardon, cleanse, relieve;
Because Thy promise I believe,
O Lamb of God, I come.

Just as I am, Thy love I own
Has broken every barier down;
Now to be Thine, and Thine alone,
O Lamb of God, I come.

title:
Sqnea Mete'i
Just as I Am
songEN:
Sqnea mete'i minni hwee ka,
Sq me nti Wuhwiee Wo mogya;
Na Worefrq me sq memmra,
Nyame 'Guammaa maba (maba).
songTWI:
Just as I am, without one plea,
But that thy blood was shed for me,
And that thou bidst me come to thee,
O Lamb of God, I come, I come.

title:
Sq Me Ne Nyame Renantew
O for a Closer Walk!
songEN:
Sq me ne Nyame renantew
Xs'ro trabea mu a,
Hann bi bqhyerqn kwan no mu
Dem' akx 'Guammaan' nkyqn.

Ab'rxnoma kronkron, san bra!
'Home somafo pa:
Mikyi bxn' a qhyqqW' w'rqhow,
Pam Wo fii me ho no.

Asomdwoe mm're a minyae no,
Meda so kae no yie!
Agyaw bun bi wx me mu a,
Wiase ntum' nhyq no ma.

'Honi biara a minim no,
Sqnea qte biara,
Ma mentew mfi W'agua no ho,
Na mensom Wo nkutoo.
songTWI:
O, for a closer walk with God!
A calm and heavenly frame,
A light to shine upon the road
That leads me to the Lamb.

Return, O holy Dove! return,
Sweet messenger of rest;
I hate the sins that made Thee mourn,
And drove Thee from my breast.

What peaceful hours I once enjoyed!
How sweet their memory still!
But they have left an aching void
The world can never fill.

The dearest idol I have known,
What-e'er that idol be,
Help me to tear it from Thy throne,
And worship only Thee.

title:
Fa Wo Nkwa No Tra Me Mu
Live Out Thy Life Within Me
songEN:
Fa Wo nkwa no tra me mu,
Yesu, ahen' mu Hen'!
Wō ara yq me nsqmmisa
Horow nyinaa ho mmuae;
Fa Wo nkwa no tra me mu
Yq Wo pq ade ny'naam!
Na menyq ahwehwq a
Eyi W'anuonyam ky'rq.

Mede asxrfie no maW'
Wxatew ho fi bxnem;
Ma W'anuonyam kronkron no,
Nhyerqn m-fi me mu;
Na asase ny'naa nyq komm,
Na nipadua yi nyq
W'akoa hobrqasefo a
Otie Wo nko ara.

B're biara akwaa no ny'naa
Retwqn Wo frq anim,
Ayq krado sq Wo nko,
Wode bedi dwuma.
Enni ap'rep're hwee ho -
Na qnnwennwen nni yaw;
Enteetee Wo nneyeq ho,
Nnwen adwenhun' biara.

Masiesie me ho xdwo m',
Minni adwenkyeae bi;
Meretwqn Wo nsusui pa,
B're a Wuhia me no;
Fa Wo nkwa no tra me mu
Yesu, ahen' mu Hen'!
W'ankasa yq 'nuonyam mmuae
Ma me nsqmmisa ny'naa.
songTWI:
Live out Thy life within me,
O Jesus, King of kings!
Be Thou Thyself the answer
To all my questioning;
Live out Thy life within me,
In all things have Thy way!
I, the transparent medium
Thy glory to display.

The temple has been yielded,
And purified of sin;
Let Thy Shekinah glory
Now shine forth from within,
And all the earth keep silence,
The body henceforth be
Thy silent, gentle servant,
Moved only as by Thee.

Its members every moment
Held subject to Thy call,
Ready to have Thee use them,
Or not be used at all;
Held without restless longing,
Or strain, or stress, or fret
Or chafings at Thy dealings,
Or thoughts of vain regret.

But restful, calm, and pliant,
From bend and bias free,
Awaiting Thy decision,
When Thou hast need of me.
Live out Thy life within me,
O Jesus, King of kings!
Be Thou the glorious answer
To all my questionings

title:
Di M'anim Kx Kalbre
Lead Me to Calvary
songEN:
Me nkwa so Hen' mehyqW' henkyqw,
Wo na 'nuonyam wx Wo;
Mma me w'rq mmfi Wo nsxekyqw no,
Di m'anim kx Kalbre.

Nnyeso
Mma me w'rq mmfi Getsemane,
Mma me w'rq mmfi W'amanehun',
Mma me w'rq mmfi sq Wodx me,
Di m'anim kx Kalbre.

Ky'rqm' bodan a wosieeWo mu,
Nea wodii yaw sui no;
Abxfo a wofųrafųra hann
Wqn Wo wx Wo nnae mu.

Ma menyq sq Maria, memfa
Akyqde bi mmrq Wo;
Ky'rqm' bodan a qda mpan no,
Di m'anim kx Kalbre.

Ma memfa xpq, Aw'rade,
Nsoa m'asqnnua mma Wo;
W'aw'rqhowdi k'ruwa no mpo,
Wasoa ne ny'naa 'ma me.
songTWI:
King of my life, I crown Thee now,
Thine shall the glory be;
Lest I forget Thy thorn-crowned brow,
Lead me to Calvary.

Refrain
Lest I forget Gethsemane;
Lest I forget Thine agony;
Lest I forget Thy love for me,
Lead me to Calvary.

Show me the tomb where Thou wast laid,
Tenderly mourned and wept;
Angels in robes of light arrayed
Guarded Thee whilst Thou slept.

Let me like Mary, thru the gloom,
Come with a gift to Thee;
Show to me now the empty tomb,
Lead me to Calvary.

May I be willing, Lord, to bear
Daily my cross for Thee;
Even Thy cup of grief to share,
Thou hast borne all for me.

title:
'Sen Suky'rqma
Whiter Than Snow

Mepq Sq Meyq Kristoni
Lord, I Want to Be a Christian
songEN:
Mepq sq meyq Kristoni
Me komam', me komam';
Mepq sq meyq Kristoni
Me komam', Me komam', Me komam',
Mepq sq meyq Kristoni Me komam'.

'W'ra, mepq sq meyq dxfo
Me komam', me komam',
'W'ra, mepq sq meyq dxfo
Me komam', Me komam', Me komam',
'W'ra, mepq sq meyq dxfo Me komam'.

'W'ra, mepq sq meyq Kronkron
Me komam', me komam',
'W'ra, mepq sq meyq Kronkron
Me komam', Me komam', Me komam',
'W'ra, mepq sq meyq Kronkron Me komam'.

'W'ra, mepq sq mesq Yesu
Me komam', me komam',
'W'ra, mepq sq mesq Yesu
Me komam', Me komam', Me komam',
'W'ra, mepq sq mesq Yesu Me komam'.
songTWI:
Lord, I want to be a Christian in my heart, in my heart;
Lord, I want to be a Christian in my heart.
In my heart, In my heart,
Lord, I want to be a Christian in my heart.

Lord, I want to be a loving in my heart, in my heart;
Lord, I want to be a loving in my heart.
In my heart, In my heart,
Lord, I want to be a loving in my heart.

Lord, I want to be a more holy in my heart, in my heart;
Lord, I want to be a more holy in my heart.
In my heart, In my heart,
Lord, I want to be a more holy in my heart.

Lord, I want to be a like Jesus in my heart, in my heart;
Lord, I want to be a like Jesus in my heart.
In my heart, In my heart,
Lord, I want to be a like Jesus in my heart.

title:
Abxde W'ra, Ayeyi Ny'naa Wx Wo
Lord of Creation
songEN:
Abxde W'ra, ayeyi ny'naa wx Wo,
Wo nnwuma yq kqse, W'akwan yq nwanwa!
W'anuonyam ne Wo tumi tra y'adwen,
Nanso Wotra 'hobrqaseni koma mu.

Tumi ny'naa W'ra, mede me pq ma Wo,
Mede setie bqyq W'adwuma 'nigyem;
Wo som ayq ahofadi ne nnwom;
Mehyq Wo nsa a, me mm'rqwyq dan denhyq.

Nyansa ny'naa W'ra, mede m'adwen ma Wo,
Mehwehwq nokwar' a qtra adwen ny'naa;
Nea aniwa nhui, na aso ntee da,
Wo Honhom ky'rq, na qhy'rqn fi W'asqm mu.

Ade ny'naa W'ra, mede m'ade ma Wo,
Sq mepo Wo a misunti hwe ase;
Mesom Wo yq setie ma W'asqm a,
Mqnante W'ahofadim' akx awiei.
songTWI:
Lord of creation, to You be all praise!
Most mighty Your working, most wondrous Your ways!
Your glory and might are beyond us to tell,
And yet in the heart of the humble You dwell.

Lord of all power, I give You my will,
In joyful obedience Your tasks to fulfill.
Your bondage is freedom; Your service is song;
And held in Your keeping, my weakness is strong.

Lord of all wisdom, I give You my mind,
Rich truth that surpasses man's knowledge to find;
What eye has not seen and what ear has nor heard
Is taught by Your Spirit and shines from Your Word.

Lord of all being, I give You my all;
If I ever disown You, I stumble and fall;
But led in Your service Your word to obey,
I'll walk in Your freedom to the end of the way.

title:
Yesu Medo Wo, Minim Sq Wowx Me
My Jesus, I Love Thee

Hwee Nni Ntam
Nothing Between
songEN:
Hwee nni me kra ne Agyenkwa no ntam,
Wiase ha nneqma, edi huammx;
Magyaw bxne ne emu dqw nyinaa -
Yesu wx me! B'ribiara nni ntam.

Nnyeso
Hwee nni me kra ne Agyenkwa ntam,
Sqnea mehu N'anim fqfq no;
Hwee rensi Ne dom no mu biara ho kwan
Ma kwan nyq peteč a b'ribi nni ntam

Hwee nni ntam te sq wiase anigye
Xbra mu suban, sq qte biara
Nni sq qtew me koma fi Ne ho -
M'ade ne No! B'ribiara nni ntam.

Hwee nni ntam, mpo sxhwq dennen horow,
Sq wiase yi ny'naa bom tia me a,
Mede mpaebx bqtwqn 'hopakyi mu
Medi nkonim! B'ribi remma ntam.
songTWI:
Nothing between my soul and the Savior,
Naught of this world's delusive dream:
I have renounced all sinful pleasure-
Jesus is mine! There's nothing between.

Refrain
Nothing between my soul and Savior,
So that His blessed face may be seen;
Nothing preventing the least of His favor:
Keep the way clear! Let nothing between.

Nothing between, like worldly pleasure:
Habits of life, though harmless they seem,
Must not my heart from Him ever sever-
He is my all! There's nothing between.

Nothing between, eén many hard trials,
Though the whole world against me convene;
Watching with prayer and much self denial-
Triumph at last, With nothing between!

title:
Anka Manya Komá a Bxn' Nnim
O for a Heart to Praise My God!
songEN:
Anka manya komá a bxn nnim
Ayi me Nyame ayq!
Koma a qte mogyan' a
Wuhwie maa me no nka.

'Hobrqase ne xdwo koma,
Me Gyefo pa 'hengua;
Nea Kristo nko na Xkasa
Na Odi mu hen' no.

Koma a wxayq no fof'ro
Na s'ro dx ahyq ma;
Qtene, yq kronn ne papa
Te sq Wo de no, 'W'ra.

'W'ra, ma me Wo su pa no bi
Fi xs'ro bra ntqm so;
Ky'rqw Wo din fof'ro me komam',
Wo Dx din fof'ro no.
songTWI:
O for a heart to praise my God!
A heart from sin set free,
A heart that always feels Thy blood,
So freely shed for me.

A heart resigned, submissive, meek,
My dear Redeemer's throne,
Where only Christ is heard to speak,
Where Jesus reigns alone.

A heart in every thought renewed,
And full of love divine,
Perfect, and right, and pure, and good,
A copy, Lord, of Thine.

Thy nature, gracious Lord, impart;
Come quickly from above;
Write Thy new name upon my heart,
Thy new, best name of Love.

title:
Sqnea Mete'i Mqyq Wo De
Just as I Am, Thine Own to Be
songEN:
Sqnea mete'i mqyq Wo de,
Mmabun Damfo a Wodx me;
Na matew me ho ama Wo:
Yesu Kristo, maba.

M'anigye anxpa no mu
Metuam' bxhyq de me nkwa ama,
Merentwentwqn mfa b'ribi nsie,
Mede me komā aba.

Mqtra Wo hann no mu daa daa,
Na mayq nnwuma pa nkutoo;
De m'ahoxden ny'naa asom Wo;
Enti maba Wo nkyqn.

Meyq 'babun hoxdenfo yi,
Mqyq nea metumi biara
Ama nokwar', trenee, ne Wo:
Me nkwa Wura, maba.
songTWI:
Just as I am, Thine own to be,
Friend of the young, who lovest me,
To consecrate myself to Thee,
O Jesus Christ, I come.

In the glad morning of my day,
My life to give, my vows to pay,
With no reserve and no delay,
With all my heart I come.

I would live ever in the light;
I would work ever for the right;
I would serve Thee with all my might;
Therefore, to Thee I come.

Just as I am, young, strong, and free,
To be the best that I can be
For truth, and righteousness, and Thee,
Lord of my life, I come.

title:
Yesu, Mama M'asqnnua So
Jesus, I My Cross Have Taken
songEN:
Yesu, mama m'asqnnua so
Migyaw wiase di W'akyi;
Hwq, magyaw ade nyinaa mu,
Qnnq Wone me kyqfa;
Sq m'adxde nyinaa year,
Na m'anidaso sa a,
M'asetra mu yq anigye,
B're a Aw'rade wx me.

Ma wiase mpo me, wonnyaw me,
Wxagyaw m'Agyenkwa no nso;
Koma ne xbra daadaa me,
Wo de Woyq nokwafo.
Sq Wode Wo dx gya me a,
Xyaw bi ntumi nhaw me;
Wode Wo dx hinta me a,
Minni anigye biara.

Qnde xkra, bu wo nkwagye,
Po bxne, ehu, dadwen;
Nya dqw a wxde hu 'dwuma
Ne asodi baabėara:
Hu Honhom a qte wo mu,
Agya no res're ky'rq wo;
Hu sq Yesu wui de gyee wo,
Nyame ba, worenwiinwii?

Fi dom mu kx 'nuonyam mu ntqm,
Fa gyidi ne mpaebx mia;
Xs'ro nnasanten da w'anim,
Nyame nsa bqsx wo mu.
Wo fam ha dwumadi bqsa,
W'akwantu nna nso betwam';
Anidaso bqsow aba,
Mpaebx bqdan ayeyi.

title:
Bue M'amiwa Na Ma Minhu
Open My Eyes, That I May See
songEN:
Bue m'aniwa na ma minhu
Nokwar' a Wowx ma me no.
Fa safoa nwanwa no ma me na
Emmue me, mma me faw'hodi.
Mayq komm retwqn Wo sqnea
Mehu Wo pq no, me Nyame,
Bue m'aniwa, na hy'rqn me mu,
Xs'ro Honhom.

Bue m'asomu na ma mente
Nokwar' a Wowx ma me no;
Na sq qkasa gu m'asom' a
At'rosqm ny'naa 'guan afi mu
Mayq komm retwqn Wo sqnea
Mehu Wo pq no, me Nyame;
Bue m'asom', na hyerqn me mu,
Xs'ro Honhom.

Bue m'ano na memfa 'nigye
N-ka nokwar' wx baabiara;
Bue me koma mu na mensiesie
Me ho ne Wo mma nkyq dx no.
Mayq komm retwqn Wo sqnea
Mehu Wo pq no, me Nyame
Bue m'anomu, na hy'rqn me mu,
Xs'ro Honhom.
songTWI:
Open my eyes, that I may see
Glimpses of truth Thou hast for me;
Place in my hands the wonderful key
That shall unclasp and set me free.
Silently now I wait for Thee,
Ready, my God, Thy will to see;
Open my eyes, illumine me, Spirit Divine!

Open my ears that I may hear
Voices of truth Thou sendest clear;
and while the wavenotes fall on my ear,
Everything false will disappear.
Silently now I wait for Thee,
Ready, my God, Thy will to see;
Open my ears, illumine me, Spirit Divine!

Open my mouth, and let me bear
Gladly the warm truth everywhere;
Open my heart, and let me prepare
Love with Thy children thus to share.
Silently now I wait for Thee,
Ready, my God, Thy will to see;
Open my heart, illumine me, Spirit Divine!

title:
Mepq Yesu Mmom Sen Sika Ne Dwetq
I'd Rather Have Jesus
songTWI:
I'd rather have Jesus than silver or gold,
I'd rather be His than have riches untold;
I'd rather have Jesus than houses or lands,
I'd rather be led by His nail pierced hand.

Refrain
Than to be the King of a vast domain
Or be held in sin's dread sway;
I'd rather have Jesus than anything
This world affords today.

I'd rather have Jesus than men's applause,
I'd rather be faithful to His dear cause;
I'd rather have Jesus than worldwide fame,
I'd rather be true to His holy name.

He's fairer than lilies of rarest bloom,
He's sweeter than honey from out the comb;
He's all that my hungering spirit needs,
I'd rather have Jesus and let Him lead.

title:
So Yesu Nko Nsoa 'Sqnnua No
Must Jesus Bear the Cross Alone
songEN:
So Yesu nko nsoa 'sqnnua no
Na wiase ny'naa nkx kwa?
Dabi, obiara wx 'sqnnua;
'Sqnnua wx hx ma me.

Mqsoa asqnnua kronkron no
Kosi s'Xbqpxn me;
Na makx fie 'kxhyq 'henkyqw
'Henkyqw wx hx ma me.

Megyina 'hwehwq 'bxnten hx,
Kristo nan no ase;
De me sika kyqw ato hx
Na mabx Ne din no.
songTWI:
Must Jesus bear the cross alone,
And all the world go free?
No, there's a cross for everyone,
And there's a cross for me.

The consecrated cross I'll bear
Till He shall set me free;
And then go Index my crown to wear,
For there's a crown for me.

Upon the crystal pavement, down
At Jesus' pierced feet,
With joy I'll cast my golden crown,
And His dear name repeat.

title:
Fa Wiase, Na Ma Me Yesu
Take the Wold, But Give Me Jesus
songTWI:
Take the world, but give me Jesus,
Sweetest comfort of my soul;
With my Savior watching o'er me,
I can sing, though billows roll.

Refrain
Oh, the height and depth of mercy!
Oh, the length and breadth of love!
Oh, the fullness of redemption,
Pledge of endless life above

Take the world, but give me Jesus;
Let me view his constant smile;
Then throughout my pilgrim journey
Light will cheer me all the while.

Take the world, but give me Jesus;
In His cross my trust shall be
Till, with clearer, brighter vision,
Face to face my Lord I see.

title:
Gye Me Bra, Me Wura Ma
Take My Life and Let It Be
songEN:
Gye me bra, me Wura ma
Memfa nhyq Wo nsa koraa;
Gye me nsa na ma qnyq
Nea Wo dx nko bqkyerq.
Nea Wo dx nko bqkyerq.

Gye me nan na ma qho
Nyq hare nsx Wo ani;
Gye me nne na ma mento
Dwom mma me Hene daa daa.
Dwom mma me Hene daa daa.

Gye m'anofafa na ma
W'asqmpa no nhyq mu ma;
Gye me dwetq ne sika,
Emu ban mpo meremfa.
Emu ban mpo meremfa.

Gye me pq fa yq Wo de,
Qrenyq me de bi-o;
Gye me koma, Wo dč ampa;
Qbqyq Wo ahengua.
Qbqyq Wo ahengua.

Gye me dx m'Awurade,
Mihwie gu wo nan ase;
Gye me ne m'ade nyinaa,
Mqyq Wo nko Wo de daa,
Mqyq Wo nko Wo de daa.
songTWI:
Take my life, and let it be
Consecrated, Lord, to Thee;
Take my hands, and let them move
At the impulse of Thy love,
At the impulse of Thy love.

Take my feet, and let them be
Swift and beautiful for Thee;
Take my voice, and let me sing
Always, only, for my King,
Always, only, for my King.

Take my lips, and let them be
Filled with messages from Thee;
Take my silver and my gold,
Not a mite would I withhold,
Not a mite would I withhold.

Take my will and make it Thine;
It shall be no longer mine;
Take my heart, it is Thine own!
It shall be Thy royal throne,
It shall be Thy royal throne.

Take my love; my Lord, I pour
At Thy feet its treasure store;
Take myself, and I will be,
Ever, only, all for Thee,
Ever, only, all for Thee.

title:
O Yesu Mahyq Wo Bx
O Jesus, I Have Promised
songEN:
O Yesu mahyq Wo bx
Sq mqsom Wo daa daa,
Twiw bqn me bere nyinaam',
Me Wura, m'Adamfo;
Merensuro xko no,
Sq Wowx m'afa a
Meremman mfi kwan no so,
Na Woyqm' Kannifo.

Ma minhu sq Wobqn me,
Wiase yi bqn me de;
Nso b'ribi gyegye m'ani;
Mete nnaadaa nnyigyei.
M'atamfo bqn me dodo,
Wxatwa me ho ahyia
Nso, Yesu, twiw bqn me yie,
Gye me kra fi bxnem'.

O, Yesu, Woahyq wxn a
Wodi W'akyi bx sq,
W'anuonyam mu nea Wowx,
Wo nkoa nso bqba hx.
Na Yesu, mahyq Wo bx
Sq mqsom Wo daa daa,
O, ma me dom nni W'akyi
Me Wura, m'Adamfo.
songTWI:
O Jesus, I have promised
To serve thee to the end;
be thou forever near me,
My Master and my friend.
I shall not fear the battle
If thou art by my side,
nor wander from the pathway
If thou wilt be my guide.

O let me feel thee near me!
The world is ever near;
I see the sights that dazzle,
The tempting sounds I hear;
my foes are ever near me,
Around me and within;
but Jesus, draw thou nearer,
And shield my soul from sin.

O Jesus, thou hast promised
To all who follow thee
that where thou art in glory
There shall thy servant be.
And Jesus, I have promised
To serve thee to the end;
O give me grace to follow,
My Master and my Friend.

title:
Afei Mahu Mogya 'S'rxkye
The Cleansing Wave
songEN:
Afei mahu mogya 's'rxkye,
Saa bura kqse no;
Yesu, me W'rā a Xgye nkwa no,
Ky'rq Ne mfem p'ratwa no.

Nnyeso
Mihu nsu a qtew ho no,
Metx mu ma qtew me ho;
Munyi Awurade ayq!
Na atew me ho ampa'ra.

Mihu abxde fof'ro no,
Mete mogya no nne;
Qkasa ma bxnesu wu
Nsu a qtew ho nom'.

Mesxr' nante s'ro hann no mu
Fi wiase bxnem wx
Koma kronn ne 'tade fitaá a
Kristo di mu Hen' mu.

Xdom nwanwa, s'ro aba fam,
Mete mogya no nka;
Na me Yesu nko na Onim,
Yesų a wokum No no.
songTWI:
O now I see the crimson wave,
The fountain deep and wide;
Jesus, my Lord, mighty to save,
Points to His wounded side.

Refrain
The cleansing stream I see, I see,
I plunge, and O, it cleanseth me!
O praise the Lord! it cleanseth me,
It cleanseth me, yes, cleanseth me.

I see the new creation rise,
I hear the speaking blood;
It speaks-polluted nature dies,
Sinks' neath the cleansing flood.

I rise to walk in heaven's own light,
Above the world and sin;
With heart made pure and garments white,
And Christ enthroned within.

Amazing grace! 'tis heaven below
To feel the blood applied,
And Jesus, only Jesus, know,
My Jesus crucified.

title:
'Suboni No Nteam Wx Yordan
On Jordan's Banks the Baptist's Cry
songTWI:
On Jordan's banks the Baptist's cry
Announces that the Lord is nigh;
Awake and hearken, for he brings
Glad tidings of the King of kings!

Then cleansed be every life from sin;
Make straight the way for God within,
And let us all our hearts prepare
For Christ to come and enter there.

We hail You as our Savior, Lord,
Our refuge and our great reward;
Without Your grace we waste away
Like flow'rs that wither and decay.

Stretch forth Your hand, our health restore,
And make us rise to fall no more;
Oh, let Your face upon us shine
And fill the world with love divine.

title:
Wo, Nhyira Biara Nsuti, Bra!
Come, Thou Fount of Every Blessings
songEN:
Wo, nhyira biara nsuti, bra!
Mam' koma nto W'ayeyi;
Mmxb'rxhun' nsu a qsen daa,
Gye yqn hx ah'rusi nnwom.
Ky'rq me ma mentontom Wo daa;
Na menky'rq Wo papayq,
B'rč a daa 'nuonyam anidaso
De dqw ne dx hyqm' kra ma.

Ha na misi m'Ebeneser,
Ha na Wo dom nti, maba;
W'anisx nti, m'ani da so
Sq merebedu fie dwoo.
Yesu hwehwqq me, hxho a
Mifi Nyame buwm' fom kwan;
Xde N'adehye mogya no
Pata yii me fii mmusum.

Xdom nti meyq xkafo,
Etwa sq meyq saa daa;
Wo papayq nkxnsxnkxnsxn
Nkyekky're me mmx Wo ho den.
'Wura, akobx wx me bram',
Metaa migyaw me Nyame,
Me koma ni, O sx ano
Sx ano ma s'ro man.
songTWI:
Come, thou Fount of every blessing,
tune my heart to sing thy grace;
streams of mercy, never ceasing,
call for songs of loudest praise.
Teach me some melodious sonnet,
sung by flaming tongues above.
Praise the mount! I'm fixed upon it,
mount of thy redeeming love.

Here I raise mine Ebenezer;
hither by thy help I'm come;
and I hope, by thy good pleasure,
safely to arrive at Index.
Jesus sought me when a stranger,
wandering from the fold of God;
he, to rescue me from danger,
interposed his precious blood.

O to grace how great a debtor
daily I'm constrained to be!
Let thy goodness, like a fetter,
bind my wandering heart to thee.
Prone to wander, Lord, I feel it,
prone to leave the God I love;
here's my heart, O take and seal it,
seal it for thy courts above.

title:
Kristo Apata 'Ma Bxne
What a Wonderful Savior
songEN:
Kristo apata 'ma bxne,
Gyefo nwanwani bqn ni!
Watua bxne ka agye yqn;
Gyefo nwanwani bqn ni!

Nnyeso
Xgyefo nwanwani bqn ne
Yesu, me Yesu!
Xgyefo nwanwani bqn ne
Yesu, me W'ra!

Miyi N'ayq, Ne mogya nti,
Gyefo nwanwani bqn ni!
Esiesie me ne Nyame ntam,
Gyefo nwanwani bqn ni!

Xne me nam kwan nyinaa so,
Gyefo nwanwani bqn ni!
Xma meyq nokwar'difo,
Gyefo nwanwani bqn ni!.

Xma me nkonimdi tumi,
Gyefo nwanwani bqn ni!
Ma midi nkonim b're ny'naa mu;
Gyefo nwanwani bqn ni!
songTWI:
Christ has for sin atonement made,
What a wonderful Savior!
We are redeemed! the price is paid!
What a wonderful Savior!

Refrain
What a wonderful Savior is Jesus, my Jesus!
What a wonderful Savior is Jesus, my Lord!

I praise Him for the cleansing blood,
What a wonderful Savior!
That reconciled my soul to God;
What a wonderful Savior!

He walks beside me all the way,
What a wonderful Savior!
And keeps me faithful day by day;
What a wonderful Savior!

He gives me overcoming power,
What a wonderful Savior!
And triumph in each trying hour;
What a wonderful Savior!

title:
Bura Bi Wx Hx Mogya Ma
There Is a Fountain
songEN:
Bura bi wx hx mogya ma
Efi Immanuel mfem';
Nnebxn'yqfo bqtx mu a,
Wxn ho fi nyinaa pa.

Owifo no, xde dqw huu
'Bura no ne b're so;
Hx na me ho fi te sq nō a,
Mqh'ro me bxn' nyinaa.

Guammá a Worewu! Wo mogya
Tumi no rempa da,
Kosi sq Nyame mma benya
Nkwa agyae bxne yq.

Efi dá a mihuu nsu no a
Efi N'akrum sen no,
Nkwagye dx no n'ayq m'adwen
N'qbqyq m'adwen daa.

Wura, minim sq Woasiesie,
Ewom, memfata de,
Woasiesie mogyā atxde pa,
Sika sanku amam'!

Mqto Wo gye tum' no ho dwom
Anuonyam dwom dqdq.
Dá a me tqkrqma pemee yi
Benyan afi xdam'.
songTWI:
There is a fountain filled with blood
drawn from Emmanuel's veins;
and sinners plunged beneath that flood
lose all their guilty stains.
Lose all their guilty stains, lose all their guilty stains;
and sinners plunged beneath that flood
lose all their guilty stains.

The dying thief rejoiced to see
that fountain in his day;
and there may I, though vile as he,
wash all my sins away.
Wash all my sins away, wash all my sins away;
and there may I, though vile as he,
wash all my sins away.

Thou dying Lamb!, thy precious blood
shall never lose its power
till all the ransomed church of God
be saved, to sin no more.
Be saved, to sin no more, be saved, to sin no more;
till all the ransomed church of God
be saved, to sin no more.

E'er since, by faith, I saw the stream
thy flowing wounds supply,
redeeming love has been my theme,
and shall be till I die.
And shall be till I die, and shall be till I die;
redeeming love has been my theme,
and shall be till I die.

Lord, I believe Thow hast prepared,
Unworthy though I be,
For me a blood-bought, free reward
A golden harp for me!
A golden harp for me! A golden harp for me!
For me a blood-bought, free reward
A golden harp for me!

There in a nobler, sweeter song,
I'll sing thy power to save,
when this poor lisping, stammering tongue
Is ransomed form the grave,
Is ransomed form the grave, Is ransomed form the grave,
when this poor lisping, stammering tongue
Is ransomed form the grave.

title:
Wxagyem'
Redeemed!
songEN:
Wxagye me nkwa! Anigyesqm ni!
'Guammaa no mogya agye me;
N'ahummxbx kqse agye me,
Na mayq Ne ba afebxx.

Nnyeso
Wxagyem', Wxagyem'
'Guammaa no mogya agye me;
Wxagyem', Wxagyem'
Na mayq Ne ba afebxx.

Wxagye me na m'ani gye Yesum'!
M'anigye no, wontumi nka,
Na minim sq N'ahoyi hann no
Da so ne me wx hx daa daa.

Minim sq 'henkyqw bi retwqn me
Wx s'ro fie a qhy'rqn no mu;
Na qrenkyq me ne 'hotefo
Ne 'W'rade bqtra afebxx.
songTWI:
Redeemed! how I love to proclaim it!
Redeemed by the blood of the Lamb;
Redeemed through His infinite mercy,
His child, and forever, I am.

Refrain
Redeemed, redeemed,
Redeemed by the blood of the Lamb;
Redeemed, redeemed,
His child, and forever, I am.

Redeemed! and so happy in Jesus!
No language my rapture can tell;
I know that the light of His presence
With me doth continually dwell.

I know there's a crown that is waiting
In yonder bright mansion for me;
And soon, with the saints made perfect,
At Index with the Lord I shall be.

title:
Wxagyem'
Redeemed!
songEN:
Wxagye me nkwa! Anigyesqm ni!
'Guammaa no mogya agye me;
N'ahummxbx kqse agye me,
Na mayq Ne ba afebxx.

Nnyeso
Wxagyem', Wxagyem'
'Guammaa no mogya agye me
Wxagye me nkwa! Anigyesqm ni!
Na mayq Ne ba afebxx.

Medwen me hyirafo Gyefo ho.
Medwen Ne ho da mu nyinaa,
Meto dwom 'fisq mintum' nyq komm;
Ne dx ne me dwom nnyinaso.

Minim sq mehu Wx N'ahoxfqm'
'Hen' a m'ani gye Ne mm'ra ho;
Xnam xdx so wqn m'anammxn,
Na Xma me nnwom anadwo.
songTWI:
Redeemed, how I love to proclaim it!
Redeemed by the blood of the Lamb;
Redeemed thro' His infinite mercy,
His child, and forever, I am.

Refrain
Redeemed, redeemed,
Redeemed by the blood of the Lamb;
Redeemed, how I love to proclaim it!
His child and forever I am.

I think of my blessed Redeemer,
I think of Him all the day long;
I sing, for I cannot be silent;
His love is the theme of my song.

I know I shall see in His beauty
The King in whose law I delight,
Who lovingly guardeth my footsteps,
And giveth me songs in the night.

title:
Nyankopxn Ne Me Nkwagye
God Is My Strong Salvation
songEN:
Nyankopxn ne me nkwagye,
Mensuro 'tamfo bqn?
Esum ne sxhwq b're mu,
Me Hann ne me Mmoa bqn:
Dxm ky're me so nsraban a
Megyina den ko nom';
Dqn na ebeyi me hu
Nyame wx m'afa yi?

Nya 'W'rade mu 'hotoso;
Me kra twqn boxd'ru mu;
Me nokwar' nyq w'ahoxden,
Wx wo mm'rqwyq ny'naa mu.
N'ahoxden nhyq wo kra den,
Ne dx mma wo 'nigye;
N'adxe mma wo nkwa tenten
'W'rade bqmaw' 'somdwoe.

title:
Yqate Nne Dqdq Bi Sq
Jesus Saves
songEN:
Yqate nne dqdq bi sq,
Yesu tumi gye nkwa;
Trqw anigyesqm no mu,
Yesu tumi gye nkwa.
Bx amanneq no mmaa ny'naa
Foro mmepx na twa po,
Onyame se, kx anim,
Yesu tumi gye nkwa.

Ma 's'rxkye mmx no brqoo sq
Yesu tumi gye nkwa;
Ma bxnefo nyinaa nte,
Yesu tumi gye nkwa;
Qpo so nsupxw monto,
Na po abodan nnye so,
'Sase bedi ah'rusi,
Yesu tumi gye nkwa.

To bua akosqm no so,
Yesu tumi gye nkwa;
Ne wu ne Ne daa nkwa nti,
Yesu tumi gye nkwa;
To no brqoo wx xhaw mu
B're a koma hwehwq 'dom
To di owu so nkonim,
Yesu tumi gye nkwa.

Ma qnne nwosow kqse,
Yesu tumi gye nkwa:
Ma aman ani nnye nnq,
Yesu tumi gye nkwa.
Teqm ka nkwagye ho asqm
Nkoko so ne ntok'ru mu
Yqn nkonimdi dwom ne sq,
Yesu tumi gye nkwa.
songTWI:
Jesus saves, Jesus saves;
Spread the gladness all around,
Jesus saves, Jesus saves;
Bear the news to every land,
Climb the steeps and cross the waves,
Onward, 'tis our Lord's command,
Jesus saves, Jesus saves.

Waft it on the rolling tide,
Jesus saves, Jesus saves;
Tell to sinners, far and wide,
Jesus saves, Jesus saves;
Sing, ye islands of the sea.
Echo back, ye ocean caves,
Earth shall keep her jubilee,
Jesus saves, Jesus saves.

Sing above the battle's strife,
Jesus saves, Jesus saves;
By His death and endless life,
Jesus saves, Jesus saves;
Sing it softly through the gloom,
When the heart for mercy craves,
Sing in triumph o'er the tomb,
Jesus saves, Jesus saves.

Give the winds a mighty voice,
Jesus saves, Jesus saves;
Let the nations now rejoice,
Jesus saves, Jesus saves;
Shout salvation full and free,
Highest hills and deepest caves,
This our song of victory,
Jesus saves, Jesus saves.

title:
Anuonyam Nka Nyame
To God Be the Glory
songEN:
Anuonyam nka Nyame, nea Wayq no so,
Sq Xdxx wiase de Ne Ba no kyqq yqn;
Na Xde Ne nkwa yqq bxne ho mpata,
Na Obuee nkwa pon sq emu na yqnhyqn.

Nnyeso
Yi Aw'rade ayq, ma 'sase nte Ne nne;
Yi Aw'rade ayq, ma amansan 'ni nnye,
Momfa 'Ba Yesu so mmra Agya no nkyqn;
Monhyq No anuonyam na nea Wayq so.

Nkwagye a edi mu mogya atxde,
Qyq Nyame bxhyq ma nea xgye di;
Bxn'yqfo a xgye di nokwarem no,
Nya Yesu nkyqn faf'ri amonom hx ara.

Nea Wakyerq yqn ne nea Wayq no so,
Yqn anigye so wx Xba Yesu mu;
Nanso dá a yebehu Yesu anim no,
Qbqyq nwanwa, yqn ani bqgye pii.
songTWI:
To God be the glory, great things he hath done!
So loved he the world that he gave us his Son,
Who yielded his life an atonement for sin,
And opened the lifegate that all may go in.

Refrain
Praise the Lord, praise the Lord,
Let the earth hear his voice!
Praise the Lord, praise the Lord,
Let the people rejoice!
O come to the Father thru Jesus the Son,
And give him the glory, great things he hath done!

O perfect redemption, the purchase of blood,
To every believer the promise of God;
The vilest offender who truly believes,
That moment from Jesus a pardon receives.

Great things he hath taught us, great things he hath done,
And great our rejoicing thru Jesus the Son;
But purer, and higher, and greater will be
Our wonder, our transport, when Jesus we see.

title:
Fof'royq Mfitiase Da Ne Nnq
Is This a Day of New Beginnings?
songEN:
Fof'royq mfitiase da ne nnq,
B'rč a yqkae na yqkx anim,
De gyidi gye nea xdx de ma,
Na yqto yqn yaw nyinaa gu?

So asase so mmere horow
A qredi wia ho kyinhia,
Begyina onipa baako so,
Aky'rq b'ribi fof'ro nhyqase?

Nso qnam Yesu bra ne Ne wu,
Xdx Honhom a Wonsakra,
Betum' ama yqn wiase s'ronko
B're a 'nidaso yq fof'ro.

Qnde yqmfa honhom mu 'boxd'ru,
N-tu anammxn nkx y'anim,
Nnyaw basamtu ne komam' yawdi,
Mfa w'rqhyem' nhwehwq kwan fof'ro.

Kristo te ase, n'Odi y'anim
Ky'rq yqn nea xdx tumi yq
'Yi yq fof'royq mfitiase dá a
Nyame reyq nneqma fof'ro.
songTWI:
Is this a day of new beginnings,
Time to remember and move on,
Time to believe what love is bringing,
Laying to rest the pain that's gone?

How can the seasons of a planet
Mindlessly spinning round its sun
With just a human name and number
Say that some new thing has begun?

Yet thro' the life and death of Jesus
Love's mighty Spirit, now as then,
Can make for us a world of difference
As faith and hope are born again.

Then let us, with the Spirit's daring,
Step from the past and leave behind
Its disappointment, guilt, and grieving,
Seeking new paths, and sure to find.

Christ is alive, and goes before us
To show and share what love can do.
This is a day of new beginnings;
Our God is making all things new.

title:
Mqto Me Gyefo No Ho Dwom
I Will Sing of My Redeemer
songEN:
Mqto me Gyefo no ho dwom,
N'anwanwa dx kqse no;
Ohuu amane dua no so,
Faa mmusu mu de gyee me.

Nnyeso
Mqto me Gyefo no ho dwom,
Xde Ne mogya txx me;
Maa me faf'ri 'sqnnua no so
Na minyaa ahofadi.

Mqka 'nwanwasqm no aky'rq
Sq me n-kwagye no nti,
Ofi dx ne mmxb'rxhun' mu
Yqq mpata maa bxne kwa.

Mqto me Gyefo no ho dwom,
Ne soro dx kqse no;
Xde me fi wum' aba nkwam'
Na Wayq me Nyame ba.
songTWI:
I will sing of my Redeemer,
And His wondrous love to me;
On the cruel cross He suffered
From the curse to set me free.

Refrain
Sing, Oh, sing of my Redeemer,
With His blood He purchased me;
On the cross He sealed my pardon,
Paid the debt and made me free.

I will tell the wondrous story,
How my lost estate to save,
In His boundless love and mercy,
He the ransom freely gave.

I will sing of my Redeemer,
And His heav'nly love to me;
He from death to life hath brought me,
Son of God, with Him to be.

title:
'W'ra, Medx W'ahemman
I Love Thy Kingdom, Lord
songEN:
'W'ra, medx W'ahemman;
Fie a Wote mu no,
Asafo a Gyefo hy'rafon'
De Ne mogya gyee no.

'W'ra, medx W'asafo,
N'afasu wx W'anim;
Sq W'aniwa k'rutiayisi
A wxaky'rqw no Wo nsam.

Ne soro akwan no
B'ro m'anigye ny'naa so,
Emu nkitahodi, bxhyq,
'Yeyi ne 'dx nnwom no.

Sq Wo nokwar' tim no,
Wxbqma kųro Sion
'Sase 'nuonyam a qkyqn so
Na qhy'rqn wx soro.
songTWI:
I love thy kingdom, Lord,
the house of thine abode,
the church our blest Redeemer saved
with his own precious blood.

I love thy church, O God!
Her walls before thee stand
dear as the apple of thine eye,
and graven on thy hand.

Beyond my highest joy
I prize her heavenly ways,
her sweet communion, solemn vows,
her hymns of love and praise.

Sure as thy truth shall last,
to Zion shall be given
the brightest glories earth can yield,
and brighter bliss of heaven.

title:
Kristo Ne Wiase Hann
Christ Is the World's True Light
songTWI:
Christ is the world's true light,
Its captain of salvation,
The daystar clear and bright
Of every man and nation;
New life, new hope awakes
Where'er men own His sway:
Freedom her bondage breaks,
And night is turned to day.

In Christ all races meet,
Their ancient feuds forgeting,
The whole round world complete,
From sunrise to its setting:
When Christ is throned as Lord,
Men shall forsake their fear,
To plowshare beat the sword,
To pruning hook the spear.

One Lord, in one great name
Unite us all who own Thee,
Cast out our pride and shame
That hinder to enthrone Thee;
The world has waited long,
Has travailed long in pain,
To heal its ancient wrong,
Come, Prince of Peace, and reign.

title:
'Wura a Woma W'asafo 'Yaresa
Lord, Who Dost Give to Thy Church
songEN:
'Wura a Woma W'asafo 'yaresa
'Kyqde ne dom a qyq no fof'ro;
Tie yqn mpaebx qnnq ne da biara sq
YebediW' nokwar sqnea Wo pq te.

Asqnkafo ne 'diyifo de wxn nne
Ka 'W'rade asqm no kokod'ru mu,
Xgye nsqm a qnam Nyame Ba no so;
Nnome dan' nhy'ra, nkrantq dan asomdwoe.

Ahwqfo no wx nyansa ne 'dwo koma
A wxde bx akra nyinaa ho ban,
'Kwantofo ne 'kyinnyegyefo ahoxden,
Wxboa 'hiafo soa wxn nnesoa ma wxn.

Ma ky'rqky'rqfo nnyin nimdeq ne boasetxm',
Wxnky'rq mmofra ne mpanyin nimdeq kwan,
Wxntete wxn mma xsom ne 'dansedi,
Wonkyi nkontompo nnyina mma nokwar'.

'Wura, ma yqn akyqde a qsom bo
Na yqmfa nhwehwq yiedi mma yqn ho;
Ma W'asafo a qwx fam ha no nhyq
Agya, Xba ne Honhom no 'nuonyam.
songTWI:
Lord, who dost give to Thy church for its healing
Gifts, and the grace to sustain and renew,
Hear as we pray that today and each morrow
We to Thy purpose may show ourselves true.

Clear be the voices of preachers and prophets
Fearlessly speaking the word of the Lord,
Word of redemption thro'God's Son incarnate,
Blessing for cursing, and peace for the sword.

Tender and wise be the hearts of the pastors,
Guiding and guarding the souls in their care,
Firm with the wayward, a strength to the doubting,
Helping the needy their burdens to bear.

May those who teach grow in knowledge and patience,
Guiding to wisdom the young and the old,
Training for worship and witness and service,
Foes to all falsehood, in truthfulness bold.

Lord, ever give to us gifts in due measure,
Each needing other, and all having worth;
So to the Father, the Son, and the Spirit,
Glory be shown by the church here on earth.

title:
Asafo No Tim Botan So
Built on the Rock
songEN:
Asafo no tim Botan so,
B'rč a abran retete gu na
Abanten redw'ri baabiara;
Dxn gu so refrqfrq mmofra
Ne mpanyin sq wxmmqhome;
Wxrefrq akra brqfo a
Wxrehwehwq daa nkwa 'kyi kwan.

Nyankopxn nte asxredan
A wxde nsa na asi mu;
Ne trabea wx s'ro mu s'ro hx,
Qk'rxn sen fam ha trabea ny'naa.
Nea Xte qs'ro mu s'ro no
Pq sq Xne yqn tra sdxm',
De yqn nipadua yq Ne fie.

Yqyq Onyankopxn fie a
Wayq no N'ankasa trabea;
Xde yqn koma yq N'agua,
Na Xma yqn nkwa ne xgye.
Baanu anaa baasa hyiam' a,
Oyi Ne dom adi ky'rq wxn,
Na Ohwie ne nhy'ra gu wxn so.

Na 'sase so ha fie yi mu,
Yesu rehyira Ne mma ny'naa;
Yehyia ha yi Ne din ayq,
Ka sq yqgye 'Gyenkwa no di.
Yesu ama yqn Ne honhom,
Na Xne yqn ayq apam
De ahenni no ama yqn.

Nnasanten nyinaa mu, O, 'W'ra,
B'rč a 'sxre dxn bqbx biara,
Ma 'kra pii mmetie Nyame asqm
A Wahyq saa bx yi wom sq:
Minim Me de, Mede nim Me,
Mo nko na mubehu M'anim;
Migya mo M'asomdwoe. Amen.
songTWI:
Built on the Rock the Church shall stand,
Even when steeples are falling;
Crumbled have spires in every land,
Bells still are chiming and calling-
Calling the young and old to rest,
Calling the souls of those distressed,
Longing for life everlasting.

Not in our temples made with hands
God, the Almighty, is dwelling;
High in the heav'ns His temple stands,
All earthly temples exceling.
Yet He who dwells in heav'n above
Deigns to abide with us in love,
Making our bodies His temple.

We are God's house of living stones,
Built for His own habitation;
He fills our hearts, His humble thrones,
Granting us life and salvation.
Were two or three to seek His face,
He in their midst would show His grace,
Blessings upon them bestowing.

Yet in this house, an earthly frame,
Jesus His children is blessing;
Hither we come to praise His name,
Faith in our Savior confessing.
Jesus to us His Spirit sent,
Making with us His covenant,
Granting His children the kingdom.

Thro'all the passing years, O Lord,
Grant that, when church bells are ringing,
Many may come to hear God's Word
Where He this promise is bringing:
I know My own, My own know Me:
You, not the world, My face shall see;
My peace I leave with you. Amen.

title:
Asafon' Wx Fapem K'ro
The Church's One Foundation
songEN:
Asafon' wx fapem k'ro
Qne Kristo, ne W'ra;
Xnam nsu ne asqm so
Yq N'abxde fofro;
Ofi s'ro bqhwehwqq no,
Yqqn' ayef'ro kronkron;
Xde Ne mogya txx no,
Na ne nkwa nti n'Owui.

Wxapaw no aman nyinaam',
Na xyq k'ro wiase;
Ne nkwagye botae no yq
'W'rade k'ro, gyidi k'ro;
Din kronkron k'ro na ohy'ra,
Odi 'duan kronkron k'ro,
Na xde 'nidaso k'ro
Nante wx xdom mu.

Sq nipa di ne ho fqw
N'ahohia kqse mu;
Sq tammfo dw'riw botan a
Xhome so no mpō a;
Ahotefo de gyidi
Su sq: 'nkxsi da bqn?
Qrenkyq na 'nadwo su
Adan 'nxpa dwonto.

Ne brq ne nsxhwq nyinaa
Ne ne ko kqse mu,
Xtwqn kosi bere a
Daa asomdwoe bqba;
Na 'nuonyam 'nidaso a
Xretwqn no aba,
Ma 'safo nkonimdifon'
Anya daa xhome.
songTWI:
The church's one foundation
'Tis Jesus Christ her Lord;
She is his new creation
By water and the Word.
From heaven he came and sought her
To be his holy bride;
With his own blood he bought her,
And for her life he died.

Elect from every nation,
Yet one o'er all the earth;
Her charter of salvation,
One Lord, one faith, one birth;
One holy name she blesses,
Partakes one holy food,
And to one hope she presses,
With every grace endued.

Though with a scornful wonder
We see her sore oppressed,
Though foes would rend asunder,
The Rock where she doth rest,
Yet saints their faith are keeping;
Their cry goes up, How long?"
And soon the night of weeping
Shall be the morn of song.

'Mid toil and tribulation,
And tumult of her war,
She waits the consummation
Of peace forevermore;
Till, with the vision glorious,
Her longing eyes are blest,
And the great church victorious
Shall be the church at rest.

title:
Nyame Yq 'Dx
God Is Love
songEN:
Nnyeso
Nyame yq 'dx
Xwx nea nokwar'
dx wx biara.

Yqahyiam wx kristo mu,
yqn frq ne Kristo dx,
Kristo, yqn dx, ka yqn ho,
Ne nkyea yq 'nigye;
Momma yensuro na
yqnnx daa Nyame no;
Momma yqnnx Kristo
wx ne Nuanom nyinaam'.

Sq yqn Kristofo hyiam
sq nipadua k'ro a,
Momma yennya honhom k'ro
nyi mpaapaemu hx
Na yqmpam abufuw,
ap'rep're xko,
Kristo, yqn Nyankopxn,
bra bqtra yqn mu daa.

Ma yqne ahy'rafo no
nnya xdx mu dqw
Brč a yqbehu W'anim
'nuonyam mu, O 'Gyenkwa,
Hy'rqn yqn so, abxde
nyinaa Hann kronkron no,
Yq yqn anigye brč a
nnasanten kamfo Wo.
songTWI:
Refrain
God is love, and where true love is
God Himself is there.

Here in Christ we gather,
love of Christ our calling.
Christ, our love, is with us,
gladness be His greeting
Let us fear Him, yes, and love Him,
God eternal.
Loving Him, let each love
Christ in all his brethren.

When we Christians gather,
members of one body,
Let there be in us no
discord but one spirit.
Banished now be anger,
strife, and every quarrel.
Christ, our God, be always
present here among us.

Grant us love's fulfillment,
joy with all the blessed,
When we see Your face,
O Savior, in its glory.
Shine on us, O purest
Light of all creation,
Be our bliss while endless
ages sing Your praises.

title:
N-hyira Ne Hamá a
Blest Be the Tie That Binds
songEN:
N-hyira ne hamá a
Qka yqn bom Kristom;
Ma adasa ayxnkofa
Yq sq xs'ro de no.

Yehwie yqn mpaebx gu
Agya 'henguan' anim;
Yqn suro, yqn anidaso,
Ne yqn aw'rqkyekye.

Yegyam yqn ho, yqn ho,
Yqsoa yqn ho nnesoa;
Yqtaa kyi aw'rqhow nusu
De gyam yqn ho, yqn ho.

Sq yedi ntetemų a,
Qyq yqn mu yaw sq;
Nanso yqwx anidaso
Sq yebehyia mu bio.
songTWI:
Blest be the tie that binds
Our hearts in Christian love;
The fellowship of kindred minds
Is like to that above.

Before our Father's throne
We pour our ardent prayers;
Our fears, our hopes, our aims are one,
Our comforts and our cares.

We share each other's woes,
Our mutual burdens bear;
And often for each other flows
The sympathizing tear.

When we asunder part,
It gives us inward pain;
But we shall still be joined in heart,
And hope to meet again.

title:
Nyame, Wo Nsa Na Aky'rq
Thy Hand, O God Has Guided
songEN:
Nyame, Wo nsa na aky'rq
Wo nguankuw kwan daa ny'naa;
Wxaky'rqw anwanwasqm no
Ky'rqw no fa baabiara;
Yqn agyanom nyaa W'adxe,
Na yehu wxn nnwuma;
Edi 'danse: asafo,
Gyidi ne 'W'rade k'ro.

W'abxfo de 'nigyesqm
Brqq 'kqse ne nkumaa;
Wxfrqq nnipa sq wxmmra
Xhen 'ponto ase;
Eyi ne wxn nky'rqky'rq ny'naa
Nneyqe ne kasa mu,
Ky'rqq nnipa sq: asafo,
Gyidi ne 'W'rade k'ro.

B'rč a na sum kabii red'ru
Nnipa mma ny'naa so no,
Aw'rade somaa Wo nkoa,
Hann mma a Woapaw wxn,
Wode Wo dom pii no guu
Wxn ne Wo nk'rxfo so.
Nea wxkae ne: asafo,
Gyidi, ne 'W'rade k'ro.

W'adxe renni yqn huammx,
W'adwuma nso renka;
Wo nsa nifa boa yqn yi,
Nkonim bqyq yqn de.
Abxfo ne nnipa ny'naa
Bqkamfo Wo din no,
Wxn dwom bqyq: asafo,
Gyidi, ne 'W'rade k'ro.
songTWI:
Thy hand, O God, has guided
Thy flock from age to age;
The wondrous tale is written
Full clear on every page;
Our fathers owned Thy goodness,
And we their deeds record;
And both of this bear witness,
One church, one faith, one Lord.

Thy heralds brought glad tidings
To greatest as to least;
They bade men rise and hasten
To share the great King's feast:
And this was all their teaching,
In every deed and word,
To all alike proclaiming
One church, one faith, one Lord.

When shadows thick were falling,
And all seemed sunk in night,
Thou, Lord, did send Thy servants,
Thy chosen sons of light.
On them and on Thy people
Thy plenteous grace was poured,
And this was still their message:
One church, one faith, one Lord.

Thy mercy will not fail us,
Nor leave Thy work undone;
With Thy right hand to help us,
The vict'ry shall be won;
And then by men and angels
Thy name shall be adored,
And this shall be their anthem:
One church, one faith, one Lord.

title:
'Yi Ne Me Pq
This Is My Will
songTWI:
This is My will, My one command,
That love should dwell among you all.
This is My will that you should love
As I have shown that I love you.

No greater love a man can have
Than that he die to save his friends.
You are My friends if you obey
What I command that you should do.

You chose not Me, but I chose you
That you should go and bear much fruit.
I chose you out that you in Me
Should bear much fruit that will abide.

All that I ask My Father, dear,
For My name's sake you shall receive.
This is My will, My one command,
That love should dwell in each, in all.

title:
Agya, Boa Wo Wiasem' Nk'rxfo Ma Wxnyq
Father, Help Your People
songTWI:
Father, help Your people in this world to build
Something of Your kingdom and to do Your will,
Lead us to discover partnership in love;
Bless our ways of sharing and our pride remove.

Lord of desk and altar, bind our lives in one,
That in work and worship love may set the tone.
Give us grace to listen, clarity of speech;
Make us truly thankful for the gifts of each.

Holy is the setting of each room and yard,
Lecture hall and kitchen, office, shop, and ward.
Holy is the rhythm of our working hours;
Hallow then our purpose, energy, and pow'rs.

Strengthen, Lord, for service hand and heart and brain;
Help us good relations daily to maintain.
Let the living presence of the servant Christ
Heighten our devotion, make our life a feast.

title:
Nyame, Wx Dx Na Qbxx Nnipa Ny'naa
Thy Love, O God
songEN:
Nyame, Wo dx na qbxx nnipa mma ny'naa,
Na adi Wo mma anim 'besi nnq,
Abrabx mu 'nuonyam wie pqyq Kristom,
Wo Honhom yi Ne tumi adi ky'rq.

Yefi xbra sum mu abasamtu mu,
Ahantan ne xbrakyew nyinaa mu,
Dan yqn ho hwehwq Wo nokware hann no,
Na yehu Wo dom a qretwqn yqn.

Fa mmxb'rxhun' hwq Wo mma sq wxrep're,
Hwehwq nkwa, 'somdwoe, 'hofadi, nkabom,
Kosi sq Wo nokware bewie pqyq,
Na yqahu nnepa henkyqw wx Kristom.

Hyq W'asafo den 'sase so haw nyinaam',
Ma wxnka n'Aw'rade ho asqmpa,
Kosi sq akodi wiase yi de dqw,
Bqte xsoro dx kqse no nka.
songTWI:
Thy love, O God, has all mankind created,
And led Thy people to this present hour;
In Christ we see life's glory consummated;
Thy Spirit manifests His living power.

From out the darkness of our hope's frustration,
From all the broken idols of our pride,
We turn to seek Thy truth's illumination,
And find Thy mercy waiting at our side.

In pity look upon Thy children's striving
For life and freedom, peace and brotherhood,
Till at the fullness of Thy truth arriving,
We find in Christ the crown of every good.

Inspire Thy church, mid earth's discordant voices,
To preach the gospel of her Lord above,
Until the day this warring world rejoices
To hear the mighty harmonies of love.

title:
Xbra Kwan Horow Yi Mu a
Where Cross The Crowded Ways of Life
songEN:
Xbra kwan horow yi mu a
Aman ne mmusua teateam na
Ahopq nne ahyq ma yi;
Yqte Wo nne, Onipa Ba.

Efi mmofraase mm'rqwyq mu;
Adasa yaw ne wxn brq mu,
Akrá a wxwx kxm ne haw mu,
Wo koma ntwe mfii wxn ho da.

Nsu a Wo nti wxde ma no
Da so ara kųra Wo dom no;
Nso nnipakuw yi kxn dx sq
Wobehu W'anim mmxb'rxhun'.

Owura, fi bepx no so
Bqsa 'manehun'fo yare;
Bqtra nnipa a wxay'ra yim
Na nante Kųro n' mmxnten so bio

Kosi sq wiase ny'naa besua
Wo dx, afa W'anammxn so;
Kosi sq yqn Nyame Kųro no
Fi Wo s'ro bqba 'nuonyam mu.
songTWI:
Where cross the crowded ways of life,
where sound the cries of race and clan,
above the noise of selfish strife,
we hear your voice, O Son of Man.

From tender childhood's helplessness,
from woman's grief, man's burdened toil,
from famished souls, from sorrow's stress,
your heart has never known recoil.

The cup of water given for you still
holds the freshness of your grace;
yet long these multitudes to view
the sweet compassion of your face.

O Master, from the mountainside
make haste to heal these hearts of pain;
among these restless throngs abide;
O tread the city's streets again.

Till all the world shall learn your love
and follow where your feet have trod,
till, glorious from your heaven above,
shall come the city of our God.

title:
Mō Modx Mo Kuro Som No
All Who Love and Serve Your City
songEN:
Mō a modx mo kuro som no
Soa ho dadwen p're hwehwq
Asomdwoe ne atqntrenee;
Mō a modome, Mō a muhy'ra,

Mo adehw'rew ne 'w'rqhow b'rem',
Ap'rep're horow nyinaam',
B'rč a 'somdwoe ne dx asa no,
Monhwehwq mo nkwa W'ra no.

Nna nyinaa yq atemmu nna,
Na 'W'rade retwqn ara;
Retwe bqn wxn a wxpoo No
Ma wxn Kalbre asomdwoe.

W'ra, so kuro yi bqkx so
Ayq nea 'nidaso nnim?
B'ra, yqn 'nuonyam ne temmufo;
Ma ne din nyq: "W'ra wx hx!"
songTWI:
All who love and serve your city,
All who bear its daily stress,
All who cry for peace and justice,
All who curse and all who bless.

In your day of loss and sorrow,
In your day of helpless strife,
Honor, peace, and love retreating,
Seek the Lord, who is your life.

For all days are days of judgment,
And the Lord is waiting still,
Drawing near His friends who spurn Him,
Off'ring peace from Calv'ry's hill.

Risen Lord, shall yet the city
Be the city of despair?
Come today, our judge, our glory;
Be its name "The Lord is there!"

title:
Bqyq 'Dwuma
Come, Labor On
songEN:
Bqyq 'dwuma,
Hena gyina hx kwa 'twa dwuma nom,
B're a awi rehim 'fa baabiara?
Owura no se N'akoa biara sq,
"Kx 'dwuma nnq".

Bqyq 'dwuma,
Gye s'ro frq a 'bxfo ntum' no so;
Fa 'sqmpa dqw no ma mmofra, mpanyin;
Hwq w'adagye yie, b're retwam
hyewhyew 'Nadwo rebqn.

Bqyq 'dwuma,
Xhome b're nni hx kosi 'witxe,
B're a sunsuma bqyq atenten
Ama towia de anigye ateam
Sq: Mo ne yx!
songTWI:
Come, labor on.
Who dares stand idle on the harvest plain
While all around him waves the golden grain?
And to each servant does the Master say,
"Go work today."

Come, labor on.
Claim the high calling angels cannot share;
To young and old the gospel gladness bear;
Redeem the time; its hours too swiftly fly.
The night draws nigh.

Come, labor on.
No time for rest; till glows the western sky,
Till the long shadows oér our pathway lie,
And a glad sound comes with the setting sun,
"Well done, well done!"

title:
A Ky'riky'ri Ne Bqnkyqe Nyinaa
Far and Near the Fields Are Teeming
songEN:
Aky'riky'ri ne bqnkyqe nyinaa,
Nnxbae ahoa wx mfuw mu:
Aba no hyerqn baabiara-
Mmepx so ne abxn mu.

Nnyeso
Otwa W'ra, soma apaafo!
'W'ra tie yqn, yesu frq Wo
Ma wxmmqboa nnxbaen' ano.
Ansa na twab're atwam.

Soma wxn anxpahema,
Soma wxn awiabere;
B're a owia rekxtx no
Ma wxmmoa ano mmaa ny'naa.

Wo a wo W'ra resoma wo,
Boa nnxbae pa ny'naa ano
Na awiei no, wode 'nigye
Bqkx xsoro fie hx.
songTWI:
Far and near the fields, are teeming
With the sheaves of ripened grain;
Far and near their gold is gleaming,
O'er the sunny slope and plain.

Refrain
Lord of harvest, send forth reapers!
Hear us, Lord, to Thee we cry;
Send them now the sheaves to gather,
Ere the harvest time pass by.

Send them forth with morn's first beaming,
Send them in the noontide's glare;
When the sun's last rays are streming,
Bid them gather everywhere.

O thou, whom thy Lord is sending,
Gather now the sheaves of gold;
Heavenward then at evening wending
Thou shalt come with joy untold.

title:
Tie! Yesu Nne Gu So Refrq
Hark! the Voice of Jesus Calling
songEN:
Tie! Yesu nne gu so refrq,
Hena bqkx 'dwuma nnq?
M-fuw ab're, twab're adu,
Hena n'xbqsoa nnxbae?
Owura no team frq dennen,
Xma akatua pa kwa;
Hena n'xbqkan' 'nigyem sq,
"Mini, 'Wura, soma me".

Sq worentumi n-twa po
Nkx wiasefo nsase sō a,
Wubehu wxn wo nkyqn ara,
Aboa wxn wo pon ano;
Sq wuntumi nyq sq bxfo
Nka 'sqmpan' sq Paulo a,
Wubetum' aka Yesu dxn',
Sq Owu maa nnipa ny'naa.

Sq worentumi nyq wqmfo
Nnyina Sion fasu so,
N-kyerq xsoro kwan no,
Mma nkwa ne asomdwoe a,
Wubetumi de wo mpaebx
Ayq nea soro hwehwq;
Wobqyq nokwafo Aaron,
Aso 'diyifo no nsa.

Sq nnipa akra rewuwu
Na Owura frq wo a,
N-ka anihasqm bi sq,
"Merentumi nyq b'ribi!"
Gye adwuma no anigyem,
Ma N'adwuma nyqw' nigye;
Xfrq wo a gye so ntqm sq,
"Mini, 'Wura, soma me".
songTWI:
Hark! the voice of Jesus calling,
"Who will go and work today?
Fields are white, the harvest waiting,
Who will bear the sheaves away?"
Loud and long the Master calleth,
Rich reward He offers free;
Who will answer, gladly saying,
"Here am I, O Lord, send me"?

If you cannot cross the ocean
And the heathen lands explore,
You can find the heathen nearer,
You can help them at your door;
If you cannot speak like angels,
If you cannot preach like Paul,
You can tell the love of Jesus,
You can say He died for all.

If you cannot be the watchman,
Standing high on Zion's wall,
Pointing out the path to heaven,
Offering life and peace to all;
With your prayers and with your bounties
You can do what Heaven demands,
You can be like faithful Aaron,
Holding up the prophet's hands.

While the souls of men are dying,
And the Master calls for you,
Let none hear you idly saying,
"There is nothing I can do!"
Gladly take the task He gives you,
Let His work your pleasure be;
Answer quickly when He calleth,
"Here am I, O Lord, send me."

title:
Wofi Apuei Mmepxm'
From the Eastern Mountains
songEN:
Wofi apuei mmepxm' Nam kwan so reba,
Wofi wxn nyansam' ba N'ahobrqase fie;
Wxde ahofama Fi aky'rik'ri ba;
Wxn akwantu mu no,
    Ns'romma ky'rqq wxn kwan.

Ha na wxn W'ra 'Gyenkwa A Xdwo no da;
Hann nwanwa a qmaa Wxn akwanky'rq no,
Bqhyerqn nnq ama Aky'riky'ri aman.
B'rč a ns'romma kwanky'rqfo
    De wxn kx fie no.

Fa 'kwantofo bra mu, Wxn a wxafom kwan.
Fa Wo hann twa wxn ho Na kyerq wxn kwan;
Wxn a wonnim Wo da, Wxn a wxamane,
Fa ns'romma kwanky'rqfo Di wxn anim bra.

Kosi sq man biara, 'Kqsč anaa kumaa,
Bqba Wo frankaá ase, Yesu di w'akyi,
Wx 'ky'riky'ri mmepx a Qkx s'ro fie no,
Nea bxne ne 'w'rqhow Remma hx bio no.
songTWI:
From the eastern mountains
Pressing on they come,
Wise men in their wisdom,
To His humble Index;
Stirred by deep devotion,
Hasting from afar,
Ever journeying onward,
Guided by a star.

There their Lord and Savior
Meek and lowly,
Wondrous light that led them
Onward on their way,
Ever now to lighten
Nations from afar,
As they journey Indexward
By that guiding star.

Gather in the outcasts
All who've gone astray,
Throw Thy radiance o'er them,
Guide them on their way;
Those who never knew Thee,
Those who've wandered far,
Guide them by the brightness
Of Thy guiding star.

Until every nation,
Whether bond or free,
'Neath Thy starlit banner,
Jesus follows thee.
O'er the distant mountains
To that heavenly Index,
Where no sin nor sorrow
Evermore shall come.

title:
Tie! Mete 'Guanhwqfo No Nne
Hark! 'Tis the Shepherd's Voice I Hear
songEN:
Tie! mete 'Guanhwqfo no nne
Wx sum huhu sare no so;
Refrq Ne nguan a wxafom kwan
Afi Ne nguanbuwm' kx aky'ri

Nnyeso
Fa wxn bra, fa wxn bra,
Fa wxn fi bxne wuram' bra;
Fa wxn bra, fa wxn bra,
Fa 'kwantofo brq Yesu.

Hena bqboa Guanhwqfo no
Ma Wahwehwq akwantofo?
Hena de wxn bqba buw nom',
Nea awx bi renne wxn no?

Tie! Wxresu sar' so nohoaa,
Mmepxw atenten no so hx;
Tie! Yqn Wura reka ky'rqw' sq;
Kxhwehwq Me nguan, fa wxn bra.
songTWI:
Hark! 'tis the Shepherd's voice I hear,
Out in the desert dark and drear,
Calling the sheep who've gone astray,
Far from the Shepherd's fold away.

Refrain
Bring them in, Bring them in,
Bring them in from the fields of sin;
Bring them in, Bring them in,
Bring the wanderers to Jesus.

Who'll go and help the Shepherd kind,
Help Him the wandering ones to find?
Who'll bring them back into the fold,
Where they'll be sheltered from the cold?

Out in the desert hear their cry,
Out on the mountain wild and high,
Hark! 'tis the Master speaks to thee,
"Go, find My sheep where 'er they be."

title:
Ma 'Sqnnuan' So
Lift High the Cross
songEN:
Nnyeso
Ma 'sqnnuan'so, ka Kristo dx no ky'rq
Kosi sq wiase ny'naa bqsxr' Ne din.

Kristofo mummedi Sahen' akyi
Yqn nkonimdi Hen', Kristo, Nyame Ba.

Saa nkonim frankaa no di wxn anim
Ma Nyankopxn dxm ka bom nkonimdim'.

'Sqnnuan' ho nsraafo a wxawo wxn fof'ro,
Wx Nea Owui nsxano wxn moma so.

'W'rá a wxmaa Wo so 'nuonyam dua no so,
Wo bxhyq no nti twe yqn bra Wo nkyqn.

Saa na yqn nkonim dwom no bqyq daa:
'Yeyi nka Nea wxbxx no 'sqnnuam no.
songTWI:
Refrain
Lift high the cross, the love of Christ proclaim
Till all the world adore His sacred name.

Led on their way by this triumphant sign,
The hosts of God in conqu'ring ranks combine.

Come, Christians, follow where our Captain trod,
Our King victorious, Christ, the Son of God.

All newborn soldiers of the Crucified
Bear on their brows the seal, of Him who died.

O Lord, once lifted on the glorious tree,
As Thou hast promised, draw us all to Thee.

So shall our song of triumph ever be:
Praise to the Crucified for victory!

title:
'W'rá a Wode Dx Som
Lord, Whose Love in Humble Service
songEN:
'W'rá a Wode dx som 'hobrqasem
