   'nimtew hy'ra yqn fie,
Na ma yqn ntease ne nokwaredi;
Ma yemmom nni yqn W'ra Kristo no akyi,
Na ma yenhu Ne tumidi mu nhy'ra.

Ma koma biara nnya Ne dx honhom no
Nhu nokware a qma 'hofadi;
Ma yqntra k'royq mu wx saa honhom nom',
Na yennya banbx kqse Nyame mu.

Faf'ri yqn wx pqsqmenkominya mu
Yaw a yqde abrq 'dxfonom ho.
Kristo, sa piratwa no na ka yqn bom
Wx Nea Ne pq yq 'somdwoe ne dqw nom'.

Agya, afie ne 'dxfo ho nnaase nti,
Yebue yqn koma mu ma nnipa ny'naa.
Ma yqn Wo honhom: sq yqbqdx yqn ho,
Na yqanya nkabom wx W'asomdwoe mu.
songTWI:
Lord, bless our Indexs with peace and love and laughter,
With understanding and with loyalty.
May we together follow Christ the Master
And know the blessing of His sovereignty.

May every heart receive His loving spirit
And know the truth that makes life truly free;
Then, in that spirit may we live untied,
And find in God our deep security.

Forgive the hurts our selfishness inflicted
On those we love and those who love us best.
Christ, heal the scars, and draw us all together
In him whose will is peace and joy and rest.

Father, in gratitude for Indexs and loved ones,
We open now our hearts to all mankind.
Grant us Your spirit love for one another-
So in Your peace may we our concord find.

title:
Fie a Nyame Wom Wx 'Nigye
Happy The Index
songEN:
Fie a Nyame wom wx 'nigye,
Na dx ahyq hx ma,
B're a wxn pq, wxn mpaebx ne
Wxn s'ro home yq k'ro.

Fie a Yesu din yq dq wom',
Wx anigye kqse,
Nea mmofra bx Ne din daa na
Awofo di No ni.

Fie a mpaebx ne 'yeyi wom',
Wx anigye kqse,
Nea awofo dx Kyerqwsqm
Ne 'mu nyansa ny'naa no.

'W'ra, ma yqn ntease yqn fie na
Yqanya saa 'somdwoe yi;
Ka yqn koma bom Wo dx mu,
Na yqadx nnipa ny'naa.
songTWI:
Happy the Index when God is there,
and love fills every breast;
when one their wish, and one their prayer,
and one their heavenly rest.

Happy the Index where Jesus' name
is sweet to every ear;
where children early speak his fame,
and parents hold him dear.

Happy the Index where prayer is heard,
and praise is wont to rise;
where parents love the sacred Word
and all its wisdom prize.

Lord, let us in our Indexs agree
this blessed peace to gain;
unite our hearts in love to thee,
and love to all will reign.

title:
O Xdx a Qb'ro
O Perfect Love
songEN:
O xdx a qb'ro nipa adwen so
Yqkoto W'agua 'nim brqoo wx mpaebom
Sq wxn a Woreka wxn abom daa yi
Benya xdx a etim hx daa daa.

O nkwa Dqqfo, yq wxn 'nidaso nyinaa,
Ma wxn dx ne gyidi a ase tim,
Boasetx anidaso ne animia
Sq 'bofra 'w'rqhyem - ensuro yaw ne wu.

Ma wxn dqw a qpam fam awerqhow,
Ne 'somdwoe wx fam ha ap'rep're mu
Fa, 'kyena a yennim ka wxn qnnq ho
Nea epue wx daa xdx ne nkwa so.
songTWI:
O perfect Love, all human thought transcending,
lowly we kneel in prayer before thy throne,
that theirs may be the love which knows no ending,
whom thou forevermore dost join in one.

O perfect Life, be thou their full assurance
of tender charity and steadfast faith,
of patient hope and quiet, brave endurance,
with childlike trust that fears nor pain nor death.

Grant them the joy which brightens earthly sorrow;
grant them the peace which calms all earthly strife,
and to life's day the glorious unknown morrow
that dawns upon eternal love and life.

title:
Nyame a Wo Din Da Adasa So
O God, From Whom Mankind
songTWI:
O God from whom mankind derives its name;
Whose covenant of grace remains the same,
Be with there two who now before you wait;
Enlarge the love they come to consecrate.

May through their union other lives be blessed;
Their door be wide to stranger and to guest,
Give them the understanding that is kind,
Grant them the blessing of an open mind.

Preserve their days from inwardness of heart;
To each the gift of truthful speech impart.
Their bond be strong against all strain and strife
Amid the changes of this earthly life.

Form stage to stage on life's unfolding way
Bring to their mind the vows they make this day,
Your Spirit be their Guide in every move,
Their faith in Christ the basis of their love.

title:
S'ro Agya, Tie Yqn Mpaebx
Heavenly Father, Hear Our Prayer
songEN:
S'ro Agya, tie yqn mpaebx
B'rč a yqkoto Wo yi;
Hy'ra wxn wx wxn nkabom nom'
Yqsrq Wo 'hobrqasem.
Yq wxn kwanky'rqfo ade ny'naam',
Na yq wxn daa anidaso;
Wō a Woyq s'ro dx nsuti,
Ma Wo dx nhyerqn wxn mu.

B'rč a wxka wxn dx ho ntam
W'afxr'bukyia 'nim yi,
Ma wxn koma nsi Wo so
A qrenhinhim da.
Yq wxn w'rqkyekye wx yaw mu;
Ma wxn daakye mu 'nidaso.
Ma wxn 'hoxden a wxde
Bqtwer' Wo tumi nkutoo.

Xbxadeq Hy'rafo, nkwa W'ra,
Gye yqn aseda yi.
Woaka 'war'fo yi abom
Ama fam ha 'setra.
Esian Yesu mu bembu nti,
Wxanya nkwa a enni awiei.
Sq wxn fam ha nna twam a,
Fa wxn kx Wo s'ro fie dwoo!
songTWI:
Heav'nly Father, hear our prayer
As we bow before You:
Bless them in the life they share,
Humbly we implore You.
Be their guide in all endeavors,
Be their hope that nothing severs;
Constant source of love divine,
Let Your love within them shine!

As they pledge their love this day
Here before Your altar,
May their hearts, upon You stayed,
Never fail or falter.
Be their comfort in all sorrow;
Be their reason for tomorrow.
Grant them strength to live each hour
Trusting solely in Your pow'r.

Blest Creator, Lord of life,
Hear our glad thanksgiving.
Husband you have joined to wife
For their earthly living.
Justified by Jesus' merit.
Life eternal they inherit.
When their days on earth have passed,
Take them to Your Index at last!

title:
Yqn Agyenkwa Kristo Dom No
May the Grace of Christ Our Savior
songEN:
Yqn Agyenkwa Kristo dom no,
Agya no dx kqse no,
Ne Honhom Kronkron no adxe,
Mfi soro mmqtra wxn so.

Qno na nkabom mu wxne
Wxn ho ne 'W'rade bqtra,
Na 'yxnkofa pa mu wxanya
Dqw a wiase ntumi mma.
songTWI:
May the grace of Christ our Savior
And the Father's boundless love,
With the Holy Spirit's favor,
Rest upon them from above.

Thus may they abide in union
With each other and the Lord,
And possess, in sweet communion,
Joys with earth cannot afford.

title:
Anuomyam Nka Agya No
Glory Be To The Father
songEN:
Anuonyam nka Agya no, ne Xba no,
Ne Honhom Kronkron no;
Sqnea na qte mfiase no,
Qte saa nnq de kosi
Mfesanten nyinaa.
Amen, Amen.
songTWI:
Glory be to the Father,
and to the Son,
and to the Holy Ghost;
As it was in the beginning,
is now, and ever shall be,
world without end.
Amen, Amen.

title:
Kronkron, Kronkron, Kronkron
Holy, Holy, Holy
songEN:
Kronkron, Kronkron,
Kronkron Ne Awurade!
Kronkron, Kronkron,
Kronkron Ne Onyankopxn!
Nea Xte ase daa, Xbqyq saa daa;
Odi hen' sro ne fam;
Mummeyi N'ayq!

Kronkron, Kronkron,
Kronkron Ne Awurade!
Kronkron, Kronkron, Kronkron
Ne Onyankopxn! 'Nuonyam ne dx fata
Nea yqkamfo Non'
Kronkron, Kronkron, Kronkron
Ne Awurade!
songTWI:
Holy, holy, holy, Holy is the Lord!
Holy, holy, holy, Holy is our God!
He who always liveth, Evermore the same
Heav'n and earth He ruleth,
Come and praise his name!

Holy, holy, holy, Holy is the Lord!
Holy, holy, holy, Holy is our God!
Glorious and beloved Is the One adored!
Holy, holy, holy, Holy is the Lord.

title:
Momma Honam Nyinaa Nyq
Let All Mortal Flesh Keep Silence
songEN:
Momma honam nyinaa nyq komm,
Na momfa suro nnyina;
Munnwennwen fam ha nneqma ho,
Na Kristo, yqn Nyame no
De nhyira sian baa 'sase so,
Sqnea yqbqsom No daa,
Amen.

title:
Amen, Amen
Sevenfold Amen
songEN:
A.  Amen, Amen.      (Traditional)

B.  Amen.                 (Robert Ramsay)

C.  Amen.                 (Melvin West, 1984)

D.  Amen (Amen).    (Melvin West, 1984)

E.  Amen.                 (Melvin West, 1984)

F.  Amen, Amen, Amen.
songTWI:
Amen, Amen, Amen,
Amen, Amen, Amen,
Amen, Amen, Amen.
Amen, Amen, Amen.

title:
Amen, Amen
Sevenfold Amen
songEN:
Amen, Amen, Amen,
Amen, Amen, Amen,
Amen.
songTWI:
Amen, Amen, Amen,
Amen, Amen, Amen,
Amen, Amen, Amen.
Amen, Amen, Amen.

title:
Ade Nyinaa Fi Wo, 'Wura
All Things Come of Thee
songEN:
Ade ny'naa fi Wo, Wura,
Wo de na yqasan de rebrq Wo.
Amen.
songTWI:
All things come of thee, O Lord;
and of thine own have we given thee.

title:
Dan W'adesoa To 'W'rade So
Cast Thy Burden Upon the Lord
songEN:
Dan w'adesoa to 'W'rade so,
Na Xbqsx wo mu;
Xremma xtreneeni ntwe n'anan mu,
Xwx wo nsa nifa.
W'ra, W'ahummxb'rx so
Qkr'rxn sen soro mpo;
Mma nea xtwqn wo biara
Anim ngu ase.

title:
Hy'ra W'asqm So Koma Biaram'
Lord, Bless Thy Word to Every Heart
songEN:
Hy'ra W'asqm so koma biaram'
Wx Wo fie ha nnq, 'W'ra;
Yqretetem yi, boa yqn ma
Yenni n'ahyqde so.
Amen, Amen.
songTWI:
Lord, bless Thy Word to every heart
In this Thy house today,
And help us each as now we part,
It's precept to obey,
Amen, Amen.

title:
Wo a Wutie Komam' Mpaebx
O Thou Who Hearest
songEN:
Wo a Wutie komam' mpaebx biara,
Fa Wo dom siesie yqn koma nyinaa;
Wo ne yqn nkwa, ne yqn dx, ne yqn hann
O ma saa Homeda mm're yi nyq hann.
Amen.
songTWI:
O Thou who hearest every heartfelt prayer,
With Thy rich grace, Lord, all our hearts prepare;
Thou art our life, Thou art our love and light,
O let this Sabbath hour with Thee be bright.
Amen.

title:
'W'rade Nhy'ra Wo Nhwq Wo So
The Lord Bless You and Keep You
songEN:
'W'rade nhy'ra wo nhwq wo so;
'W'rade mma N''ani so nkyerq wo na
Xmmaw' 'somdwoe; Xmmaw' 'somdwoe,
'W'rade no ara ntew N'anim nkyerq wo,
Na Xmfa Ne dom nnom wo, Xnnom wo
'W'rade no ara mmqyq wo xdom.
Amen.
songTWI:
Amen, Amen, Amen,
Amen, Amen, Amen.

The Lord bless you and keep you;
The Lord lift His countenance upon you,
And give you peace,
And give you peace;
The Lord make His face to shine upon you,
And be gracious unto you,
Be gracious,
The Lord be gracious, gracious unto you. Amen.

title:
Nea Yqde MaW' Biara
We Give Thee But Thine Own
songEN:
Nea yqde maW' biara,
Yq W'ankasa Wo de;
Nea yqwx nyinaa wx Wo nko,
Woayq yqn so hwqfo.
songTWI:
We give Thee but Thine own,
Whate'er the gift may be;
All that we have is Thine alone,
A trust, O Lord, from Thee.

title:
'W'ra Yqrebx Mpae Yi
As We Come to You in Prayer
songEN:
'W'ra yqrebx mpae yi,
Yi yqn koma ne yqn adwen
Fi Wiase haw a qhyq yqn so
Kx Wo dom 'hengua no anim;
Ma Wo dx nsesa yqn abrabx,
Ma yqn kra nnya ahosan mfi s'ro;
Saa b're yi mu ma wiase nnipa ny'naa
Nka yqn ho b're a yqba Wo nkyqn mpaebxm'.
songTWI:
Now, Dear Lord, as we pray,
take our hearts and minds far away
From the press of the world all around
To Your throne where grace does abound.
May our lives be transform'd by Your love,
May our souls be refreshed from above.
At this moment, let people everywhere
Join us now as we come to You in prayer.

title:
Nyame Teasefo Honhom
Spirit of the Living God
songEN:
Nyame Teasefo Honhom
Sian me so fof'ro;
Nyame Teasefo Honhom
Sian me so fof'ro;
Bubu me, nan me, hyq me ma!
Nyame Teasefo Honhom
Sian me so fof'ro.
songTWI:
Spirit of the living God,
Fall afresh on me!
Spirit of the living God,
Fall afresh on me!
Break me, melt me,
Mold me, fill me!
Spirit of the living God,
Fall afresh on me!

title:
Nyame Ne Wo Ntra
May God Be With You
songTWI:
May God be with you
Till we meet again,
May God be with you,
Keep you safe till then;
And may His blessings
Be within your heart,
May God be with you
While we're apart,
May God be with you.

May God be with you,
Watch you from above,
May God protect you
In His tender love;
And with the dawning
Of each bright, new day,
May God be with you,
To guide your way,
May God be with you.

title:
'Somdwoe, M'adxfonom
Shalom
songEN:
'Somdwoe, m'adxfonom somdwoe,
'Somdwoe, 'somdwoe.
Asomdwoe nka mo, Nyame asomdwoe
'Somdwoe, 'somdwoe.

Nhyira nni mo akyi, 'Bxfo nwqn mo;
'Somdwoe, 'Somdwoe.
Nyame adxe ne mo ntra nkosė awiei;
'Somdwoe, 'somdwoe.

Kosi se yqbqsan ahyia mu bio,
'Somdwoe, 'somdwoe
Nyame ne mo ntra, N'asomdwoe nka mo.
'Somdwoe, 'somdwoe.
songTWI:
Shalom, good friends,
shalom, good friends,
shalom, shalom.
Till we meet again,
till we meet again,
shalom, shalom.

title:
'W'rade Nhyira Mo Na
May the lord Bless and Keep You
songEN:
'W'rade nhyira mo na
Xnhwq mo so nnq ne daa.
Amen, Amen.
songTWI:
May the lord bless and keep you
Both now and evermore.
Amen, Amen.

title:
W'asqm No Yq
Thy Word Is A Lantern
songEN:
W'asqm no yq
Me nan ase kanea,
Hann a qhy'rqn me kwan so.
songTWI:
Thy Word is a lantern unto my feet,
And a light unto my path.

title:
Xs'ro Agya, Yqbx Mpae Ky'rq Wo
Heavenly Father, to Thee We Pray
songTWI:
Heavenly Father, to Thee we pray,
On this holy Sabbath day;
Through Thy Word Thy will make known;
May each heart become Thy throne,
Let Thy living water flow
That we Thy boundless love may know.
Amen.

title:
Nyame Ntra Me T'rim'
God Be in My Head

Nyame Ntra Me T'rim'
God Be in My Head
songTWI:
God be in my head,
And in my thinking.
God be in my eyes,
And in my looking.
God be in my mouth,
And in my speaking.
Oh, God be in my heart,
And in my understanding.

title:
Honhom Kronkron, Tie Yqn
Holy Spirit, Hear Us
songEN:
Honhom Kronkron, tie yqn,
Boa yqn nnwonto yim';
Hom' gu 'yeyi dwom a
Yqde ba no mu.

Honhom Kronkron, nyan yqn
Wx yqn mpaebx mu;
Bqn yqn na ky'rq yqn nea
Qsq sq yqyq.

Honhom Kronkron, hyerqn
Yqn nwoma yi so
Fa nann pa a yehia
Hyerqn 'mu nsqm so.

title:
'Yi Ne Da a 'W'rade Ayq
This Is Tthe Day The Lord Hath Made
songTWI:
This is the day the Lord hath made;
He calls the hours his own.
Let heaven rejoice, let earth be glad,
And praise surround the throne.

title:
Sqnea Woahyq Bx No, 'W'ra, Nnq
As You Have Promised, Lord
songEN:
Sqnea Woahyq bx no, 'W'ra, nnq,
Worema W'akoa afi ha akx 'somdwoem'.
M'aniwa ahuW' awia ketee
Aman ny'naa anim, nkwagye nhyehyqe ho,
Adiyi hann ma amanaman no
Ne wo man Israelfo no anuonyam.
songTWI:
As you have promised, Lord,
Today, You are letting Your servant
Go away in peace. My eyes have seen You
In broad daylight before all nations,
Planning salvation.
Light of revelation for the nations,
And glory of Your people Israel.

title:
Yesu, Gyina Yqn Mu
Jesus, Stand Among Us
songEN:
Yesu, gyina yqn mu
Wo wusxr' tumim';
Ma saa som b're yi nyq
B're a wxatew ho.

Hom' Wo Honhom Kronkron
Gu koma biaram';
Pam suro ne 'w'rqhow
Fi xkra biaram'.

Saa na 'hokeka mu,
Yetu yqn kwan no;
Wqn kosi dā a enni
Awiei 'nxpa no.
songTWI:
Jesus, stand among us
In Thy risen power;
Let this time of worship
Be a hallowed hour.

Breathe the Holy Spirit
Into every heart;
Bid the fears and sorrows
From each soul depart.

Thus with quickened footsteps
We pursue our way,
Watching for the dawning
Of eternal day.

title:
Tie Yqn Mpaebx, 'W'ra
Hear Our Prayer, O Lord
songEN:
Tie yqn mpaebx, 'W'ra,
Tie yqn mpaebx, 'W'ra;
Yq aso ma yqn na
Ma yqn W'asomdwoe.
Amen.
songTWI:
Hear our prayer, O Lord,
Hear our prayer, O Lord;
Incline Thine ear to us,
And grant us Thy peace.
Amen.

title:
Boa Ma Mintie Wo Dx Ayamye
Cause Me to Hear
songEN:
Boa ma mintie Wo dx ayamye
no anxpa 'fisq metwere Wo;
Boa ma minhu 'kwan a mqfa so,
'Fisq mema me kra so ba Wo nkyqn.
Amen.
songTWI:
Cause me to hear
Thy loving kindness in the morning,
For in Thee I trust.
Cause me to know
the way where in I shall walk
for I lift up my soul in Thee.
Amen.

title:
Hyira Yqn Nsa 'Kyqde Yi So
Bless Thou The Gifts Our Hands
songEN:
Hyira yqn nsa 'kyqde yi so,
Hyira yqn komam' 'dwuma so;
Gyidi ne xpq yq yqn de,
Nea aka hyq wo nsa, Nyame.
Amen.

title:
Aw'rade Wx Ne Fie Kronkron
The Lord Is in His Holy Temple
songEN:
Aw'rade wx Ne fie kronkron nom',
Aw'rade wx Ne fie kronkron nom',
Ma asase ny'naa nyq komm,
Wxnyq komm wx N'anim.
Amen.
songTWI:
The Lord is in his holy temple,
The Lord is in His holy temple,
Let all the earth be silent,
Be silent before Him.

title:
Ampa, Ampa, 'W'rade Aba Ha
Surely, Surely
songEN:
Ampa, ampa, 'W'rade aba ha,
Ampa 'bxfo da so wx ha,
Mete dwom bxkxx wx m'asom',
Mete Honhom nka, minni sųro bi.
songTWI:
Surely, surely the Lord has been here,
Surely angels still linger near;
I hear music soft on my ear,
I feel His Spirit,
I have no fear.

title:
Da Biara Mesrq Nneqma
Day by Day, Dear Lord
songEN:
Da biara mesrq nneqma
mmiqnsa, Wura:
Sq ma minhu Wo yie,
ma mennx Wo yie,
Na minni W'akyi yie da biara.
songTWI:
Day by day, Dear Lord,
of thee three things I pray:
To see Thee more clearly,
Love Thee more dearly,
Follow Thee more nearly,
Day by day.

title:
'W'ra Yqsrq Fa Wo Nhiyira Pxn
Dismiss Us, Lord, With Blessing

Di M'anim, Di M'anim Wo
Lead Me, Lord
songEN:
Di m'anim, di m'anim Wo trenee mu,
Ma Wo kwan nyq petee m'anim.
'Fisq qyq Wo, 'Wura, Wo nko
Na Woma metra ase dwoo.
songTWI:
Lead me, Lord, lead me in thy righteousness;
make thy way plain before my face.
For it is thou, Lord, thou, Lord only,
that makest me dwell in safety.

title:
Aw'rade Wx Ne Fie Kronkron
The Lord Is In His Holy Temple
songEN:
Aw'rade wx Ne fie kronkron nom',
Aw'rade wx Ne fie kronkron nom',
Ma asase ny'naa nyq komm,
Ma asase ny'naa nyq komm wx N'anim,
Wxnyq komm, Wxnyq komm wx N'anim.
Amen.
songTWI:
The Lord is in His holy temple,
The Lord is in His holy temple,
Let all the earth keep silence,
Let all the earth keep silence,
Before Him, Keep silence,
Keep silence, before Him. Amen.

title:
Agya Tumfox, Tie Yqn Mpaebx
Almighty Father
songEN:
Agya Tumfox, tie yqn mpaebx
Na hy'ra akrā a wxtwqn
W'anim ny'naa.
Amen.
songTWI:
Almighty Father, hear our prayer,
and bless all souls that wait before Thee.
Amen.

title:
Domfo Nyame Munyi N'aye

songEN:
Domfo Nyame munyi N' ayq,
Asase mma munyi N'ayq,
Xsoro dxm munyi N'ayq,
Agya, 'Ba ne Honhom Kronkron.
Amen.

title:

songEN:
Mede koma ne nne
Ka 'Gyenkwa 'yeyi ky'rq-
Ma obiara nka N'ayeyi;
Wiase nyinaa Wura,
N'asqm mu tumi so
Na wxnam bxx wiase nyinaa.

Xfaa akoa tebea
Ne nipadua mu na
Xsoaa yqn mmusu kxx Kalbre:
Xyqq afxr'bxde,
Hwiee Ne mogya kronkron
Gu de gyee bxne mu nnomum.

Ankyq Xsxre dii
N'atamfo so nkonim,
De wxn guu mpokyerq mu na
Odw'riw wxn ahenni,
Maa wxgye too mu sq:

N'ahenni reba ntqm,
Ne trenee bqda adi
'Sase so sqnea qyq s'ro;
Nea oguan toa Kristo,
Benya Ne nkyqn xgye,
Na wahu Ne nkwagye nyinaa.

title:
Ade Nyinaa YiW' Ayq

songEN:
Ade nyinaa yiW' ayq;
S'ro, asase, po ne wim,
Woyqq wxn maa W'anuonyam,
Wxkyerq Wo kqseyq

Ade nyinaa yiW' ayq,

Ade nyinaa yiW' Ayq,

Ade nyinaa yiW' ayq

'Suten, ahum, ahoh'ru
Ne awxw hyqW' anuonyam;

Ade nyinaa yiW' ayq

Awx-mmaa-nyinaa Honhom,
Yqkoto Wo nan ase,
Ma yqn koma so ma Wo;
Ma yqn nso yenyiW' ayq.

title:
Afei Ayeyi Nnwonto Mu

songEN:
Afei ayeyi nnwonto mu,

Nnyeso
Na afei dwom yi bqwosow,
Qbqwosow, qbqwosow;
Na dwom yi bqwosow den sq
Yesu ayq ade nyinaa yie!

Sq xbonsam de n'agyan no
Bqwowx me koma mu a,

Yesu ayq ade nyinaa yie!

Na sq midu 'man pa no mu,
Na me nsa ka trabea no a,
Me dwom yi bqwosow den sq,

title:
Me Kra, Tie Na Aw'radč a

songEN:
Me kra, tie na Aw'radč a;
W'Agyenkwa nō a tie N'asqm;
Yesu si so ka ky'rq w' sq,
"Bxn'yqfo wodx Me anaa?"

Wodaa dua mu, Mituu wo,

Xbaatan betum' agyae
Sq xrenhwq ne ba bio?

Me dx no qnsakra da,
Qkorxn sen s'ro mmepx

Ow'ra, me nkxmmx tit'riw

title:
'W'rade Di Hen' Ma Wo Nne So

songEN:
'W'rade di hen' ma wo nne so,

'Nigye bqwosow mmaa nyinaa

'W'rade di hen' mfutuma ba,

Ahotefo mommx 'sanku;
Mo Agya Nyame no di hen':
Xdqqfo no wx Ne nkyqn hx-
Xdxfo a wxsqn No no.

Mommeky'rq mo hia ne nnesoa,

Na abxfokuw retwqn hx
Abx Ne dx ho amanneq.

O, sq Ne nyansa no tum' fom,

title:
Nyame Wo Ha! Momma Yqnsom

songEN:
Nyame wx ha! momma yqnsom

Momma yqnte Ne tumi nka,

Nyame wx ha! abxfo bom'

'Wura, mpo ayeyi a yqn

Ateasefo nyinaa Wura
Gye yqn ayeyi sq 'duhuam;

title:
Honhom Kwankyerqfo Pá a

songEN:
Honhom kwankyerqfo pá a
Wobqn Kristoni nkyqn daa,
Sx yqn nsa kyerq yqn kwan
Sare so 'kwantu yi mu.
Akra b'rqfo anigye,
B're a Wo nne bxkxx no,
Ka brqoo sq "Kwantofo, bra!
Di M'akyi, ma yqnkx fie".

Dxfo bqnkyqe nokwafo,
Wobqn sq Wobqboa yqn,
Nnyae yqn mma 'kyinnye ne hu,
Mma yqnnka sum huhu mu;
Ahumtu ma yesuro,
Na anidaso pa a,
Ka brqoo sq, "kwantofo, bra!

Sq yqn brq nna yi sa na

Dwen sq wxaky'rqw yqn din hō a;
B're a yqnam nsuy'ri mu

title:
Nyame Honhom, Hom Gu Yqn So

songEN:
Nyame Honhom, hom gu yqn so,
Yqrebx mpae yi tra yqn mu;
Wone yqn hann, yqn nkwa nsuti
Wx yqn asetra fof'ro yim'.

'Wura. Woka yqn ho ampa,
Nyq soro anaasq bun mu:
Mmom yqbqte Wo nne bqnkyqe

Kristo ne yqn s'ro Dimafo
Wone yqn komam' Dimafo
Yi bxne akyinnye ano,

Ao, me koma yq kyinnyefo!

Sq minnya yxnko biara a,

Sq ehu nso hyq me so a,
Bqyq me werqkyqkyefo.

title:
Xdom Honhom' Ne Me Ntra

songEN:
Xdom honhom' ne me ntra,
Na mayq xdomfo bi:
Mada W'asqm a qsa
Yare no adi me bram',

Odwo ne abōxd'ru mu.

Nokwar' Honhom ne me ntra;
Na mayq nokwafo bi:
Ma Wo nyansa ne dom no
Nna adi yie wx me bram',

Tema honhom! ne me ntra

Fa me koma sie sq nhw'ren
Wx sxhwq sum bere mu.
'Wia pue a, bue pon no mu,

Honhom Tumfo! ne me ntra;

Na matumi magyina,
Nea ankonam di nkogu;
Anidaso pa mu daa,
Na makx m'anim ara.

Honhom Kronkron ne me ntra;
Na mayq hotefo bi:
Na bxn' afi me ho no,
Mabata papa nko ho;
Na nea mqdan biara no,
Mede me ho mama Wo.

title:
M'Aw'rade Ho Nyqm' Aniwu

songEN:
M'Aw'rade ho nyqm' aniwu,
Sq migyina ma No;

Nnyeso
Dua no ho! dua no ho!
Hx na mihu hann no

'Wura Yesu, minim Ne din-

Na m'ani da sō ampa.

Ne bxhyq tim hx sq N'agua;
N'Obetumi ahwq,
Nea mede mahyq Ne nsam' no,
Akosi da no mu.

Xbebx me din tantan no
Wx N'agya anim hx;

songEN:
Mqto Kristo a Owu maam'
Anwanwasqm no ho dwom;

Nnyeso
Yiw, mqto Kristo a Owu maam'
'Nwanwasqm no ho dwom;

Ahwehwqpo ho ato.

Meyerae na Yesu huu me
Sq oguan a wafom kwan;

Mipirae Yesu saam' yare;
Metxx piti asehwem '
Manhu ade, ehu hyqm' so;

Esum nna da so ba me so,

Soro dx, dqn na Woayq yi!
Woadan nipa awu amam'!
Agya no dx Ba koro no

Onyame Ba no wu maa me

Wxakum No ama me ne wo

Gye di, asqm no yq nokwar'
Sq Yesu mogya atx yqn;
Faf'ri fi Ne mfem' sen sq nsu;

Monhwq No, mō a mutwam' nyinaa
Nkwa, 'somdwoe Hen'; rekyi mogya!
Bxn'yqfo mmqhwq 'Gyenkwa wu,
Mmisa sq yaw bi te sq 'yi?
Momma Ne mogya no nnye yqn;

title:
Obi De Xpq Sii M'anan Mu Wu Maa Me

songEN:
Obi de xpq sii m'anan mu wu maa me,
Sq xkra a xmfata nnya nkwa;
Xde xpq faa asqnnua so kwan no so,

NnyesoWxabx no asqnuam', Wxabx no asqnuam',
O hwq seneā Xde xpq soae!
Yaw ne adehwere
Pii na Yesu de soaa
Me bxne kxx asqnnua no so!

Onyaa odwo, adxe ne boasetx maa me,

W'xabx me bxne nyinaā asqnnuam'.

Metintim m'Agyenkwa den, merennyaw No da;
Mede dqw betu me kwan daa daa
Na mede m'ano ne me komā ato dwom sq,

title:
Yaw Nipa, Din Nwanwa a

songEN:
Yaw Nipa, din nwanwa a
Wxde frq Nyame Ba a
Obqgyee nnebxn`yqfo
Haleluya! Xgyefo ni!

Animguasem' ahiyim'
N'Osii m'ananmu dii fx;
Manya faf'ri Ne mogyam'
Haleluya! Xgyefo ni!

Yedi fx, yqn ho wx fi;

Wxsqm' No nti na Owui,
Na Xteqq mu sq "Mawie":
Wxama No so xsoro;

Anuonyam Hene no ba,
Bqfa Ne mma kx fie a,
Yqbqto dwom yi bio se:

title:

songEN:
Ha na mqtra ahome daa,
Mqbqn Wo mfem' mogyan;

M'Agyenkwa Nyame a Worewu,

Fa Wo mpata mogya no kam',
Kosi sq gyidi ne
Anidaso bqsow aba,

title:

songEN:
B're no yq dq boro so!
B're a 'hotefo hyiam no.
B're a wxdwen 'Gyenkwa ho,

Yqto daa xdx ho dwom,

title:
Awurade Yqdx

songEN:

Nnyeso

"O Qyq nwonwa sq Yesu dx me!"

songEN:
Wo 's'ro abangua yq fq
Wx hann ne dx man no mu;
Wo fam abangua yq fq,

Ahotefo nkxmmxdi
W'anim hy'rqn ne Wo mayq.

N-hyira ne nnomaa a

N-hyira ne akra a
Wxhome Agya kokom';
Wxte sq 'b'rxnoma a
Wannya homebea fam ha:

'Kra 'nigyefo 'yeyi sen

Hena na xte sq Wo (Nyame)?
